tika-vin04t:10_0: Sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
tika-vin04t:13_0: Chanda, pārisuddhi, utukkhānaṃ, bhikkhugaṇanā ca ovādo;
tika-vin04t:18_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti, “pattakalla”nti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:19_0: Pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni samāpetvā desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhusaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karoma.
tika-vin04t:22_3: taṃ sabbeva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karoma.
tika-vin04t:22_8: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:22_9: evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:22_10: Yo pana bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ anusāviyamāne saramāno santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya,
tika-vin04t:22_12: Sampajānamusāvādo kho panāyasmanto antarāyiko dhammo vutto bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:22_13: tasmā saramānena bhikkhunā āpannena visuddhāpekkhena santī āpatti āvikātabbā,
tika-vin04t:26_0: Tatrime cattāro pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:28_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin04t:30_1: Yo pana bhikkhu gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:30_2: yathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā pabbājeyyuṃ vā corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosīti,
tika-vin04t:30_3: tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamāno ayampi pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso.
tika-vin04t:32_1: Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-vin04t:32_4: maraṇāya vā samādapeyya “ambho purisa kiṃ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitena,
tika-vin04t:32_6: iti cittamano cittasaṅkappo anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya,
tika-vin04t:34_1: Yo pana bhikkhu anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ samudācareyya “iti jānāmi,
tika-vin04t:34_3: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā āpanno visuddhāpekkho evaṃ vadeyya “ajānamevaṃ āvuso avacaṃ jānāmi,
tika-vin04t:35_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā.
tika-vin04t:35_1: Yesaṃ bhikkhu aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ yathā pure,
tika-vin04t:43_1: Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyya hatthaggāhaṃ
tika-vin04t:43_2: vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:45_1: Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā taṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ methunupasaṃhitāhi,
tika-vin04t:47_1: Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya
tika-vin04t:47_2: “etadaggaṃ bhagini pāricariyānaṃ yā mādisaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dhammena paricareyyā”ti
tika-vin04t:49_1: Yo pana bhikkhu sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatiṃ,
tika-vin04t:51_1: Saññācikāya pana bhikkhunā kuṭiṃ kārayamānena assāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
tika-vin04t:51_6: tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:51_7: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kāreyya,
tika-vin04t:53_1: Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena sassāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāya,
tika-vin04t:53_2: tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:53_3: Sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kāreyya,
tika-vin04t:55_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti,
tika-vin04t:55_2: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:57_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya
tika-vin04t:57_2: pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti,
tika-vin04t:57_3: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti kocideso lesamatto upādinno,
tika-vin04t:59_1: Yo pana bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkameyya,
tika-vin04t:59_2: bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin04t:59_3: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami,
tika-vin04t:59_4: bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin04t:59_6: samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti,
tika-vin04t:59_7: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:59_8: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:61_1: Tasseva kho pana bhikkhussa bhikkhū honti anuvattakā vaggavādakā eko vā dve vā tayo vā,
tika-vin04t:61_2: te evaṃ vadeyyuṃ “māyasmanto etaṃ bhikkhuṃ kiñci avacuttha,
tika-vin04t:61_5: amhākañceso bhikkhu chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati, jānāti,
tika-vin04t:61_8: te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi evamassu vacanīyā “māyasmanto evaṃ avacuttha,
tika-vin04t:61_13: samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti,
tika-vin04t:61_14: evañca te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-vin04t:61_15: te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:63_1: Bhikkhu paneva dubbacajātiko hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno
tika-vin04t:63_2: attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti “mā maṃ āyasmanto kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:63_3: ahampāyasmante na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:63_5: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi,
tika-vin04t:63_9: evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti,
tika-vin04t:63_10: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:63_11: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:65_1: Bhikkhu paneva aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati kuladūsako pāpasamācāro,
tika-vin04t:65_2: tassa kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:65_3: kulāni ca tena duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:65_4: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “āyasmā kho kuladūsako pāpasamācāro,
tika-vin04t:65_5: āyasmato kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:65_6: kulāni cāyasmatā duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:65_9: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno te bhikkhū evaṃ vadeyya “chandagāmino ca bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:65_12: bhayagāmino ca bhikkhū tādisikāya āpattiyā ekaccaṃ pabbājenti,
tika-vin04t:65_14: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā evaṃ avaca,
tika-vin04t:65_20: āyasmato kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:65_21: kulāni cāyasmatā duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:65_24: evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:65_25: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:66_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nava paṭhamāpattikā,
tika-vin04t:66_2: Yesaṃ bhikkhu aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjitvā yāvatīhaṃ jānaṃ paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin04t:66_4: Parivutthaparivāsena bhikkhunā uttari chārattaṃ bhikkhumānattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:66_5: ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
tika-vin04t:66_7: Ekenapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuṃ abbheyya,
tika-vin04t:69_0: Ime kho panāyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā
tika-vin04t:72_1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin04t:72_2: tamenaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā disvā tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyya pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
tika-vin04t:72_3: nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo pārājikena vā saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
tika-vin04t:72_4: yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya,
tika-vin04t:74_1: Na heva kho pana paṭicchannaṃ āsanaṃ hoti nālaṃkammaniyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:74_2: alañca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsituṃ,
tika-vin04t:74_3: yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpe āsane mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin04t:74_4: tamenaṃ saddheyyavacasā upāsikā disvā dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyya saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
tika-vin04t:74_5: nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabbo saṅghādisesena vā pācittiyena vā,
tika-vin04t:74_6: yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya,
tika-vin04t:75_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā.
tika-vin04t:78_0: Ime kho panāyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā
tika-vin04t:81_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:83_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya,
tika-vin04t:85_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuno paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:85_5: māsaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ ūnassa pāripūriyā satiyā paccāsāya.
tika-vin04t:85_6: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya,
tika-vin04t:87_1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpeyya vā rajāpeyya vā ākoṭāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:89_1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇheyya aññatra pārivattakā,
tika-vin04t:91_1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:93_1: Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:93_2: santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:95_1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātakassa gahapatissa vā gahapatāniyā vā cīvaracetāpannaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ hoti “iminā
tika-vin04t:95_2: cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādessāmī”ti,
tika-vin04t:95_3: tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmā iminā
tika-vin04t:95_4: cīvaracetāpannena evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādehī”ti kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāya,
tika-vin04t:97_1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa ubhinnaṃ aññātakānaṃ gahapatīnaṃ vā gahapatānīnaṃ vā paccekacīvaracetāpannāni
tika-vin04t:97_2: upakkhaṭāni honti “imehi mayaṃ paccekacīvaracetāpannehi paccekacīvarāni cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-vin04t:97_4: tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmanto
tika-vin04t:97_5: imehi paccekacīvaracetāpannehi evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādetha ubhova santā ekenā”ti
tika-vin04t:99_1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya
tika-vin04t:99_2: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti.
tika-vin04t:99_3: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-vin04t:99_6: Tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:99_8: cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti.
tika-vin04t:99_9: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃ vadeyya “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti.
tika-vin04t:99_12: bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:99_14: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “yaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-vin04t:99_21: bhikkhunā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo “attho me, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:99_23: dvattikkhattuṃ codayamāno sārayamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:99_26: catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtena uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:99_27: catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūto uddissa tiṭṭhamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:99_29: tato ce uttari vāyamamāno taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:99_34: dūto vā pāhetabbo “yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha,
tika-vin04t:99_35: na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti,
tika-vin04t:102_0: 11. Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:104_0: 12. Yo pana bhikkhu suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:106_1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārayamānena dve bhāgā suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ ādātabbā,
tika-vin04t:106_4: Anādā ce bhikkhu dve bhāge suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:108_1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:108_2: orena ce channaṃ vassānaṃ taṃ santhataṃ vissajjetvā vā avissajjetvā vā aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
tika-vin04t:110_1: Nisīdanasanthataṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthi ādātabbā dubbaṇṇakaraṇāya.
tika-vin04t:110_2: Anādā ce bhikkhu purāṇasantha tassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ,
tika-vin04t:112_3: paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbāni asante hārake.
tika-vin04t:114_1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpeyya vā rajāpeyya vā vijaṭāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:116_1: Yo pana bhikkhu jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:118_0: 19. Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:120_0: 20. Yo pana bhikkhu nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:123_0: 21. Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo, taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:125_1: Yo pana bhikkhu ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:125_3: Tena bhikkhunā so patto bhikkhuparisāya nissajjitabbo,
tika-vin04t:125_5: so tassa bhikkhuno padātabbo “ayaṃ te bhikkhu patto yāva bhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti,
tika-vin04t:127_1: Yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni,
tika-vin04t:129_3: Orena ce “māso seso gimhāna”nti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya,
tika-vin04t:131_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:133_0: 26. Yo pana bhikkhu sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:135_1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissa aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:135_2: tatra ce so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “idaṃ kho, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:135_11: appeva nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā”ti.
tika-vin04t:135_12: Evañca so bhikkhu vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi,
tika-vin04t:137_1: Dasāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuno paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:139_1: Upavassaṃ kho pana kattikapuṇṇamaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni,
tika-vin04t:139_2: tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipeyya,
tika-vin04t:139_3: siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāya,
tika-vin04t:139_4: chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:139_5: Tato ce uttari vippavaseyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
tika-vin04t:141_0: 30. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:143_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
tika-vin04t:155_0: 4. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:157_0: 5. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:159_0: 6. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:161_1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena,
tika-vin04t:163_0: 8. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya, bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:165_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa āroceyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā,
tika-vin04t:167_0: 10. Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:176_1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya,
tika-vin04t:178_1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya,
tika-vin04t:180_1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya “yassa sambādho bhavissati,
tika-vin04t:180_2: so pakkamissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:182_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ kupito anattamano saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:184_1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:186_1: Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya
tika-vin04t:186_3: tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya,
tika-vin04t:188_1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:191_0: 21. Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:193_0: 22. Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:195_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:197_0: 24. Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:199_0: 25. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadeyya aññatra pārivattakā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:201_0: 26. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:203_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:205_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya,
tika-vin04t:207_1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā,
tika-vin04t:209_0: 30. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:212_0: 31. Agilānena bhikkhunā eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:218_1: Bhikkhuṃ paneva kulaṃ upagataṃ pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:218_5: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvā tato nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:220_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:222_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya
tika-vin04t:222_2: “handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho,
tika-vin04t:224_0: 37. Yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:226_1: Yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:228_3: navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu, phāṇitaṃ, maccho, maṃsaṃ, khīraṃ, dadhi.
tika-vin04t:228_4: Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:230_0: 40. Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:233_1: Yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya,
tika-vin04t:235_2: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya “gacchāvuso,
tika-vin04t:235_3: na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hoti,
tika-vin04t:235_4: ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:237_0: 43. Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:239_0: 44. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:241_0: 45. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:243_1: Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:245_1: Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya,
tika-vin04t:247_0: 48. Yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:249_1: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya,
tika-vin04t:251_1: Dirattatirattaṃ ce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:262_0: 55. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:264_1: Yo pana bhikkhu agilāno visibbanāpekkho jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā,
tika-vin04t:266_1: Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:266_3: Tatthāyaṃ samayo “diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso” iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
tika-vin04t:268_1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ ādātabbaṃ nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:268_2: Anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:270_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:272_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamaso hasāpekkhopi,
tika-vin04t:275_0: 61. Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:277_0: 62. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:279_0: 63. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:281_0: 64. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:283_1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeyya,
tika-vin04t:285_1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi,
tika-vin04t:287_1: Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi,
tika-vin04t:289_1: Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-vin04t:289_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:289_4: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā evaṃ avaca,
tika-vin04t:289_8: anekapariyāyenāvuso antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:289_10: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:289_11: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
tika-vin04t:291_1: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:293_1: Samaṇuddesopi ce evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-vin04t:293_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:293_10: samaṇuddesa antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:293_12: evañca so samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:293_13: so samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “ajjatagge te, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:293_14: samaṇuddesa na ceva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo,
tika-vin04t:293_15: yampi caññe samaṇuddesā labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:293_19: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:296_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya “na tāvāhaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:296_3: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī”ti,
tika-vin04t:298_1: Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi,
tika-vin04t:300_1: Yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “idāneva kho ahaṃ jānāmi,
tika-vin04t:300_2: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti.
tika-vin04t:300_3: Tañce bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ iminā bhikkhunā dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne,
tika-vin04t:300_5: na ca tassa bhikkhuno aññāṇakena mutti atthi,
tika-vin04t:300_8: uttari cassa moho āropetabbo “tassa te, āvuso, alābhā,
tika-vin04t:300_10: yaṃ tvaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamānena sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī”ti,
tika-vin04t:302_0: 74. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:304_0: 75. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:306_0: 76. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:308_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya “itissa muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:310_1: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya “yaṃ ime bhaṇissanti,
tika-vin04t:310_2: taṃ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:312_0: 79. Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:314_1: Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya,
tika-vin04t:316_1: Yo pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya “yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī”ti,
tika-vin04t:318_0: 82. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:321_1: Yo pana bhikkhu rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa anikkhantarājake aniggataratanake pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito indakhīlaṃ atikkāmeyya,
tika-vin04t:323_1: Yo pana bhikkhu ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:323_3: Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhunā ratanasammataṃ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ “yassa bhavissati,
tika-vin04t:325_1: Yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāvikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā,
tika-vin04t:327_1: Yo pana bhikkhu aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:329_1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā.
tika-vin04t:331_0: 88. Yo pana bhikkhu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya, uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:333_1: Nisīdanaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikaṃ kāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:335_1: Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
tika-vin04t:337_1: Vassikasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
tika-vin04t:339_1: Yo pana bhikkhu sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:341_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto dvenavuti pācittiyā dhammā.
tika-vin04t:347_1: Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:349_2: tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā hoti “idha sūpaṃ detha,
tika-vin04t:349_4: Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā “apasakka tāva bhagini,
tika-vin04t:349_6: Ekassapi ce bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādetuṃ “apasakka tāva bhagini,
tika-vin04t:351_1: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni,
tika-vin04t:351_2: yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:351_3: bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:353_1: Yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni,
tika-vin04t:353_2: yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:353_3: bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā agilāno khādeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:354_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pāṭidesanīyā dhammā.

tika-vin04t:515_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā.
tika-vin04t:525_1: ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin04t:525_2: tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbanti.
tika-vin04t:531_0: Sammajjanī padīpo ca, udakaṃ āsanena ca;
tika-vin04t:534_0: Chanda, pārisuddhi, utukkhānaṃ, bhikkhunigaṇanā ca ovādo;
tika-vin04t:539_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti, “pattakalla”nti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:540_0: Pubbakaraṇapubbakiccāni samāpetvā desitāpattikassa samaggassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ ārādhanaṃ karoma.
tika-vin04t:543_3: taṃ sabbāva santā sādhukaṃ suṇoma manasi karoma.
tika-vin04t:543_9: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassā veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:543_10: evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:543_11: Yā pana bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ anusāviyamāne saramānā santiṃ āpattiṃ nāvikareyya,
tika-vin04t:543_15: tasmā saramānāya bhikkhuniyā āpannāya visuddhāpekkhāya santī āpatti āvikātabbā,
tika-vin04t:547_0: Tatrime aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:549_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin04t:551_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:551_2: yathārūpe adinnādāne rājāno coraṃ gahetvā haneyyuṃ vā bandheyyuṃ vā pabbājeyyuṃ vā corāsi bālāsi mūḷhāsi thenāsīti,
tika-vin04t:551_3: tathārūpaṃ bhikkhunī adinnaṃ ādiyamānā ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā.
tika-vin04t:553_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-vin04t:553_7: iti cittamanā cittasaṅkappā anekapariyāyena maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyya,
tika-vin04t:555_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī anabhijānaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ attupanāyikaṃ alamariyañāṇadassanaṃ samudācareyya “iti jānāmi,
tika-vin04t:555_3: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānā vā asamanuggāhīyamānā vā āpannā visuddhāpekkhā evaṃ vadeyya “ajānamevaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:557_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa,
tika-vin04t:557_2: adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ āmasanaṃ vā parāmasanaṃ vā gahaṇaṃ vā chupanaṃ vā paṭipīḷanaṃ vā sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:559_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nevattanā paṭicodeyya,
tika-vin04t:559_3: yadā ca sā ṭhitā vā assa cutā vā nāsitā vā avassaṭā vā,
tika-vin04t:559_5: aññāsiṃ etaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ‘evarūpā ca evarūpā ca sā bhaginī’ti,
tika-vin04t:561_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvatteyya,
tika-vin04t:561_2: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “eso kho, ayye,
tika-vin04t:561_4: dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo, māyye,
tika-vin04t:561_6: evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:561_7: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:563_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vā sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:563_8: kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya upasaṃhareyya etassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya,
tika-vin04t:564_2: Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjitvā na labhati bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ yathā pure,
tika-vin04t:570_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā dāsena vā kammakārena vā antamaso samaṇaparibbājakenāpi,
tika-vin04t:570_2: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:572_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ coriṃ vajjhaṃ viditaṃ anapaloketvā rājānaṃ vā saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā pūgaṃ vā seṇiṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:572_3: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:574_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:574_5: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:576_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuniṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṃ,
tika-vin04t:576_3: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:578_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:578_2: bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:578_3: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:580_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ te, ayye,
tika-vin04t:580_2: eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā,
tika-vin04t:580_4: yaṃ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:580_5: taṃ tvaṃ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti,
tika-vin04t:580_6: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:582_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sañcarittaṃ samāpajjeyya itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ,
tika-vin04t:582_3: jāyattane vā jārattane vā antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapi,
tika-vin04t:582_4: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:584_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ duṭṭhā dosā appatītā amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti,
tika-vin04t:584_2: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānā vā asa manuggāhīyamānā vā amūlakañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:584_4: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:586_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ duṭṭhā dosā appatītā aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ
tika-vin04t:586_2: upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyya “appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti,
tika-vin04t:586_3: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamānā vā asamanuggāhīyamānā vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:586_6: ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:588_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi dhammaṃ paccācikkhāmi,
tika-vin04t:588_7: Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca ‘buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmi,
tika-vin04t:588_17: evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:588_18: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:588_22: ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:590_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ vadeyya “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin04t:590_6: kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṃ avaca ‘chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin04t:590_14: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:590_15: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:590_19: ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:592_1: Bhikkhuniyo paneva saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā,
tika-vin04t:592_2: tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi evamassu vacanīyā “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā
tika-vin04t:592_6: evañca tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-vin04t:592_7: tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:592_11: imāpi bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:594_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye,
tika-vin04t:594_4: santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā,
tika-vin04t:594_5: tā saṅgho na kiñci āha tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha –
tika-vin04t:594_6: ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā,
tika-vin04t:594_13: santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā,
tika-vin04t:594_15: tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha –
tika-vin04t:594_16: ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā,
tika-vin04t:594_19: evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:594_20: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:594_24: ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:596_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkameyya,
tika-vin04t:596_2: bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin04t:596_5: bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha aṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin04t:596_7: samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti.
tika-vin04t:596_8: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:596_9: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:596_13: ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:598_1: Tassāyeva kho pana bhikkhuniyā bhikkhuniyo honti anuvattikā vaggavādikā ekā vā dve vā tisso vā,
tika-vin04t:598_3: etaṃ bhikkhuniṃ kiñci avacuttha dhammavādinī cesā bhikkhunī,
tika-vin04t:598_5: amhākañcesā bhikkhunī chandañca ruciñca ādāya voharati, jānāti,
tika-vin04t:598_14: samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharatī”ti,
tika-vin04t:598_15: evañca tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-vin04t:598_16: tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:598_20: imāpi bhikkhuniyo yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:600_1: Bhikkhunī paneva dubbacajātikā hoti uddesapariyāpannesu sikkhāpadesu bhikkhunīhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā
tika-vin04t:600_2: attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoti “mā maṃ ayyāyo kiñci avacuttha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:600_4: na kiñci vakkhāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:600_13: evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti.
tika-vin04t:600_14: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:600_15: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:600_19: ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:602_1: Bhikkhunī paneva aññataraṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati kuladūsikā pāpasamācārā,
tika-vin04t:602_2: tassā kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:602_3: kulāni ca tāya duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:602_6: ayyāya kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:602_11: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeyya “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo,
tika-vin04t:602_15: tādisikāya āpattiyā ekaccaṃ pabbājenti ekaccaṃ na pabbājentī”ti,
tika-vin04t:602_23: ayyāya kho pāpakā samācārā dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:602_24: kulāni cāyyāya duṭṭhāni dissanti ceva suyyanti ca,
tika-vin04t:602_26: imamhā āvāsā alaṃ te idha vāsenā”ti.
tika-vin04t:602_27: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:602_28: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:602_32: ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ.
tika-vin04t:603_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā nava paṭhamāpattikā, aṭṭha yāvatatiyakā,
tika-vin04t:604_0: Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjati,
tika-vin04t:604_2: Ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho,
tika-vin04t:604_4: Ekāyapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuniṃ abbheyya,
tika-vin04t:607_0: Ime kho panāyyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā
tika-vin04t:610_0: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ kareyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:612_0: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:614_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattetvā sā pacchā evaṃ vadeyya “handāyye,
tika-vin04t:614_7: sakaṃ paccāharā”ti acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:616_0: 4. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:618_0: 5. Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:620_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:622_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena saṅghikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:624_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:626_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:628_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:631_1: Garupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā catukkaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:633_1: Lahupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā aḍḍhateyyakaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:635_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhuniyā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:637_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhuniyā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattampi ce bhikkhunī ticīvarena vippavaseyya,
tika-vin04t:639_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhuniyā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine bhikkhuniyā paneva akālacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:639_5: māsaparamaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ ūnassa pāripūriyā satiyā paccāsāya.
tika-vin04t:639_6: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya,
tika-vin04t:641_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:641_3: Tatthāyaṃ samayo acchinnacīvarā vā hoti bhikkhunī,
tika-vin04t:643_1: Tañce aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā bahūhi cīvarehi abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:643_2: santaruttaraparamaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:645_1: Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa aññātakassa gahapatissa vā gahapatāniyā vā cīvaracetāpannaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ hoti
tika-vin04t:645_2: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ cīvarena acchādessāmī”ti.
tika-vin04t:645_3: Tatra cesā bhikkhunī pubbe appavāritā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata,
tika-vin04t:645_4: maṃ āyasmā iminā cīvaracetāpannena evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādehī”ti kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāya,
tika-vin04t:647_1: Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa ubhinnaṃ aññātakānaṃ gahapatīnaṃ vā gahapatānīnaṃ vā paccekacīvaracetāpannāni
tika-vin04t:647_2: upakkhaṭāni honti “imehi mayaṃ paccekacīvaracetāpannehi paccekacīvarāni cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ
tika-vin04t:647_4: Tatra cesā bhikkhūnī pubbe appavāritā upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “sādhu vata maṃ āyasmanto
tika-vin04t:647_5: imehi paccekacīvaracetāpannehi evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vā cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā acchādetha ubhova santā ekenā”ti
tika-vin04t:649_1: Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa rājā vā rājabhoggo vā brāhmaṇo vā gahapatiko vā dūtena cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇeyya
tika-vin04t:649_2: “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti.
tika-vin04t:649_3: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kho, ayye,
tika-vin04t:649_6: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:649_8: cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma kālena kappiya”nti.
tika-vin04t:649_9: So ce dūto taṃ bhikkhuniṃ evaṃ vadeyya “atthi panāyyāya,
tika-vin04t:649_13: bhikkhuniyā veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo ārāmiko vā upāsako vā “eso kho, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:649_15: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “yaṃ kho, ayye,
tika-vin04t:649_22: bhikkhuniyā veyyāvaccakaro upasaṅkamitvā dvattikkhattuṃ codetabbo sāretabbo “attho me, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:649_24: dvattikkhattuṃ codayamānā sārayamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:649_27: catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtāya uddissa ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:649_28: catukkhattuṃ pañcakkhattuṃ chakkhattuparamaṃ tuṇhībhūtā uddissa tiṭṭhamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:649_30: Tato ce uttari vāyamamānā taṃ cīvaraṃ abhinipphādeyya,
tika-vin04t:649_35: dūto vā pāhetabbo “yaṃ kho tumhe āyasmanto bhikkhuniṃ uddissa cīvaracetāpannaṃ pahiṇittha,
tika-vin04t:649_36: na taṃ tassā bhikkhuniyā kiñci atthaṃ anubhoti,
tika-vin04t:652_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya,
tika-vin04t:654_0: 22. Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:656_0: 23. Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:658_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:658_3: Tāya bhikkhuniyā so patto bhikkhuniparisāya nissajjitabbo,
tika-vin04t:658_5: so tassā bhikkhuniyā padātabbo “ayaṃ te bhikkhuni patto yāvabhedanāya dhāretabbo”ti,
tika-vin04t:660_1: Yāni kho pana tāni gilānānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paṭisāyanīyāni bhesajjāni,
tika-vin04t:662_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā acchindeyya vā acchindāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:664_0: 27. Yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:666_1: Bhikkhuniṃ paneva uddissa aññātako gahapati vā gahapatānī vā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:666_2: tatra cesā bhikkhunī pubbe appavāritā tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya “idaṃ kho āvuso cīvaraṃ maṃ uddissa viyyati,
tika-vin04t:666_4: vitthatañca appitañca suvītañca suppavāyitañca suvilekhitañca suvitacchitañca karotha,
tika-vin04t:666_5: appeva nāma mayampi āyasmantānaṃ kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāmā”ti,
tika-vin04t:666_6: evañca sā bhikkhunī vatvā kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyya antamaso piṇḍapātamattampi,
tika-vin04t:668_1: Dasāhānāgataṃ kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamaṃ bhikkhuniyā paneva accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:670_0: 30. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:678_0: 1. Yā pana bhikkhunī lasuṇaṃ khādeyya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:680_0: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:686_1: Udakasuddhikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā ādiyamānāya dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:688_0: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:690_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī āmakadhaññaṃ viññatvā vā viññāpetvā vā bhajjitvā vā bhajjāpetvā vā koṭṭetvā vā koṭṭāpetvā vā pacitvā vā pacāpetvā vā bhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:692_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:694_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā harite chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:696_0: 10. Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:699_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī rattandhakāre appadīpe purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:701_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:703_0: 13. Yā pana bhikkhunī ajjhokāse purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:705_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya
tika-vin04t:705_2: vā nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyya dutiyikaṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ uyyojeyya,
tika-vin04t:707_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkameyya,
tika-vin04t:709_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī pacchābhattaṃ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā āsane abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:711_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:713_0: 18. Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:715_0: 19. Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:717_0: 20. Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:720_0: 21. Yā pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:722_1: Udakasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
tika-vin04t:724_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbeyya,
tika-vin04t:724_2: na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya aññatra catūhapañcāhā,
tika-vin04t:726_0: 24. Yā pana bhikkhunī pañcāhikaṃ saṅghāṭicāraṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:728_0: 25. Yā pana bhikkhunī cīvarasaṅkamanīyaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:730_0: 26. Yā pana bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvaralābhaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:732_0: 27. Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:734_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin04t:736_0: 29. Yā pana bhikkhunī dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:738_0: 30. Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:741_0: 31. Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyuṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:743_0: 32. Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā tuvaṭṭeyyuṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:745_0: 33. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:747_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ neva upaṭṭhaheyya,
tika-vin04t:749_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṃ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:751_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṃsaṭṭhā vihareyya gahapatinā vā gahapatiputtena vā,
tika-vin04t:751_6: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:751_7: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya,
tika-vin04t:753_0: 37. Yā pana bhikkhunī antoraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:755_0: 38. Yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikā cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:757_0: 39. Yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṃ cārikaṃ careyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:759_0: 40. Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā cārikaṃ na pakkameyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:762_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:764_0: 42. Yā pana bhikkhunī āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:766_0: 43. Yā pana bhikkhunī suttaṃ kanteyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:768_0: 44. Yā pana bhikkhunī gihiveyyāvaccaṃ kareyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:770_2: imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamehī”ti vuccamānā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasameyya,
tika-vin04t:772_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya,
tika-vin04t:774_0: 47. Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjetvā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:776_0: 48. Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:778_0: 49. Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:780_0: 50. Yā pana bhikkhunī tiracchānavijjaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:783_0: 51. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:785_0: 52. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuṃ akkoseyya vā paribhāseyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:787_0: 53. Yā pana bhikkhunī caṇḍīkatā gaṇaṃ paribhāseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:789_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:791_0: 55. Yā pana bhikkhunī kulamaccharinī assa, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:793_0: 56. Yā pana bhikkhunī abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vaseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:795_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:797_0: 58. Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:799_1: Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca.
tika-vin04t:801_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ
tika-vin04t:801_2: ekenekā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:804_0: 61. Yā pana bhikkhunī gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:806_0: 62. Yā pana bhikkhunī pāyantiṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:808_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:810_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:812_0: 65. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:814_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:816_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:818_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā dve vassāni neva anuggaṇheyya na anuggaṇhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:820_0: 69. Yā pana bhikkhunī vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ dve vassāni nānubandheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:822_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā neva vūpakāseyya na vūpakāsāpeyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi,
tika-vin04t:825_0: 71. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:827_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:829_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṅghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:831_0: 74. Yā pana bhikkhunī ūnadvādasavassā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:833_0: 75. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:835_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī “alaṃ tāva te, ayye,
tika-vin04t:835_2: vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti vuccamānā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā khiyyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:837_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ “sace me tvaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:837_3: evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:839_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ “sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:839_3: evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:841_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:843_0: 80. Yā pana bhikkhunī mātāpitūhi vā sāmikena vā ananuññātaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:845_0: 81. Yā pana bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:847_0: 82. Yā pana bhikkhunī anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:849_0: 83. Yā pana bhikkhunī ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:852_0: 84. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:854_0: 85. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:856_0: 86. Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghāṇiṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:858_0: 87. Yā pana bhikkhunī itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:860_0: 88. Yā pana bhikkhunī gandhavaṇṇakena nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:862_0: 89. Yā pana bhikkhunī vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:864_0: 90. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:866_0: 91. Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānāya ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:868_0: 92. Yā pana bhikkhunī sāmaṇeriyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:870_0: 93. Yā pana bhikkhunī gihiniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:872_0: 94. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:874_0: 95. Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ puccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:876_0: 96. Yā pana bhikkhunī asaṃkaccikā gāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:885_0: 100. Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:887_0: 101. Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:889_0: 102. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:891_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā itthiviggahena,
tika-vin04t:893_0: 104. Yā pana bhikkhunī anupasampannāya uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya, bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:895_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannāya āroceyya aññatra bhikkhunisammutiyā,
tika-vin04t:897_0: 106. Yā pana bhikkhunī pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:906_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamantī neva uddhareyya,
tika-vin04t:908_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamantī neva uddhareyya,
tika-vin04t:910_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuniṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya “yassā sambādho bhavissati,
tika-vin04t:910_2: sā pakkamissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:912_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ kupitā anattamanā saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:914_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:916_1: Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā vihāraṃ kārayamānāya yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya,
tika-vin04t:916_2: ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitāya adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:916_3: Tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhitā adhiṭṭhaheyya,
tika-vin04t:918_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:921_0: 117. Agilānāya bhikkhuniyā eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:925_1: Bhikkhuniṃ paneva kulaṃ upagataṃ pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya,
tika-vin04t:925_5: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvā tato nīharitvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:927_0: 120. Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:929_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:931_0: 122. Yā pana bhikkhunī adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:933_2: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti tassā dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya “gacchāyye,
tika-vin04t:933_3: na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hoti,
tika-vin04t:933_4: ekikāya me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:935_0: 124. Yā pana bhikkhunī sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:937_0: 125. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:939_0: 126. Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:942_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā sabhattā samānā santiṃ bhikkhuniṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:944_1: Agilānāya bhikkhuniyā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya,
tika-vin04t:946_0: 129. Yā pana bhikkhunī uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:948_1: Siyā ca tassā bhikkhuniyā kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya,
tika-vin04t:950_1: Dirattatirattaṃ ce bhikkhunī senāya vasamānā uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:960_0: 136. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ bhiṃsāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:963_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā visibbanāpekkhā jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā,
tika-vin04t:965_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin04t:965_3: Tatthāyaṃ samayo “diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso” iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo,
tika-vin04t:967_1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cīvaralābhāya tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ ādātabbaṃ nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:967_2: Anādā ce bhikkhunī tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:969_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā apaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:971_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamaso hasāpekkhāpi,
tika-vin04t:973_0: 142. Yā pana bhikkhunī sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:975_0: 143. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:977_0: 144. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:979_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi,
tika-vin04t:981_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-vin04t:981_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:981_4: Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “māyye evaṃ avaca,
tika-vin04t:981_8: anekapariyāyenāyye antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:981_10: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:981_11: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
tika-vin04t:984_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ tathāvādiniyā bhikkhuniyā akaṭānudhammāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhāya saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:986_1: Samaṇuddesāpi ce evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-vin04t:986_2: yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:986_10: samaṇuddese antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā,
tika-vin04t:986_12: Evañca sā samaṇuddesā bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
tika-vin04t:986_13: sā samaṇuddesā bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā “ajjatagge te, ayye,
tika-vin04t:986_14: samaṇuddese na ceva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo,
tika-vin04t:986_15: yampi caññā samaṇuddesā labhanti bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:986_19: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:988_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā evaṃ vadeyya “na tāvāhaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:988_3: yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī”ti,
tika-vin04t:990_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi,
tika-vin04t:992_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “idāneva kho ahaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:992_2: jānāmi ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti,
tika-vin04t:992_3: tañce bhikkhuniṃ aññā bhikkhuniyo jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ imāya bhikkhuniyā dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne,
tika-vin04t:992_5: na ca tassā bhikkhuniyā aññāṇakena mutti atthi,
tika-vin04t:992_8: uttari cassā moho āropetabbo “tassā te, ayye, alābhā,
tika-vin04t:992_10: yaṃ tvaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne na sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī”ti,
tika-vin04t:994_0: 152. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā pahāraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:996_0: 153. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:998_0: 154. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1000_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya “itissā muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1002_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya “yaṃ imā bhaṇissanti,
tika-vin04t:1002_2: taṃ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1005_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1007_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya,
tika-vin04t:1009_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya “yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhuniyo saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī”ti,
tika-vin04t:1011_0: 160. Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1013_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī ratanaṃ vā ratanasammataṃ vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā,
tika-vin04t:1013_3: Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhuniyā ratanasammataṃ vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ “yassa bhavissati,
tika-vin04t:1015_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:1017_1: Navaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānāya aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā.
tika-vin04t:1019_0: 164. Yā pana bhikkhunī mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpeyya, uddālanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1021_1: Kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā,
tika-vin04t:1023_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:1031_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1033_0: 2. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā telaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1035_0: 3. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā madhuṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1037_0: 4. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā phāṇitaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1039_0: 5. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1041_0: 6. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1043_0: 7. Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya…pe… taṃ paṭidesemīti.
tika-vin04t:1045_1: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1049_0: Ime kho panāyyāyo, sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:1063_0: 9. Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1064_0: 10. Na ukkhittakāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1067_0: 11. Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1068_0: 12. Na ujjagghikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1073_0: 15. Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1074_0: 16. Na kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1076_0: 17. Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1077_0: 18. Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1079_0: 19. Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1080_0: 20. Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1083_0: 21. Na khambhakatā antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1084_0: 22. Na khambhakatā antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1086_0: 23. Na oguṇṭhitā antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1087_0: 24. Na oguṇṭhitā antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1089_0: 25. Na ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1091_0: 26. Na pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1110_0: 35. Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1112_0: 36. Na sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādessāmi bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāyāti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1114_0: 37. Na sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1116_0: 38. Na ujjhānasaññinī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1123_0: 41. Na anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1125_0: 42. Na bhuñjamānā sabbahatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1127_0: 43. Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1152_0: 55. Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1154_0: 56. Na sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1156_0: 57. Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1158_0: 58. Na daṇḍapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1160_0: 59. Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1162_0: 60. Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1165_0: 61. Na pādukāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1167_0: 62. Na upāhanāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1169_0: 63. Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1171_0: 64. Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1173_0: 65. Na pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1175_0: 66. Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1177_0: 67. Na oguṇṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1179_0: 68. Na chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1181_0: 69. Na nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1183_0: 70. Na ṭhitā nisinnassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1185_0: 71. Na pacchato gacchantī purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1187_0: 72. Na uppathena gacchantī pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1189_0: 73. Na ṭhitā agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1191_0: 74. Na harite agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1193_0: 75. Na udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā.
tika-vin04t:1200_0: Uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1207_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā.
tika-vin04t:1216_1: ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin04t:1216_2: tattha sabbāheva samaggāhi sammodamānāhi avivadamānāhi sikkhitabbanti.
tika-vin04t:1235_0: Tattha pātimokkhanti paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ atiseṭṭhaṃ atiuttamanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1235_1: Iti iminā vacanatthena ekavidhampi sīlaganthabhedato duvidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1235_2: Tathā hi “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti ca “ādimetaṃ mukhametaṃ pamukhametaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1235_3: tena vuccati pātimokkha”nti ca ādīsu sīlaṃ pātimokkhanti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1235_4: “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni hontī”tiādīsu gantho pātimokkhanti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1235_5: Tattha sīlaṃ yo naṃ pāti rakkhati,
tika-vin04t:1235_8: Gantho pana tassa pātimokkhassa jotakattā pātimokkhanti vuccati.
tika-vin04t:1235_9: Ādimhi pana vutto vacanattho ubhinnampi sādhāraṇo hoti.
tika-vin04t:1236_1: ganthe hi vaṇṇite tassa attho vaṇṇitova hoti.
tika-vin04t:1236_2: Taṃ panetaṃ ganthapātimokkhaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhaṃ bhikkhunipātimokkhanti duvidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1236_7: Tattha bhikkhupātimokkhe pañca uddesā nāma nidānuddeso,
tika-vin04t:1236_23: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādinā nayena avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho hoti.
tika-vin04t:1236_24: Pārājikuddesādīnaṃ paricchedā nidānassa ādito paṭṭhāya pārājikādīni osāpetvā yojetabbā.
tika-vin04t:1236_26: “Avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabba”nti vacanato pana pārājikuddesādīsu yasmiṃ vippakate antarāyo uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:1236_28: Nidānuddese pana aniṭṭhite sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin04t:1236_31: Evametesaṃ pañcahi ceva catūhi ca uddesaparicchedehi vavatthitānaṃ dvinnampi pātimokkhānaṃ ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissati.
tika-vin04t:1239_6: Bhagavatā hi pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena rājagahe vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1239_12: Saṅghatthero vā hi pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya “therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”ntivacanato,
tika-vin04t:1240_0: “Saṅgho”tiiminā pana padena kiñcāpi avisesato puggalasamūho vutto,
tika-vin04t:1240_8: Tattha catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadapavāraṇaabbhānāni sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1240_9: Pañcavaggena ṭhapetvā majjhimesu janapadesu upasampadañca abbhānakammañca sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1240_10: Dasavaggena abbhānakammamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1240_11: Vīsativaggena na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1240_12: tathā atirekavīsativaggena.So pana catuvaggādinā saṅghena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ūnakatarena kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1240_14: Imasmiṃ panatthe catuvaggaṃ upādāya sabbopi sammutisaṅgho adhippeto.
tika-vin04t:1241_3: Divasavasena hi tayo uposathā cātuddasiko pannarasiko sāmaggiuposathoti,
tika-vin04t:1241_5: Tattha hemantagimhavassānānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ tatiyasattamapakkhesu dve dve katvā cha cātuddasikā,
tika-vin04t:1241_6: avasesā aṭṭhārasa pannarasikāti evaṃ ekasaṃvacchare catuvīsati uposathā,
tika-vin04t:1241_10: sakiṃ pakkhassa cātuddase vā pannarase vā pātimokkhaṃ uddisitu”nti vacanato pana “āgantukehi āvāsikānaṃ
tika-vin04t:1241_11: anuvattitabba”ntiādivacanato ca tathārūpapaccaye sati aññasmimpi cātuddase uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1241_13: tesaṃyeva sace bhaṇḍanakārakehi upaddutā pavāraṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanti,
tika-vin04t:1241_16: pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhānañca pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā evāti ime tayo pavāraṇādivasāpi honti,
tika-vin04t:1241_18: Tathārūpapaccaye pana sati dvinnaṃ kattikapuṇṇamānaṃ purimesu cātuddasesupi pavāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1241_19: Yadā pana kosambakakkhandhake āgatanayena bhinne saṅghe osārite tasmiṃ bhikkhusmiṃ saṅgho tassa vatthussa vūpasamāya saṅghassa sāmaggiṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1241_22: aññopi yo koci divaso sāmaggiuposathadivaso nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1241_23: purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ pana kattikamāsabbhantare ayameva sāmaggipavāraṇādivaso nāma hoti.
tika-vin04t:1241_24: Iti imesu tīsu divasesu “pannaraso”tiiminā aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin04t:1242_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallanti ettha patto kālo imassa kammassāti pattakālaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1245_0: Vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti,
tika-vin04t:1247_1: Tasmiñhi sati idaṃ saṅghassa uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati.
tika-vin04t:1248_0: Yāvatikā ca bhikkhū kammappattāti yattakā bhikkhū tassa uposathakammassa pattā yuttā anurūpā,
tika-vin04t:1248_2: te ca kho hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā.
tika-vin04t:1249_0: Sīmā ca nāmesā baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti duvidhā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1249_1: Tattha ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā sammatā sīmā baddhasīmā nāma,
tika-vin04t:1249_11: sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā”ti imā hi “ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti vacanato ekādasa vipattisīmāyo nāma.
tika-vin04t:1249_12: Tattha atikhuddakā nāma yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-vin04t:1249_13: Atimahatī nāma yā antamaso kesaggamattenāpi tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_15: puratthimāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā puna
tika-vin04t:1249_16: puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ paṭikittetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1249_18: Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti,
tika-vin04t:1249_20: Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ tacasārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjavālukapuñjānaṃ vā aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_21: Chāyānimittā nāma pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_22: Animittā nāma sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_23: Bahisīme ṭhitasammatā nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahiṭhitena sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_24: Nadiyā samudde jātassare sammatā nāma etesu nadiādīsu sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_29: sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti.
tika-vin04t:1249_30: Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_31: Sace hi porāṇakassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya ambo ceva jambū cāti dve rukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā honti,
tika-vin04t:1249_33: vihārasīmā ca jambuṃ anto katvā ambaṃ kittetvā baddhā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1249_34: atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya vihāre kate sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū taṃ ambaṃ anto katvā jambuṃ kittetvā bandhanti,
tika-vin04t:1249_36: Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1249_37: Sace hi paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā tassā padesaṃ vā anto katvā attano sīmaṃ sammannati,
tika-vin04t:1249_39: Iti imā ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1250_0: Tividhasampattiyuttāti nimittasampattiyā parisāsampattiyā kammavācāsampattiyā ca yuttā.
tika-vin04t:1250_8: udakanimittanti evaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittāni “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ, pabbato, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1250_9: eso pabbato nimitta”ntiādinā nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1250_11: suddhapaṃsusuddhapāsāṇaubhayamissakavasena hi tividhopi pabbato hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ nimittupago,
tika-vin04t:1250_14: tasmā yo koci pāsāṇo ukkaṃsavasena hatthippamāṇato omakataraṃ ādiṃ katvā heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍaparimāṇo nimittupago,
tika-vin04t:1250_17: Vananimitte antosārehi vā antosāramissakehi vā rukkhehi catupañcarukkhamattampi vanaṃ nimittupagaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1250_23: Maggo jaṅghamaggo vā hotu sakaṭamaggo vā,
tika-vin04t:1250_24: yo vinivijjhitvā dve tīṇi gāmakhettāni gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1250_27: Vammiko pana heṭṭhimaparicchedena taṃdivasaṃjāto aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho govisāṇamattopi vammiko nimittupago,
tika-vin04t:1250_33: taṃ ādiṃ katvā antamaso taṅkhaṇeyeva pathaviyaṃ khaṇite āvāṭake ghaṭehi āharitvā pūritampi yāva kammavācāpariyosānā saṇṭhamānakaṃ nimittupagaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1250_34: itaraṃ sandamānaṃ vā vuttaparicchedakālaṃ atiṭṭhantaṃ vā bhājanagataṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin04t:1251_0: Parisāsampattiyā yuttā nāma sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi sannipatitvā yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette
tika-vin04t:1251_1: baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvā ṭhitā bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:1251_2: te sabbe hatthapāse vā katvā chandaṃ vā āharitvā sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1252_0: Kammavācāsampattiyā yuttā nāma “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1252_1: yāvatā samantā nimittā kittitā”tiādinā nayena vuttāya parisuddhāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammatā.
tika-vin04t:1252_2: Evaṃ ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā sammatā sīmā “baddhasīmā”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1253_5: Agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā sattabbhantarasīmā nāma.
tika-vin04t:1253_6: Tattha agāmakaṃ nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭaviādīsu vā samuddamajjhe vā macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathesu dīpakesu labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1253_7: Samantā sattabbhantarāti majjhe ṭhitānaṃ sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarā vinibbedhena cuddasa honti.
tika-vin04t:1253_10: tasmā samantā parisāpariyantato paṭṭhāya abbhantaraparicchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1253_11: Sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃ uposathaṃ karonti,
