tika-vin04t:1457_32: Sace hi chiddassa abbhantare ekatantupi acchinno hoti,
tika-vin04t:1457_34: Tattha saṅghāṭiyā ca uttarāsaṅgassa ca dīghantato vidatthippamāṇassa tiriyantato aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇassa padesassa orato chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhindati,
tika-vin04t:1457_38: tasmā chidde jāte ticīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1457_44: Kevalañhi imasmiṃ okāse yaṃ evaṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitañca,
tika-vin04t:1458_0: Taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti taṃ yathāvuttajātippamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃdasāhaparamaṃ kālaṃ atikkāmayato etthantare yathā atirekacīvaraṃ na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1458_8: Taṃ atikkāmayato saha nissaggiyena nissaggiyavinayakammaṃ pācittiyaṃ hotīti ayamettha attho.
tika-vin04t:1458_9: Tañca panetaṃ cīvaraṃ yaṃ divasaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1458_12: tasmā cīvaruppādadivasena saddhiṃ ekādase aruṇuggamane dasāhātikkamitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1458_13: taṃ gahetvā saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1458_15: saṅghassa tāva evaṃ nissajjitabbaṃ “idaṃ me, bhante,
tika-vin04t:1458_24: Nissajjanepi sace dve vā bahūni vā honti,
tika-vin04t:1458_29: Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:1458_30: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti,
tika-vin04t:1458_37: Dvīsu pana sambahulāsu vā purimanayeneva vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1458_39: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1458_41: saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti evaṃ nissaṭṭhacīvaraṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_0: Gaṇassa pana nissajjantena “imāha”nti vā “imāni aha”nti vā vatvā “āyasmantānaṃ nissajjāmī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_2: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati…pe… deseti,
tika-vin04t:1459_5: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ āyasmantānaṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_7: āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu”nti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_9: Puggalassa pana nissajjantena “imāha”nti vā “imāni aha”nti vā vatvā “āyasmato nissajjāmī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_16: bhante”ti vā “āma āvuso”ti vā vatvā “passāmī”ti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_17: tato “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti vā “saṃvareyyāthā”ti vā vutte “sādhu suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1459_18: Evaṃ desitāya āpattiyā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_19: dvīsu tīsu vā pubbe vuttānusāreneva nayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1459_22: tato āpattippaṭiggahaṇañca nissaṭṭhacīvaradānañca tesaṃ aññatarena yathā ekena puggalena,
tika-vin04t:1459_25: Cīvaraṃ patto nisīdananti vatthumattameva hi nānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_30: Nissaṭṭhavatthuṃ “dinnamidaṃ iminā mayha”nti saññāya na paṭidentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1459_31: tassa santakabhāvaṃ ñatvā lesena acchindanto sāmikassa dhuranikkhepena bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabboti.
tika-vin04t:1460_0: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha atirekacīvaradhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1460_8: Dasāhaṃ anatikkantepi atikkantasaññino vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1460_11: Antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭhite vikappite vissajjite naṭṭhe vinaṭṭhe daḍḍhe acchinne vissāsena gāhite ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1460_15: ubhatopātimokkhesupi hi pārājikāni ca saṅghādisesā ca sīlavipatti,
tika-vin04t:1460_17: ājīvavipatti vā diṭṭhivipatti vā kāci āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin04t:1460_18: Ājīvavipattipaccayā pana ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ cha āpattikkhandhā paññattā,
tika-vin04t:1463_0: Dutiye niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunātiettha purimasikkhāpade viya atthaṃ aggahetvā niṭṭhite cīvarasmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1463_1: bhikkhunoti evaṃ sāmivasena karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1463_2: Karaṇavasena hi bhikkhunā idaṃ nāma kammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1463_4: sāmivasena pana bhikkhuno cīvarasmiṃ niṭṭhite kathine ca ubbhate evaṃ imehi cīvaraniṭṭhānakathinubbhārehi
tika-vin04t:1463_5: chinnapalibodho ekarattampi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyyāti evaṃ attho yujjati.
tika-vin04t:1463_6: Tattha ticīvarenāti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena adhiṭṭhitesu saṅghāṭiādīsu yenakenaci.
tika-vin04t:1463_9: pannarasānaṃ nikkhepaṭṭhānānaṃ yatthakatthaci nikkhipitvā tesaṃ gāmādīnaṃ bahi hatthapāsātikkamena aruṇaṃ
tika-vin04t:1463_12: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno ticīvarena avippavāsasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1463_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa bhikkhuno ekarattampi vippavāsato vuttanayeneva nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1463_15: cīvaraṃ rattivippavutthaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiya”ntiādinā nayena vacanabhedo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1464_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1465_4: avippavutthe vippavutthasaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1465_5: Vippavutthe vippavutthasaññinopi avippavutthasaññinopi vematikassāpi nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1465_7: Antoaruṇe paccuddhaṭe pana paṭhamakathine vuttavissajjitādibhede ca anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:1465_11: athāpissa puna so vā añño vā ābādho kuppati,
tika-vin04t:1468_0: Tatiye niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti sāmivaseneva karaṇattho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1468_1: Akālacīvaraṃ nāma yvāyaṃ “anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin04t:1468_5: puggalassa vā “idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”tiādinā nayena dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1468_7: Uppajjeyyāti evarūpaṃ cīvaraṃ attano bhāgapaṭilābhavasena saṅghato vā suttantikādigaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā paṃsukūlaṃ vā attano vā dhanena,
tika-vin04t:1468_17: puggalassa detī”ti imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarato uppajjeyya.
tika-vin04t:1468_18: Ettha ca “sīmāya dammī”ti evaṃ sīmaṃ parāmasitvā dento sīmāya deti nāma,
tika-vin04t:1468_20: Ettha ca sīmāti khaṇḍasīmā upacārasīmā samānasaṃvāsasīmā avippavāsasīmā lābhasīmā gāmasīmā nigamasīmā
tika-vin04t:1468_21: nagarasīmā abbhantarasīmā udakukkhepasīmā janapadasīmā raṭṭhasīmā rajjasīmā dīpasīmā cakkavāḷasīmāti
tika-vin04t:1468_23: Tattha upacārasīmā nāma parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepena,
tika-vin04t:1468_25: Api ca bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato vā pariyante ṭhitabhojanasālato vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vā
tika-vin04t:1468_26: thāmamajjhimassa purisassa dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ anto “upacārasīmā”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1468_32: idampi sabbaṃ imissāva sīmāya vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1468_33: Lābhasīmāti yaṃ rājarājamahāmattādayo vihāraṃ kārāpetvā gāvutaṃ vā addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā samantā
tika-vin04t:1468_36: taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ vihārassa demā”ti ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:1468_38: Kāsikosalādīnaṃ pana raṭṭhānaṃ anto bahū janapadā honti,
tika-vin04t:1468_42: samuddantena paricchinno mahādīpo vā antaradīpo vā dīpasīmā,
tika-vin04t:1468_47: “Upacārasīmāya demā”ti dinnaṃ pana antoparicchede khaṇḍasīmāsīmantarikāsu ṭhitānampi pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1468_50: gāmasīmādīsu dinnaṃ tāsaṃ sīmānaṃ abbhantare baddhasīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1468_52: janapadasīmādīsu dinnampi tāsaṃ abbhantare baddhasīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1468_53: tasmā yaṃ jambudīpe ṭhatvā “tambapaṇṇidīpe saṅghassa demā”ti dīyati,
tika-vin04t:1468_54: taṃ tambapaṇṇidīpato ekopi gantvā sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1468_55: Sacepi tattheva eko sabhāgo bhikkhu sabhāgānaṃ bhāgaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1468_57: Yo pana vihāraṃ pavisitvā “asukasīmāyā”ti avatvāva kevalaṃ “sīmāya dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin04t:1469_2: ekasmiṃ vihāre sannipatitehi bhikkhūhi yaṃ vihāraṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmā samānalābhaṃ kātuṃ icchanti,
tika-vin04t:1469_3: tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā “asuko nāma vihāro porāṇako appalābho”ti yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ vatvā “taṃ vihāraṃ iminā
tika-vin04t:1469_4: vihārena saddhiṃ ekalābhaṃ kātuṃ saṅghassa ruccatī”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1469_5: ettāvatā tasmiṃ vihāre nisinnopi idha nisinnova hoti,
tika-vin04t:1469_7: ettāvatā idha nisinnopi tasmiṃ nisinnova hoti.
tika-vin04t:1469_8: Ekasmiṃ vihāre lābhe bhājiyamāne itarasmiṃ ṭhitassa bhāgaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1470_0: Bhikkhāpaññattiyāti ettha bhikkhāpaññatti nāma dāyakassa pariccāgapaññattiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1470_2: tattha dammī”ti vā “tattha dethā”ti vā vutte yattha tassa pākavattaṃ vā vattati,
tika-vin04t:1470_4: yattha vā tena kiñci senāsanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1470_6: Sace pana ekasmiṃ dhuvakāraṭṭhāne thokatarā bhikkhū honti,
tika-vin04t:1471_0: Saṅghassa detīti ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnaṃ upacārasīmāgatānañca tato bahiddhāpi tehi saddhiṃ ekābaddhānañca pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin04t:1471_1: tasmā tesaṃ gāhake sati asampattānampi bhāgo dātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1471_2: Yaṃ pana bahi upacārasīmāya bhikkhū disvā “saṅghassā”ti dīyati,
tika-vin04t:1471_4: Ye pana dvādasahi hatthehi parisaṃ asampattā,
tika-vin04t:1472_0: Ubhatosaṅghassāti ettha pana yaṃ ubhatosaṅghassa dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1472_6: “Ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vutte pana sace dasa bhikkhū ca dasa bhikkhuniyo ca honti,
tika-vin04t:1472_7: ekavīsati paṭivīse katvā eko puggalassa dātabbo,
tika-vin04t:1472_11: so saṅghatopi attano vassaggena gahetuṃ labhati, kasmā?
tika-vin04t:1472_13: “ubhatosaṅghassa ca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1472_14: Idha pana cetiyassa saṅghato pāpuṇakoṭṭhāso nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:1472_16: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañcā”ti vutte pana na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1472_17: bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1472_18: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañcā”ti vutte puggalo visuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin04t:1472_20: “Cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa eko puggalapaṭivīso labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1472_21: “Bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañcā”ti vuttepi na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1472_24: yathā ca bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādiṃ katvā nayo nīto,
tika-vin04t:1472_26: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañcā”ti vuttepi puggalassa visuṃ na labbhati,
tika-vin04t:1473_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassāti ettha sace vihāraṃ pavisitvā “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin04t:1474_0: Ādissa detīti ādisitvā paricchinditvā deti, kathaṃ?
tika-vin04t:1474_1: Bhikkhū ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā yāguyā nimantetvā te ghare yāguṃ pāyetvā “imāni cīvarāni yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītā,
tika-vin04t:1475_0: Puggalassa detīti “idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa dammī”ti evaṃ parammukhā vā,
tika-vin04t:1475_1: pādamūle ṭhapetvā “idaṃ tumhāka”nti evaṃ sammukhā vā detīti ayamettha saṅkhepakathā,
tika-vin04t:1475_3: Iti imāsaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mātikāpadānaṃ vasena yaṃ akālacīvaralakkhaṇena paṭiladdhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1476_2: No cassa pāripūrīti no ce pāripūrī bhaveyya,
tika-vin04t:1476_6: Satiyā paccāsāyāti “asukadivasaṃ nāma saṅgho cīvarāni labhissati,
tika-vin04t:1476_7: tato me cīvaraṃ uppajjissatī”tiiminā nayena saṅghagaṇañātimittesu vā aññataraṭṭhānato,
tika-vin04t:1476_9: “iminā vā kappiyabhaṇḍena cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ vijjamānāya cīvarāsāya.
tika-vin04t:1476_10: Tato ce uttarīti māsaparamato ce uttari nikkhipeyya,
tika-vin04t:1476_18: aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvā eva kālabbhantare kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1476_23: mūlacīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā paccāsācīvarameva mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1476_26: tāva aññaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ labbhati.
tika-vin04t:1476_28: akālacīvaraṃ māsātikkantaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1477_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1481_1: mātito vā pitito vā yāva sattamaṃ yugaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1481_3: Bhikkhuniyāti sākiyāniyo viya suddhabhikkhusaṅghe vā ubhatosaṅghe vā upasampannāya.
tika-vin04t:1481_4: Purāṇacīvaranti rajitvā kappaṃ katvā ekavārampi nivatthaṃ vā pārutaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1481_5: yaṃ antamaso paribhogasīsena aṃse vā matthake vā katvā maggaṃ gato hoti,
tika-vin04t:1481_12: antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari vā khipati,
tika-vin04t:1481_17: Sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā upāsikāya vā hatthe dhovanatthāya deti,
tika-vin04t:1481_20: Upāsakassa vā sāmaṇerassa vā hatthe dinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1481_21: so ce liṅge parivatte upasampajjitvā dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1481_26: purāṇacīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā dhovāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā panettha nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1482_3: evaṃ āṇattāya ca bhikkhuniyā uddhanasajjanādīsu sabbappayogesu bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1482_4: Dhovitvā ukkhittamattaṃ pana rattamattaṃ ākoṭitamattañca nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1482_5: dhovanādīni tīṇipi dve vā kārāpentassa ekena vatthunā nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1482_10: taṃ karohī”ti vadato pana ekavācāya pācittiyena saddhiṃ dve dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:1482_12: aññassa vā santakaṃ nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṃ vā dhovāpentassa,
tika-vin04t:1482_16: Ito paraṃ pana evarūpesu ṭhānesu “tikapācittiya”nti vakkhāma,
tika-vin04t:1482_17: sace ñātikāya sahāyā aññātikā “dhovā”ti avuttā vā dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1482_18: aparibhuttaṃ vā aññaṃ vā parikkhāraṃ dhovati,
tika-vin04t:1482_23: tassā dhovanādīni cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1485_1: tasmā ito paraṃ katthaci na vicārayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1485_8: dhammakathaṃ kathentassa vatthesu khipiyamānesu upacāraṃ muñcitvāpi upari vā khipatu,
tika-vin04t:1485_11: Yassa kassaci pana anupasampannassa hatthe pesitaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1485_12: “paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti saṅkārakūṭādīsu ṭhapitampi paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1485_13: Aññatra pārivattakāti yaṃ “antamaso harīṭakakkhaṇḍampi datvā vā dassāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā vā pārivattakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1485_14: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso vikappanupagaṃ paṭaparissāvanampi gaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1485_16: cīvaraṃ aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato paṭiggahitaṃ aññatra pārivattakā nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1486_8: ekatoupasampannāya ñātikāya ca aññātikasaññissa vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1486_16: aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1489_4: Aññatra samayāti yo acchinnacīvaro vā hoti naṭṭhacīvaro vā,
tika-vin04t:1489_5: tassa taṃ samayaṃ ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ viññāpanappayoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1489_8: cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ aññatra samayā viññāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1490_13: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1493_0: Sattame tañceti taṃ acchinnacīvaraṃ vā naṭṭhacīvaraṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1493_8: yathā vā “nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato”ti ettha disvāti attho,
tika-vin04t:1493_9: evamidhāpi “abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyā”ti upanetvā purato ṭhapento kāyena vā,
tika-vin04t:1493_11: tattakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanto vācāya vā abhiharitvā nimanteyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1493_12: Santaruttaraparamanti saantaraṃ uttaraṃ paramaṃ assa cīvarassāti santaruttaraparamaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1493_13: nivāsanena saddhiṃ pārupanaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1493_14: Tato cīvaraṃ sāditabbanti tato abhihaṭacīvarato ettakaṃ cīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1494_3: ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā aññaṃ sabhāgaṭṭhānato pariyesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1494_16: Bhikkhuniyā pana pañcasu naṭṭhesu dve sāditabbāni,
tika-vin04t:1494_19: ko pana vādo dvīsu vā ekasmiṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1494_24: cīvaraṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ tatuttari viññāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1495_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bahucīvaraviññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1495_5: Dve cīvarāni katvā “sesakaṃ āharissāmī”ti vatvā gaṇhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1495_14: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1498_0: Aṭṭhame bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissāti “itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmī”ti evaṃ apadisitvā.
tika-vin04t:1498_7: itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dassāmīti ayaṃ panettha attho.
tika-vin04t:1498_8: Tatra ce soti yatra so gahapati vā gahapatānī vā,
tika-vin04t:1498_9: tatra so bhikkhu pubbe appavārito upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjeyya ceti ayamettha padasambandho.
tika-vin04t:1498_17: Evarūpaṃ vā evarūpaṃ vāti āyatādīsu aññataraṃ.
tika-vin04t:1498_18: Kalyāṇakamyataṃ upādāyāti sundarakāmataṃ visiṭṭhakāmataṃ cittena gahetvā,
tika-vin04t:1498_20: sace pana evarūpaṃ āpajjantassa tassa vacanena yo paṭhamaṃ adhippetato mūlaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sundarataraṃ cetāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1498_24: cīvaraṃ pubbe appavāritaṃ aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1499_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1499_6: eteneva mūlena “aññaṃ evarūpaṃ vā dehī”ti vadantassa,
tika-vin04t:1499_12: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1502_7: evaṃ bahūnaṃ pīḷaṃ katvā gaṇhatopi āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:1502_9: cīvaraṃ pubbe appavārite aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā vikappaṃ āpannaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena vacanabhedo ñātabboti.
tika-vin04t:1505_0: Dasame rājabhoggoti rājato bhoggaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ assa atthīti rājabhoggo,
tika-vin04t:1505_6: Sace hi “idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti peseyya,
tika-vin04t:1505_7: āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyya.
tika-vin04t:1505_9: Na kho mayantiādi idaṃ kappiyavasena ābhatampi cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1505_11: Suvaṇṇaṃ rajataṃ kahāpaṇo māsakoti imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni,
tika-vin04t:1505_12: muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅko masāragallaṃ satta dhaññāni dāsidāsakhettavatthupupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti
tika-vin04t:1505_13: imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1505_14: tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “na kho maya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1506_0: Cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti idaṃ pana attānaṃ uddissa ābhatattā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1506_6: Niddisitabbotiidaṃ “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1506_7: Sace pana dūto “ko imaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vā “kassa demī”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin04t:1506_9: Ārāmiko vā upāsako vātiidaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1506_10: ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati. Eso kho,
tika-vin04t:1506_14: Saññatto so mayāti āṇatto so mayā,
tika-vin04t:1506_15: yathā tumhākaṃ cīvarena atthe sati cīvaraṃ dassati,
tika-vin04t:1506_17: Dūtena hi evaṃ ārociteyeva taṃ codetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1506_19: Sace pana “ayaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti sammukhā niddiṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin04t:1506_20: dūto ca sammukhā eva tassa hatthe cetāpannaṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1506_21: evaṃ “saññatto so mayā”ti avuttepi codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1506_22: Sace pana dūto gacchantova “ahaṃ tassa hatthe dassāmi,
tika-vin04t:1506_23: tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti bhikkhuno vatvā vā gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1506_28: tasmimpi idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Attho me, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:1506_31: idaṃ vā vacanaṃ yāya kāyaci bhāsāya etassa attho vā vattabbo, “dehi me,
tika-vin04t:1506_32: āhara me”tiādinā nayena pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1506_33: Abhinipphādeyyāti evaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā tikkhattuṃ codayamāno paṭilābhavasena sādheyya.
tika-vin04t:1507_1: Chakkhattuparamañhi tena cīvaraṃ uddissa tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1507_11: Ettha ca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena tissannaṃ codanānaṃ channañca ṭhānānaṃ anuññātattā codanāya diguṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ anuññātaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1507_20: Tattha yo ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā chakkhattuṃ codeti,
tika-vin04t:1507_23: tathā ekadivasameva punappunaṃ gantvā dvādasakkhattuṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1507_24: sakiṃyeva vā gantvā tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1507_26: ko pana vādo nānādivasesu evaṃ karontassāti ayamettha vinicchayo.
tika-vin04t:1507_27: Ye pana kappiyakārake dāyako sayameva gantvā nisīdati te satakkhattumpi codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1507_28: Yo pana ubhohi pi aniddiṭṭho mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako ca parammukhakappiyakārako ca,
tika-vin04t:1507_30: evaṃ idha dasapi kappiyakārakā dassitā honti.
tika-vin04t:1508_4: cīvaraṃ atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena abhinipphāditaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1508_5: Yatassa cīvaracetāpannaṃ ābhatanti yato rājato vā rājabhoggato vā assa bhikkhuno cīvaracetāpannaṃ ānītaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1508_8: Tatthāti tassa rañño vā rājabhoggassa vā santikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1508_10: Na taṃ tassa bhikkhuno kiñci atthaṃ anubhotīti taṃ cetāpannaṃ tassa bhikkhuno appamattakampi kammaṃ na nipphādeti.
tika-vin04t:1508_11: Yuñjantāyasmanto sakanti āyasmanto attano santakaṃ dhanaṃ pāpuṇantu.
tika-vin04t:1508_12: Mā vo sakaṃ vinassāti tumhākaṃ santakaṃ mā vinassatu.
tika-vin04t:1508_13: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti ayaṃ tattha anudhammatā lokuttaradhammaṃ anugatā,
tika-vin04t:1508_15: tasmā evaṃ akaronto vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1509_6: ūnakesu codanāṭhānesu atirekasaññino vematikassa vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1509_13: tena vāyāmena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1514_0: Eḷakalomavaggassa paṭhame kosiyamissakanti ekenāpi kosiyaṃsunā antamaso tassa karaṇaṭṭhāne vātavegena nipātitenāpi missīkataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1514_1: Santhatanti same bhūmibhāge kosiyaṃsūni uparūpari santharitvā kañjiyādīhi siñcitvā kattabbatālakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1514_5: kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1514_6: imasseva vacanassa anusārena ito paraṃ sabbasanthataṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1514_7: Sakkā hi ettāvatā jānitunti na taṃ ito paraṃ dassayissāma.
tika-vin04t:1515_0: Āḷaviyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1515_4: aññassatthāya karaṇakārāpanesu aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjane ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1518_0: Dutiye suddhakāḷakānanti suddhānaṃ kāḷakānaṃ aññehi amissīkatānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1518_1: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tādisaṃ santhataṃ karaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1521_5: tesu tulayitvā dve koṭṭhāsā kāḷakānaṃ gahetabbā,
tika-vin04t:1522_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha tādisaṃ santhataṃ karaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1522_3: Imāni pana tīṇi nissajjitvā paṭiladdhānipi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin04t:1525_0: Catutthe orena ce channaṃ vassānanti channaṃ vassānaṃ orimabhāge,
tika-vin04t:1525_2: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno santhatasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1525_3: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa chabbassabbhantare aññaṃ santhataṃ karontassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1526_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1529_0: Pañcame purāṇasanthataṃ nāma yattha sakimpi nisinno vā hoti nipanno vā.
tika-vin04t:1529_1: Samantāti ekapassato vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā chinditvā gahitaṭṭhānaṃ yathā vidatthimattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1530_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santhatavissajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1533_2: yattha katthaci pana dhammena labhitvā gaṇhato doso natthi.
tika-vin04t:1533_9: Attanā pana antamaso vātābādhappaṭikāratthaṃ suttakena abandhitvā kaṇṇacchidde pakkhittānipi ādāya tiyojanaṃ ekaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1534_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha tiyojanātikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1534_7: acchinnaṃ vā nissaṭṭhaṃ vā paṭilabhitvā haraṇe,
tika-vin04t:1534_13: attanā ādāya vā aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvā vā tiyojanātikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1537_0: Sattame sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha eḷakalomadhovāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1537_1: Tattha purāṇacīvaradhovāpane vuttanayeneva sabbopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1540_1: apica kahāpaṇo lohamāsakadārumāsakajatumāsakādayopi ye vohāraṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin04t:1540_3: Uggaṇheyya vāti attano atthāya diyyamānaṃ vā yatthakatthaci ṭhitaṃ vā nippariggahitaṃ disvā sayaṃ gaṇheyya vā.
tika-vin04t:1540_4: Uggaṇhāpeyya vāti tadeva aññena gāhāpeyya vā.
tika-vin04t:1540_5: Upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyyāti “idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā,
tika-vin04t:1540_7: taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ parammukhā ṭhitaṃ vā kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattaṃ
tika-vin04t:1540_12: kāyena vā vācāya vā “nayidaṃ kappatī”ti paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1540_13: kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā suddhacitto hutvā “nayidaṃ amhākaṃ kappatī”ti na sādiyati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1540_14: Nissaggiyanti uggahaṇādīsu yaṃkiñci karontassa aghanabaddhesu vatthūsu vatthugaṇanāya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1540_18: imāhaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti evaṃ saṅghamajjheyeva nissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1540_21: “Iminā kiṃ āhariyyatū”ti bhaṇante pana “idaṃ nāmā”ti avatvā “sappiādīni bhikkhūnaṃ kappantī”ti evaṃ kappiyaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1540_25: taṃ aññena labhitvā diyyamānampi antamaso tato nibbattarukkhacchāyāpi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1540_26: Sace pana so kiñci āharituṃ na icchati,
tika-vin04t:1540_33: Tena animittaṃ katvāva gūthaṃ viya chaṭṭetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1544_6: Nissaggiyavatthunā pana nissaggiyavatthuṃ vā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1544_7: dukkaṭavatthukappiyavatthūhi ca nissaggiyavatthuṃ parivattentassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1545_4: tassa vā dhanassa vā rūpiyabhāvo ceva,
tika-vin04t:1548_0: Dasame nānappakārakanti cīvarādīnaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍānaṃ vasena anekavidhaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1548_5: cetāpehī”ti iminā hi nayena parassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanto kayaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-vin04t:1548_7: Tasmā ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike yaṃ evaṃ attano kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ datvā mātu santakampi kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1548_10: “imaṃ bhuñjitvā vā gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma āhara vā karohi vā”ti rajanādiṃ āharāpetvā vā dhamakaraṇādiparikkhāraṃ
tika-vin04t:1548_11: bhūmisodhanādiñca navakammaṃ kāretvā vā santaṃ vatthu nissajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1549_3: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ antamaso tasseva puttabhātukampi kappiyakārakaṃ katvā “iminā idaṃ nāma gahetvā dehī”ti ācikkhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1549_5: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti evaṃ vatvā attano dhanena laddhaṃ gaṇhantassa,
tika-vin04t:1554_0: Pattavaggassa paṭhame atirekapattoti anadhiṭṭhito ca avikappito ca,
tika-vin04t:1554_1: so ca kho ukkaṭṭhamajjhimomakānaṃ aññataro pamāṇayuttova,
tika-vin04t:1554_2: tassa pamāṇaṃ “aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhātī”tiādinā (pārā 602) nayena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1554_4: anupahatapurāṇasālitaṇḍulānaṃ sukoṭṭitaparisuddhānaṃ dve magadhanāḷiyo gahetvā tehi taṇḍulehi anuttaṇḍulamakilinnamapiṇḍikaṃ
tika-vin04t:1554_5: suvisadaṃ kundamakuḷarāsisadisaṃ avassāvitodanaṃ pacitvā niravasesaṃ patte pakkhipitvā tassa odanassa
tika-vin04t:1554_6: catutthabhāgappamāṇo nātighano nātitanuko hatthahāriyo sabbasambhārasaṅkhato muggasūpo pakkhipitabbo,
tika-vin04t:1554_7: tato ālopassa anurūpaṃ yāvacarimālopappahonakaṃ macchamaṃsādibyañjanaṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1554_12: evametaṃ sabbampi pakkhittaṃ sace pattassa mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1554_13: suttena vā hīrena vā chindantassa suttassa vā hīrassa vā heṭṭhimantaṃ phusati,
tika-vin04t:1554_15: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1554_23: Iccetesu navasu ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho ca omakomako cāti dve apattā,
tika-vin04t:1554_27: tasmā evaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ samaṇasāruppena pakkaṃ ayopattaṃ vā mattikāpattaṃ vā labhitvā purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbo.
tika-vin04t:1554_28: Sace panassa mūlato kākaṇikamattampi dātabbaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1554_33: Sace pana koci apattako bhikkhu dasa patte labhitvā sabbe attanāva paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1554_34: ekaṃ pattaṃ adhiṭṭhāya puna divase taṃ paccuddharitvā añño adhiṭṭhātabbo,
tika-vin04t:1554_36: Yo panassa patto mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato paṭṭhāya yatthakatthaci kaṅgusitthanikkhamanamattena chiddena chiddo hoti,
tika-vin04t:1558_0: Dutiye ūnāni pañca bandhanāni assāti ūnapañcabandhano,
tika-vin04t:1558_4: Tattha yasmā abandhanassāpi pañca bandhanāni na pūrenti sabbaso natthitāya,
tika-vin04t:1558_5: tenassa padabhājane “ūnapañcabandhano nāma patto abandhano vā ekabandhano vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1558_6: “Ūnapañcabandhanenā”ti ca vuttattā yassa pañcabandhano patto hoti pañcabandhanokāso vā,
tika-vin04t:1558_9: Yasmiṃ pana patte mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā bhaṭṭhā dvaṅgulappamāṇā ekāpi rāji hoti,
tika-vin04t:1558_10: taṃ tassā rājiyā heṭṭhimapariyante pattavedhakena vijjhitvā pacitvā suttarajjukamakacirajjukādīhi vā
tika-vin04t:1558_11: tipusuttakena vā bandhitvā taṃ bandhanaṃ āmisassa alagganatthaṃ tipupaṭṭakena vā kenaci baddhasilesādinā
tika-vin04t:1558_16: Yassa pana dve rājiyo vā ekāyeva vā caturaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1558_18: Yassa tisso vā ekāyeva vā chaḷaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1558_20: Yassa catasso vā ekāyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1558_22: Yassa pañca vā ekāyeva vā dasaṅgulā,
tika-vin04t:1559_0: Ayopatte pana sacepi pañca vā atirekāni vā chiddāni honti,
tika-vin04t:1559_1: tāni ce ayacuṇṇena vā āṇiyā vā lohamaṇḍalena vā baddhāni maṭṭhāni honti,
tika-vin04t:1559_4: Atha pana ekampi chiddaṃ mahantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1559_9: Yo pana evaṃ pattasaṅkhepagate vā ayopatte,
tika-vin04t:1559_10: ūnapañcabandhane vā mattikāpatte sati aññaṃ viññāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1559_16: Yo ca tassā bhikkhuparisāyātiettha tehi bhikkhūhi pakatiyā eva attano attano adhiṭṭhitaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā sannipatitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1559_17: tato sammatena pattaggāhāpakena pattassa vijjamānaguṇaṃ vatvā “bhante,
tika-vin04t:1559_19: Sace therassa so patto na ruccati,
tika-vin04t:1559_23: therassa pattaṃ dutiyattheraṃ gāhāpetvā eteneva upāyena yāva saṅghanavakā gāhāpetabbo,
tika-vin04t:1559_28: Sace pana taṃ jigucchanto adese vā nikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1560_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye ārabbha bahū patte viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1560_10: evaṃ ekekena pattena dasadhā dasavidhaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1560_22: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1563_2: Etena sayaṃ uggahetvā nikkhittānaṃ sattāhātikkamepi anāpattiṃ dasseti,
tika-vin04t:1563_4: Bhesajjānīti bhesajjakiccaṃ karontu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin04t:1563_12: Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchurasaṃ upādāya pana apakkā vā avatthukapakkā vā sabbāpi ucchuvikati “phāṇita”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1563_16: tesaṃ vatthūni paṭiggahetvā katāni sappiādīni sattāhaṃ atikkāmayatopi anāpattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin04t:1563_17: Vasātelaṃ pana kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nipakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1563_18: tasmā ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ aññaṃ yaṃkañci vasaṃ purebhattaṃ paṭiggahetvā sāmaṃ pacitvā nibbattitatelampi sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1563_19: Anupasampannena pacitvā dinnaṃ pana tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1563_20: aññesaṃ yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ vatthuṃ pacituṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin04t:1563_21: Nibbattitasappi vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1563_22: taṃ pana tadahupurebhattampi sāmisaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1563_23: Purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīrādito anupasampannena pacitvā katasappiādīni pana tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisānipi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1563_26: Sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānīti sannidhiṃ katvā nidahitvā purebhattaṃ paṭiggahitāni tadahupurebhattaṃ sāmisaparibhogenāpi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:1563_28: pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitāni ca sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena paribhuñjitabbānīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1563_29: “Paribhuñjitabbānī”ti ca vacanato antosattāhe abbhañjanādīnaṃ atthāya adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitesu anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:1563_30: yāvajīvikāni sāsapamadhūkaeraṇḍakaaṭṭhīni telakaraṇatthaṃ paṭiggahetvā tadaheva katatelaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1563_39: telatthāya paṭiggahitasāsapādīnaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappiādīnañca sattāhātikkame dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1563_43: taṃ nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvāpi aruādīni vā makkhetuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1563_47: Yaṃ pana nirapekkho pariccajitvā puna labhati,
tika-vin04t:1564_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha sattāhaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1567_0: Catutthe māso seso gimhānanti catunnaṃ gimhamāsānaṃ eko pacchimamāso seso.
tika-vin04t:1567_1: Pariyesitabbanti gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1567_4: attano ñātakappavāritaṭṭhānato pana “detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara”ntiādikāya viññattiyāpi pariyesitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1567_6: yathā vā tathā vā “detha me”tiādivacanena viññāpentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1567_7: Katvā nivāsetabbanti gimhānaṃ pacchimaddhamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kattikamāsassa pacchimadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1567_8: tāva sūcikammaniṭṭhānena sakimpi vaṇṇabhedamattarajanena kappabindukaraṇena ca katvā paridahitabbā.
tika-vin04t:1567_11: vassānassa catūsu māsesu sabbampi taṃ vaṭṭatīti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1567_12: Yo cāyaṃ gimhānaṃ pacchimo māso anuññāto,
tika-vin04t:1567_13: ettha katapariyesitampi vassikasāṭikaṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1567_14: Sace tasmiṃ māse atikkante vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyati,
tika-vin04t:1567_17: Sace satisammosena vā appahonakabhāvena vā akatā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1567_18: Te ca dve māse vassānassa catumāsanti cha māse parihāraṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1567_22: Tato parampi satiyā paccāsāya taṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapentassa ekamāsanti evaṃ ekādasa māse parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:1568_0: Orena ce māso seso gimhānanti gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa orimabhāge yāva hemantassa paṭhamadivaso,
tika-vin04t:1568_2: Pariyeseyyāti etesu sattasu piṭṭhisamayamāsesu aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato satuppādakaraṇena pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1568_6: Orenaddhamāso seso gimhānanti gimhānassa pacchimaddhamāsato orimabhāge ekasmiṃ addhamāse.
tika-vin04t:1568_7: Katvā nivāseyyāti etthantare dhammena uppannampi katvā nivāsentassa nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1569_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha vassikasāṭikapariyesanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1569_5: tathā satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggassa kāyaṃ ovassāpayato.
tika-vin04t:1569_6: Pokkharaṇiyādīsu pana nhāyantassa vā acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā “anivatthaṃ corā harantī”ti
tika-vin04t:1569_7: evaṃ āpadāsu vā nivāsayato ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1569_10: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1569_14: asamaye nivāsananti imāni nivāsanāpattiyā cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1572_0: Pañcame sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvāti veyyāvaccādīni paccāsisamāno sayameva datvā.
tika-vin04t:1572_1: Acchindeyyāti veyyāvaccādīni akarontaṃ disvā sakasaññāya acchindantassa vatthugaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1573_8: anupasampannassa ca yaṃkiñci acchindato vā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1573_9: Tena tuṭṭhena vā kupitena vā dinnaṃ pana tassa vissāsaṃ vā gaṇhantassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1573_14: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1576_0: Chaṭṭhe suttanti chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādiṃ vā tesaṃ anulomaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1576_4: Nissaggiyanti evaṃ vāyāpentassa yo tantavāyo cīvaravāyanatthaṃ turivemasajjanādike payoge karoti,
tika-vin04t:1577_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha cīvaravāyāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1577_3: viññāpitasuttaṃ viññāpitatantavāyena vāyāpentassa dīghato vidatthimatte tiriyañca hatthamatte vīte nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1577_6: Teneva pana aviññattiyā laddhasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1577_8: Teneva viññattañca aviññattañca vāyāpentassa sace vuttappamāṇena kedārabaddhaṃ viya cīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1577_13: Atha ekantarikena vā suttena dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1577_16: kappiyākappiyehi tantavāyehi suttepi kappiye akappiye kappiyākappiye ca āpattibhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1577_26: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1580_0: Sattame tatra ce so bhikkhūti yatra gāme vā nigame vā tantavāyā, tatra.
tika-vin04t:1580_16: Piṇḍapātamattampīti ettha ca na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattena taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1580_17: sace pana te tassa vacanena cīvarasāmikānaṃ hatthato suttaṃ gahetvā īsakampi āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karonti,
tika-vin04t:1581_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1584_6: idhāpi paṭhamapadassa anupayogatā purimanayeneva bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1584_9: sacepi tāni divasāni accantameva bhikkhuno accekacīvaraṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-vin04t:1584_11: Tena pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo dassito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1584_13: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1584_14: Accekacīvaranti gamikagilānagabbhiniabhinavuppannasaddhānaṃ puggalānaṃ aññatarena “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocetvā dinnaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1584_20: Yāva cīvarakālasamayanti anatthate kathine yāva vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin04t:1585_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha accekacīvarassa cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1588_0: Navame upavassaṃ kho panāti ettha upavassanti upavassa,
tika-vin04t:1588_4: Imassa ca padassa “tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto”tiiminā sambandho,
tika-vin04t:1588_6: vassaṃ upagantvā vasitvā ca tato paraṃ pacchimakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānakālaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni…pe…
tika-vin04t:1588_8: Tattha āraññakānīti sabbapacchimāni āropitena ācariyadhanunā gāmassa indakhīlato paṭṭhāya pañcadhanusatappamāṇe padese katasenāsanāni.
tika-vin04t:1588_11: Sace vihārassa parikkhepo vā aparikkhittassa yaṃ gāmato sabbapaṭhamaṃ senāsanaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā bodhi vā dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā yāva,
tika-vin04t:1589_0: Antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti āraññakassa senāsanassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu attanā abhirucite gocaragāme nikkhipeyya.
tika-vin04t:1589_9: Ūnappamāṇe vā gāvutato atirekappamāṇe vā na labhati,
tika-vin04t:1589_10: yatra hi piṇḍāya caritvā bhuttavelāyameva puna vihāraṃ sakkā āgantuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1589_17: Tato ce uttari vippavaseyyāti chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāti attho,
tika-vin04t:1589_18: tathā asakkontena pana gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā sabhāyaṃ vā yattha katthaci vā vasitvā cīvarappavattiṃ ñatvā pakkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1589_19: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho gilānassa bhikkhuno cīvarena vippavāsasammutiṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:1589_20: taṃ ṭhapetvā aladdhasammutikassa atirekachārattaṃ vippavasato nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1590_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha cīvaravippavāsavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1593_1: So hi saṅghassa pariṇatattā hatthe anāruḷhopi ekena pariyāyena saṅghasantako hoti.
tika-vin04t:1593_3: Pariṇatanti “dassāma karissāmā”ti vacībhedena vā hatthamuddāya vā saṅghassa ninnaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1593_4: Attano pariṇāmeyyāti “idaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”tiādīni vadanto attaninnaṃ kareyya.
tika-vin04t:1593_8: Pariṇataṃ pana sahadhammikānaṃ vā gihīnaṃ vā antamaso mātusantakampi attano pariṇāmentassa payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1594_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha pariṇāmanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1594_5: saṅghacetiyapuggalesu yassa kassaci pariṇataṃ aññasaṅghādīnaṃ pariṇāmentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1594_9: tumhākaṃ deyyadhammo paribhogaṃ vā labheyyā”tiādīni vadantassa,
tika-vin04t:1602_0: Pācittiyesu musāvādavaggassa paṭhame sampajānamusāvādeti pubbepi jānitvā vacanakkhaṇepi jānantasseva musāvādabhaṇane.
tika-vin04t:1602_1: Bhaṇanañca nāma idha abhūtassa vā bhūtataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1602_2: bhūtassa vā abhūtataṃ katvā kāyena vā vācāya vā viññāpanappayogo,
tika-vin04t:1602_5: tassa taṃnimittaṃ taṃhetu tappaccayā pācittiyaṃ hotīti evamettha aññesu ca īdisesu attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1603_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ hatthakaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha avajānitvā paṭijānanādivatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1603_7: “yo te vihāre vasī”tiādinā pariyāyena uttarimanussadhammārocanatthaṃ paṭivijānantassa musā bhaṇite thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1603_15: tassa puggalassa viññāpanapayogo cāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1606_1: jātināmagottakammasippaābādhaliṅgakilesaāpattiakkosesu bhūtena vā abhūtena vā yena kenaci pārājikaṃ āpannaṃ
tika-vin04t:1606_2: vā anāpannaṃ vā yaṃkiñci bhikkhuṃ yāya kāyaci vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā anaññāpadesena akkosanavacane
tika-vin04t:1607_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha omasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1607_3: tehiyeva dasahi akkosavatthūhi “santi idhekacce caṇḍālā”tiādinā nayena aññāpadesaṃ katvā akkosantassa,
tika-vin04t:1607_5: yathā tathā vā anupasampannaṃ akkosantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1607_7: Anakkositukāmassa kevalaṃ davakamyatāya vadato sabbattha dubbhāsitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1610_1: jātiādīhi akkosavatthūhi bhikkhū akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā vacanaṃ bhikkhuno piyakamyatāya vā bhedādhippāyena vā yo akkuddho,
tika-vin04t:1610_2: tassa bhikkhussa kāyena vā vācāya vā upasaṃhaṭe tasmiṃ pesuññakaraṇavacane pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1611_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha pesuññaupasaṃharaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1611_3: vuttanayeneva aññāpadesena akkosantassa vacanūpasaṃhāre vā pāḷimuttakaakkosūpasaṃhāre vā anupasampannassa ca upasaṃhāre dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1611_8: Jātiādīhi anaññāpadesena akkosantassa bhikkhuno sutvā vacanaṃ bhikkhussa upasaṃharaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1614_0: Catutthe padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti saṅgītittayaṃ anāruḷhampi rājovādatikkhindriyacatuparivattananandopanandakulumpasuttamaggakathādidhammañca
tika-vin04t:1614_3: Pācittiyanti etesu padādīsu bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā yaṃkañci koṭṭhāsaṃ avasesapuggalehi saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa padādigaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1615_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha padaso dhammavācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1615_9: osārentassa ca khalitaṭṭhāne “evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti vacane ca ekato bhaṇantassāpi,
tika-vin04t:1618_0: Pañcame anupasampannenāti bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenāpi.
tika-vin04t:1618_1: Uttaridirattatirattanti dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā rattīnaṃ upari.
tika-vin04t:1618_2: Sahaseyyanti sabbacchannaparicchanne yebhuyyena channaparicchanne vā senāsane pubbāpariyena vā ekakkhaṇena vā ekato nipajjanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1618_4: Tattha chadanaṃ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā paricchinnampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1618_5: tasmā iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti,
tika-vin04t:1618_7: yo tattha vā aññattha vā tādise tena vā aññena vā anupasampannena saha tisso rattiyo sayitvā catutthadivase
tika-vin04t:1618_8: atthaṅgate sūriye anupasampanne nipanne gabbhadvāraṃ pidhāya vā apidhāya vā nipajjati,
tika-vin04t:1618_9: paṭhamanipanno vā tasmiṃ nipajjante na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin04t:1618_10: tassa ubhinnaṃ uṭṭhahitvā nipajjanappayogagaṇanāya anupasampannagaṇanāya ca pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1619_0: Āḷaviyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha anupasampannena sahaseyyavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1619_5: upasampanne anupasampannasaññino vematikassa vā upaddhacchannaparicchannādīsu ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1619_7: tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasantassa,
tika-vin04t:1622_1: Dissamānarūpā pana yakkhipetiyo paṇḍako methunavatthubhūtā ca tiracchānitthiyo idha dukkaṭavatthukā honti.
tika-vin04t:1623_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmena sahaseyyavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1623_1: sesaṃ anantarasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ aññatra rattiparicchedā,
tika-vin04t:1626_0: Sattame uttarichappañcavācāhītiettha eko gāthāpādo ekā vācāti evaṃ sabbattha vācāpamāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1626_1: Dhammaṃ deseyyāti padasodhammasikkhāpade vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ vā aṭṭhakathādhammaṃ vā bhāseyya.
tika-vin04t:1626_2: Aññatra viññunā purisaviggahenāti vinā viññunā purisena.
tika-vin04t:1626_3: Manussaviggahaṃ gahetvā ṭhitena pana yakkhena vā petena vā tiracchānena vā saddhiṃ ṭhitāyapi dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1626_4: Pācittiyanti dutiyāniyate vuttalakkhaṇena manussena vinā viññumanussitthiyā channaṃ vācānaṃ upari padādivasena dhammaṃ desentassa padādigaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:1627_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ udāyittheraṃ ārabbha mātugāmassa dhammadesanāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1627_5: amātugāme mātugāmasaññino vematikassa vā yakkhipetipaṇḍakamanussaviggahatiracchānitthīnaṃ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1627_10: puna nisīditvā mātugāmassa vā uṭṭhahitvā puna nisinnassa,
tika-vin04t:1627_12: “dīghanikāyo nāma bhante kimatthiyo”ti evaṃ pana puṭṭhe sabbampi dīghanikāyaṃ desentassa,
tika-vin04t:1627_15: Vuttalakkhaṇassa dhammassa channaṃ vācānaṃ upari desanā,
tika-vin04t:1630_0: Aṭṭhame uttarimanussadhammanti catutthapārājike vuttalakkhaṇaṃ uttarimanussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1630_1: Bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyanti attani jhānādidhamme sati taṃ bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā aññassa ārocayato pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1631_0: Vesāliyaṃ vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha tesaṃ bhūtārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1631_3: nippariyāyena attani vijjamānaṃ jhānādidhammaṃ ārocentassa sace yassa āroceti,
tika-vin04t:1631_4: so anantarameva “ayaṃ jhānalābhī”ti vā “ariyo”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena tamatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin04t:1631_7: Pariyāyena ārocitaṃ pana jānātu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin04t:1631_12: jhānalābhino pana tasmiṃ sati jhānā parihāyanti,
tika-vin04t:1634_3: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti yaṃ saṅgho abhiṇhāpattikassa bhikkhuno āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya āpattīnañca kulānañca
tika-vin04t:1634_4: pariyantaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā tikkhattuṃ apaloketvā katikaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1634_6: ayathākatikāya “ayaṃ asuciṃ mocetvā saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena vatthunā saddhiṃ āpattiṃ ghaṭetvā ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1635_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha duṭṭhullāpattiārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1635_6: anupasampannassa purimapañcasikkhāpadavītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ vā itaraṃ aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāraṃ ārocentassāpi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1638_0: Dasame pathavinti duvidhā pathavī jātapathavī ajātapathavīti.
tika-vin04t:1638_2: tattha suddhapathavī nāma pakatiyā suddhapaṃsu vā suddhamattikā vā.
tika-vin04t:1638_3: Missapathavī nāma yattha paṃsuto vā mattikāto vā pāsāṇasakkharakathalamarumbavālukāsu aññatarassa tatiyabhāgo hoti.
tika-vin04t:1638_4: Puñjapathavī nāma “atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭho paṃsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1638_5: vuttalakkhaṇena pana missakapuñjopi piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhitasukhumarajampi ca deve phusāyante sakiṃ tintaṃ
tika-vin04t:1638_7: Tividhāpi cesā pathavī uddhanapattapacanādivasena vā yathā tathā vā adaḍḍhā ‘jātapathavī’ti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:1638_8: daḍḍhā pana vuttappamāṇato adhikatarapāsāṇādimissā vā ajātapathavī nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1638_12: Yo bhikkhu taṃ evarūpaṃ pathaviṃ sayaṃ khaṇati,
tika-vin04t:1638_17: tassa “imaṃ padesa”nti vā “imaṃ pathavi”nti vā evaṃ niyametvā “khaṇa,
tika-vin04t:1638_19: sakiṃ āṇatte divasampi khaṇante āṇāpakassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1639_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha pathavikhaṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1639_4: apathaviyā pathavisaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1639_8: ātapena sussitvā phalitakaddamaṃ vā gokaṇṭakaṃ vā heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddhaṃ bhijjitvā patitanaditaṭaṃ
tika-vin04t:1639_9: vā mahantampi naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍantievamādīni sabbañca ajātapathaviṃ vikopentassa,
tika-vin04t:1644_0: Bhūtagāmavaggassa paṭhame bhūtagāmapātabyatāyāti ettha bhavanti ahesuñcāti bhūtā,
tika-vin04t:1644_1: jāyanti vaḍḍhanti jātā vaḍḍhitā cāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1644_11: Tasmā yo bhikkhu pathaviudakapākārādīsu yatthakatthaci jātaṃ asukkhaṃ antamaso atisukhumatiṇampi sāsapabījakasevālampi
tika-vin04t:1644_12: uddharaṇacchedanavijjhanādīhi vikopeti vā pathavikhaṇane vuttanayena vikopāpeti vā pācittiyaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1645_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha rukkhachindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1645_4: vā bhūmiyaṃ ropitampi nikkhantamūlamattaṃ vā nikkhantaaṅkuramattaṃ vā sacepissa vidatthimattā pattavaṭṭi
tika-vin04t:1645_6: anikkhante vā mūle nikkhante vā mūle yāva aṅkuro harito na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1645_19: imaṃ kappiyaṃ karohī”ti bhaṇantassa ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1645_20: Evaṃ kappiyavacanena bhūtagāmato viyojitaṃ pana bījajātaṃ puna pi “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti kāretvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1646_0: Kappiyaṃ karontena pana agginā vā nakhena vā satthena vā kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1646_1: agginā karontena ca yena kenaci agginā ekadese phusantena ‘kappiya’nti vatvāva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1646_2: Satthena karontena yassa kassaci tikhiṇasatthassa antamaso sūcinakhacchedanādīnampi tuṇḍena vā dhārāya
tika-vin04t:1646_3: vā vedhaṃ vā chedaṃ vā dassentena tatheva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1646_4: Nakhena karontena ṭhapetvā gomahiṃsādīnaṃ khure yena kenaci apūtinā manussānaṃ vā tiracchānānaṃ vā nakhena
tika-vin04t:1646_5: antamaso chinditvā āhaṭenāpi satthe vuttanayeneva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1646_8: ucchūnaṃ vā mahābhāro bandhitvā ṭhapito hoti,
tika-vin04t:1646_9: ekasmiṃ bīje vā rukkhasākhāya vā ucchumhi vā kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1646_10: Ucchuṃ “kappiyaṃ karissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃ baddhaṃ dārukaṃ vijjhati,
tika-vin04t:1646_12: Sace pana yāya valliyā bhāro baddho,
tika-vin04t:1646_19: Yāguyā pakkhittāni pana ekābaddhāni hutvā na santiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin04t:1646_21: Kapiṭṭhaphalādīnaṃ anto miñjaṃ kaṭāhaṃ muñcitvā sañcarati,
tika-vin04t:1646_25: Yaṃ pana phalaṃ taruṇaṃ hoti abījaṃ yañca nibbattabījaṃ bījaṃ apanetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1646_29: vikopanaṃ vā vikopāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1649_7: Tasmā yo bhikkhu sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno saṅghamajjhe anuyuñjiyamāno taṃ na kathetukāmo aññena vacanena aññaṃ chādento tathā tathā vikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1649_9: tesaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā aññavādakakammañceva vihesakakammañca anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1649_10: tasmiṃ saṅghena kate puna tathā karontānaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1650_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1650_5: anāropite pana aññavādake vā vihesake vā tathā karontassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1650_6: Āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ vā ajānantassa “kiṃ tumhe bhaṇathā”ti pucchato,
tika-vin04t:1650_9: adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissantī”ti iminā adhippāyena na kathentassa,
tika-vin04t:1650_13: chādetukāmatāya aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvo vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1653_0: Tatiye yena vacanena ujjhāpenti “chandāya itthannāmo idaṃ nāma karotī”tiādīni vadantā upasampannaṃ saṅghena
tika-vin04t:1653_1: sammataṃ senāsanapaññāpakādibhedaṃ tassa ayasakāmā hutvā bhikkhūhi avajānāpenti,
tika-vin04t:1653_10: Tasmā yo sammatassa bhikkhuno ayasakāmatāya upasampannassa vadanto ujjhāpeti vā khiyyati vā,
tika-vin04t:1654_0: Rājagahe mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha ujjhāpanakhiyyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1654_7: asammatassa ca avaṇṇaṃ yassa kassaci santike bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1654_8: anupasampannassa pana sammatassa vā asammatassa vā avaṇṇaṃ yassa kassacideva santike bhaṇantassa ca dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1654_9: Pakatiyāva chandādivasena karontaṃ ujjhāpentassa vā khiyyantassa vā,
tika-vin04t:1654_17: ujjhāpanaṃ vā khiyyanaṃ vāti imānettha cha aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1657_1: Mañcādīsu yokoci mañcasaṅkhepena kato sabbopi mañcoyeva,
tika-vin04t:1657_3: Yena kenaci pana coḷena vā kappiyacammena vā chaviṃ katvā ṭhapetvā manussalomaṃ tālīsapattañca yehi kehici
tika-vin04t:1657_7: Kocchaṃ pana vākausīramuñjapabbajādīnaṃ aññataramayaṃ anto saṃvellitvā baddhaṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthataṃ
tika-vin04t:1657_11: Ajjhokāseti ettha ye avassikasaṅketā vassānamāsāti evaṃ asaññitā aṭṭha māsā,
tika-vin04t:1657_12: te ṭhapetvā itaresu catūsu māsesu sacepi devo na vassati.
tika-vin04t:1657_13: Tathāpi pakatiajjhokāse ca ovassakamaṇḍape ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1657_15: tattha aparepi cattāro māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1657_16: Gimhe pana sabbattha vigatavalāhakaṃ visuddhaṃ nabhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1657_17: tasmā tadā kenacideva karaṇīyena gacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1657_18: Kākādīnaṃ nibaddhavāsarukkhamūle pana kadācipi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1657_19: Iti yattha ca yadā ca santharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1658_0: Santharitvāti tathārūpe ṭhāne attano vā parassa vā atthāya santharitvā.
tika-vin04t:1658_1: Aññassatthāya santhatampi hi yāva so tattha na nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:1658_7: tañca kho yāva āṇāpako tattha na nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:1658_9: Yasmiñhi attanā santharāpite vā pakatisanthate vā upasampanno nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:1658_13: na uddharāpeyyāti attanā vā uddharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne na ṭhapeyya,
tika-vin04t:1658_15: Anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyāti yo bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā ārāmiko vā lajjī hoti,
tika-vin04t:1658_17: tathārūpaṃ anāpucchitvā taṃ senāsanaṃ tassa aniyyātetvā nirapekkho gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1658_21: Bhojanasālāya ṭhito pana “asukasmiṃ nāma divāvihāraṭṭhāne paññapetvā gacchāhī”ti pesetvā tato nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchanto pāduddhārena kāretabbo.
tika-vin04t:1659_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha santhataṃ anuddharitvā anāpucchaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1659_5: cimilikaṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā taṭṭikaṃ vā cammakkhaṇḍaṃ vā pādapuñchanaṃ vā phalakapīṭhaṃ
tika-vin04t:1659_6: vā yaṃ vā panaññaṃ kañci dārubhaṇḍaṃ mattikābhaṇḍaṃ antamaso pattādhārakampi vuttalakkhaṇe ajjhokāse
tika-vin04t:1659_8: Āraññakena pana asati anovassake sabbaṃ rukkhe laggetvāpi yathā vā upacikāhi na khajjati,
tika-vin04t:1659_25: vuttalakkhaṇe dese santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1662_0: Pañcame vihāreti gabbhe vā aññatarasmiṃ vā sabbaparicchanne vuttasenāsane.
tika-vin04t:1662_1: Seyyanti seyyā nāma bhisī cimilikā uttarattharaṇaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ taṭṭikā cammakkhaṇḍo nisīdanaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāroti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1662_2: Tattha cimilikā nāma parikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ katā.
tika-vin04t:1662_3: Uttarattharaṇaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhādīnaṃ upari attharitabbayuttakaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1662_4: Bhūmattharaṇaṃ nāma cimilikāya sati tassā upari,
tika-vin04t:1662_12: Iti imāsu dasasu seyyāsu ekampi seyyaṃ attano vassaggena gahetvā vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharitvā vā
tika-vin04t:1662_13: santharāpetvā vā yo bhikkhu disaṃgamiko yathā ṭhapitaṃ upacikāhi na khajjati,
tika-vin04t:1663_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1663_5: vuttalakkhaṇassa pana vihārassa upacāre bahi āsanne upaṭṭhānasālāya vā aparicchannamaṇḍape vā paricchanne
tika-vin04t:1663_6: vāpi bahūnaṃ sannipātabhūte rukkhamūle vā santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā,
tika-vin04t:1663_7: mañcapīṭhañca vihāre vā vuttappakāre vihārūpacāre vā santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā uddharaṇādīni akatvā gacchantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1663_12: yo ca “ajjeva āgantvā paṭijaggissāmī”ti evaṃ sāpekkho nadipāraṃ vā gāmantaraṃ vā gantvā yatthassa gamanacittaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1663_13: tattheva ṭhito kañci pesetvā vā āpucchati,
tika-vin04t:1663_14: nadipūrarājacorādīsu vā kenaci palibuddho na sakkoti paccāgantuṃ, tassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1663_19: vuttalakkhaṇe vihāre santharaṇaṃ vā santharāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1666_6: saṅgho pana bhaṇḍāgārikassa vā dhammakathikavinayadharagaṇavācakācariyānaṃ vā bahūpakārataṃ guṇavisiṭṭhatañca
tika-vin04t:1666_7: sallakkhetvā dhuvavāsatthāya vihāraṃ sallakkhetvā sammannitvā deti,
tika-vin04t:1666_11: Anupakhajjāti mañcapīṭhānaṃ vā tassa vā bhikkhuno pavisantassa vā nikkhamantassa vā upacāraṃ anupavisitvā.
tika-vin04t:1666_12: Tattha mañcapīṭhānaṃ tāva mahallake vihāre samantā diyaḍḍho hattho upacāro,
tika-vin04t:1666_15: tassa pana pavisantassa pādadhovanapāsāṇato yāva mañcapīṭhaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1666_18: Seyyaṃ kappeyyāti tassa sambādhaṃ kattukāmatāya tasmiṃ upacāre dasasu seyyāsu ekampi santharantassa vā santharāpentassa vā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1666_19: tattha nisīdantassa vā nipajjantassa vā pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1667_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anupakhajja seyyakappanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1667_10: vissāsikassa vā santake pana vihāre santharantassa,
tika-vin04t:1667_11: yo ca gilāno vā sītuṇhapīḷito vā pavisati, tassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1667_17: upacāre nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1670_2: Nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā pācittiyanti ettha ye anekabhūmakā pāsādā,
tika-vin04t:1670_4: tādisesu senāsanesu gahetvā antarā aṭṭhapetvā ekeneva payogena atikkāmentassa ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1670_5: ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā nānāpayogehi atikkāmentassa dvāragaṇanāya pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:1670_6: hatthena anāmasitvā ‘nikkhamā’ti vatvā vācāya nikkaḍḍhantassāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1670_8: sakiṃ āṇatte pana tasmiṃ bahukepi dvāre nikkhamante itarassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1670_11: tāva nikkaḍḍhāhī”ti vā evaṃ niyametvā āṇatto hoti,
tika-vin04t:1671_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhikkhuṃ saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin04t:1672_6: upaṭṭhānasālādikā vihārūpacārā tassa vā tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane,
tika-vin04t:1672_7: anupasampannassa pana anupasampannaparikkhārassa vā vihārā vā vihārūpacārā vā nikkaḍḍhane nikkaḍḍhāpane ca dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1672_8: Tañca kho asambaddhesu parikkhāresu parikkhāragaṇanāya veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1672_11: sakalasaṅghārāmatopi bhaṇḍanakārakassa vā tassa parikkhārassa vā nikkaḍḍhane nikkaḍḍhāpane vā,
tika-vin04t:1672_19: kopena nikkaḍḍhanaṃ vā nikkaḍḍhāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1675_0: Aṭṭhame uparivehāsakuṭiyāti upari acchannatalāya dvibhūmikakuṭiyā vā tibhūmikakuṭiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:1675_1: padabhājane pana idha adhippetaṃ kuṭiṃ dassetuṃ “majjhimassa purisassa asīsaghaṭṭā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1675_5: mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdeyya vā nipajjeyya vāti attho.
tika-vin04t:1675_7: tasmā yo bhikkhu vuttalakkhaṇāya vehāsakuṭiyā sabbantimena paricchedena yāva pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa sabbaso heṭṭhimāhi tulāhi sīsaṃ na ghaṭṭeti,
tika-vin04t:1675_8: ettakaṃ uccāya tulānaṃ upari ṭhapite āhaccapādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdati vā nipajjati vā,
tika-vin04t:1676_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ sahasā abhinisīdanaabhinipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1676_9: yassa vā heṭṭhā dabbasambhārādīnaṃ nikkhittattā aparibhogaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1676_12: yo ce tasmiṃ vehāsaṭṭhepi āhaccapādake ṭhito kiñci gaṇhāti vā laggati vā,
tika-vin04t:1676_20: apaṭāṇidinne āhaccapādake nisīdanaṃ vā nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1679_2: Yāva dvārakosātiettha dvārakoso nāma ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa sāmantā aḍḍhateyyahattho padeso.
tika-vin04t:1679_8: calitvā sithilā vā hoti patati vā,
tika-vin04t:1679_10: Tattha kiñcāpi “idaṃ nāma kattabba”nti neva mātikāyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1679_13: punappunaṃ lepāpesī”ti adhikārato yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya punappunaṃ limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:1679_15: Te vivaraṇakāle vidatthimattampi atirekampi bhittippadesaṃ paharanti,
tika-vin04t:1679_17: tasmā sabbadisāsu kavāṭavitthārappamāṇo okāso ālokasandhiparikammatthāya limpitabbo vā lepāpetabbo vāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin04t:1680_1: taṃ dassetvā idāni chadane kattabbaṃ dassetuṃ dvatticchadanassātiādimāha.
tika-vin04t:1680_4: parikkhepadvayaṃ vā parikkhepattayaṃ vā adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1680_8: Yaṃ tasmiṃ khette vuttaṃ na tāva sampajjati,
tika-vin04t:1680_11: Tasmā tasmiṃ ṭhatvā adhiṭṭhahanto dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:1680_13: piṭṭhivaṃsassa vā kūṭāgārathūpikāya vā passe nisinno puriso chadanamukhavaṭṭiantena olokento yasmiṃ bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
tika-vin04t:1680_14: yasmiñca ṭhito taṃ upari nisinnakaṃ tatheva ullokento passati,
tika-vin04t:1680_16: tassa anto aharitepi ṭhātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin04t:1680_17: Tato ce uttarīti maggena chādiyamāne tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1680_18: pariyāyena chādiyamāne tiṇṇaṃ pariyāyānaṃ upari iṭṭhakasilāsudhāhi chādiyamāne iṭṭhakasilāsudhāpiṇḍagaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:1680_19: tiṇapaṇṇehi chādiyamāne paṇṇagaṇanāya ceva tiṇamuṭṭhigaṇanāya ca pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1681_0: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha punappunaṃ chādāpanalepāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1684_0: Dasame jānaṃ sappāṇakanti “sappāṇakaṃ eta”nti disvā vā sutvā vā yena kenaci ākārena jānanto.
tika-vin04t:1684_1: Siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vāti tena udakena sayaṃ vā siñceyya,
tika-vin04t:1684_3: Tattha dhāraṃ avicchinditvā siñcantassa ekasmiṃ ghaṭe ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:1684_8: Tattha tattha bandhitvā aññato nentassa payogagaṇanāya āpattiyo.
tika-vin04t:1684_9: Bahukampi tiṇapaṇṇasākhādiṃ ekappayogena udake pakkhipantassa ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:1684_11: Idañca yaṃ evaṃ pakkhipiyamāne pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1685_0: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavake bhikkhū ārabbha siñcanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1685_12: vinā vadhakacetanāya yena kenaci karaṇīyena tiṇādīnaṃ siñcananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1690_0: Ovādavaggassa paṭhame asammatoti yā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatassa bhikkhuno bhagavatā ñatticatutthena kammena bhikkhunovādakasammuti anuññātā,
tika-vin04t:1690_2: Ovadeyyāti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vā sambahulā vā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vā “vassasatūpasampannāya bhikkhuniyā tadahupasampannassa
tika-vin04t:1690_3: bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabba”nti ādike aṭṭha garudhamme ovādavasena
tika-vin04t:1691_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1691_3: aññena vā dhammena bhikkhunīsu upasampannamattaṃ vā ovadato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1691_5: tasmiṃ adhammakamme adhammakammasaññino vagge bhikkhunisaṅghe ovadato tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1691_6: tathā vematikassa dhammakammasaññino cāti nava pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:1691_9: “dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadatī”ti idaṃ avasānapadaṃ ṭhapetvā teneva nayena sattarasa dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:1691_12: ovādañca aniyyātetvā aññaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1691_13: Yo pana dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī samaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati,
tika-vin04t:1691_19: sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā bhaṇati, tassa,
tika-vin04t:1694_0: Dutiye ovadeyyāti aṭṭhagarudhammehi vā aññena vā dhammena ovadantassa sammatassāpi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:1695_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ cūḷapanthakaṃ ārabbha atthaṅgate sūriye ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1698_6: Sammatassa pana rattiṃ ovadantassapi dve eva honti.
tika-vin04t:1698_7: Sammatattā hi bhikkhussa garudhammovādamūlakaṃ pācittiyaṃ natthi.
tika-vin04t:1698_8: Gilānāti na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantuṃ.
tika-vin04t:1699_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ovadanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1699_7: itaraṃ aññena dhammena ovadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ. Samaye,
tika-vin04t:1702_2: Pācittiyanti evarūpe bhikkhū avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1703_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “āmisahetu ovadantī”ti bhaṇanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1703_6: anupasampannañca sammataṃ vā asammataṃ vā evaṃ bhaṇantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:1703_7: Tattha yo bhikkhu kāle sammutiṃ labhitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ saṇṭhito,
tika-vin04t:1703_9: Pakatiyā cīvarādihetu ovadantaṃ pana evaṃ bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1703_14: avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1706_0: Pañcame sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha cīvaradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1709_1: Sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyyā vāti ettha sayaṃ sibbantassa sūciṃ pavesetvā pavesetvā nīharaṇe pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1709_2: satakkhattumpi vijjhitvā sakiṃ nīharantassa ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1709_3: ‘Sibbā’ti vutto pana sacepi sabbaṃ sūcikammaṃ niṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1709_6: sabbaṃ taṃ tava bhāro”ti vutto niṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1710_11: vuttalakkhaṇaṃ sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1713_8: Tattha ṭhapetvā bhikkhunupassayaṃ antarārāmaṃ āsanasālaṃ titthiyaseyyañca sesā akappiyabhūmi,
tika-vin04t:1713_10: Saṃvidahitvā pana “ajja vā sve vā”ti niyamitaṃ kālaṃ visaṅketaṃ akatvā,
tika-vin04t:1713_11: dvāravisaṅketaṃ pana maggavisaṅketaṃ vā katvāpi bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ gacchantassa yāva āsannassāpi aññassa
tika-vin04t:1713_12: gāmassa “ayaṃ imassa upacāro”ti manussehi ṭhapitaṃ upacāraṃ na okkamati,
tika-vin04t:1713_17: Addhayojanātikkame pana gāme asati addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1714_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha ekaddhānamaggappaṭipajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1714_6: yo ca bhikkhuniyā asaṃvidahantiyā kevalaṃ attanāva saṃvidahati,
tika-vin04t:1714_16: gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1717_2: Uddhaṃgāmininti kīḷāvasena uddhaṃ nadiyā paṭisotaṃ gacchantiṃ.
tika-vin04t:1717_4: Yaṃ pana titthappaṭipādanatthaṃ uddhaṃ vā adho vā haranti,
tika-vin04t:1717_10: agāmakatīrapassena vā yojanavitthatāya nadiyā majjhena vā gamanakāle addhayojanagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1718_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha nāvābhiruhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1721_1: neva tassa nāttano ñātakappavāritānaṃ gihīnaṃ santike bhikkhussa guṇaṃ pakāsetvā “detha ayyassa,
tika-vin04t:1721_2: karotha ayyassā”ti evaṃ nipphāditaṃ laddhabbaṃ katanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1721_6: bhikkhuniyā paripācanato pubbe paṭhamataraṃyeva yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gihīnaṃ paṭiyāditabhattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1721_8: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ jānaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:1725_0: Dasame sabbopi kathāmaggo dutiyaaniyate vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1725_1: Idañhi sikkhāpadaṃ dutiyaaniyatena ca upari upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadena ca ekaparicchedaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1730_0: Bhojanavaggassa paṭhame agilānenāti addhayojanampi gantuṃ samatthena.
tika-vin04t:1730_2: Āvasathapiṇḍoti “imesaṃ vā ettakānaṃ vā”ti ekaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1730_3: “ettakamevā”ti evaṃ bhattaṃ vā anodissa sālādīsu yattha katthaci puññakāmehi paññattaṃ bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1730_4: Bhuñjitabboti ekakulena vā nānākulehi vā ekato hutvā ekasmiṃ vā ṭhāne,
tika-vin04t:1730_6: sve ekasmi”nti evaṃ aniyataṭṭhāne vā paññatto ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ekadivasameva bhuñjitabbo.
tika-vin04t:1730_7: Tato ce uttarīti dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ vā ṭhāne aññasmiṃ vā ṭhāne tesaṃ santakassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1731_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍabhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1731_12: gamissāmī’ti ca bhuñjitvā nikkhanto kenaci upaddavena nivattitvā khemabhāvaṃ ñatvā gacchanto puna ekadivasaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1731_16: ṭhapetvā vā pañca bhojanāni aññaṃ bhuñjati, tassa ca,
tika-vin04t:1734_1: Idha ca gaṇoti cattāro vā tatuttari vā bhikkhū,
tika-vin04t:1734_2: tesaṃ nimantanato vā viññattito vā laddhe odanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarabhojaneti attho.
tika-vin04t:1734_4: sace hi koci cattāro bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā “odanena nimantemi,
tika-vin04t:1734_6: te ce evaṃ ekato vā nānāto vā nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā gantvā ekato gaṇhanti,
tika-vin04t:1734_7: pacchā ekato vā nānāto vā bhuñjanti,
tika-vin04t:1734_10: Sace odanādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā ekato vā nānāto vā viññāpetvā ca gantvā ca ekato gaṇhanti,
tika-vin04t:1734_14: Gilānasamayādīsu yadā pādānampi phalitattā na sakkā piṇḍāya carituṃ,
tika-vin04t:1734_18: Yadā yo cīvare kariyamāne kiñcideva cīvare kattabbaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:1734_20: Yadā addhayojanampi gantukāmo vā hoti gacchati vā gato vā,
tika-vin04t:1734_23: Yadā gocaragāme cattāro bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā na yāpenti,
tika-vin04t:1735_0: Rājagahe devadattaṃ ārabbha viññāpetvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1735_7: ye ca dve tayo ekato gaṇhanti,
tika-vin04t:1738_0: Tatiye paramparabhojaneti gaṇabhojane vuttanayeneva pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito,
tika-vin04t:1738_1: tassa tassa bhojanato uppaṭipāṭiyā vā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojane.
tika-vin04t:1738_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī”ti vā “vikappemī”ti
tika-vin04t:1738_3: vā evaṃ sammukhā vā “itthannāmassa dammī”ti vā “vikappemī”ti vā evaṃ parammukhāvā paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā
tika-vin04t:1739_0: Vesāliyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññatra nimantitabhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1739_2: parivāre pana vikappanampi gahetvā “catasso anupaññattiyo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1739_8: yo ca samaye vā vikappetvā vā ekasaṃsaṭṭhāni vā dve tīṇi nimantanāni ekato vā katvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1739_10: sakalena gāmena vā pūgena vā nimantito tesu yatthakatthaci bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1742_0: Catutthe pūvehīti paheṇakatthāya paṭiyattehi atirasakamodakasakkhalikādīhi yehi kehici khajjakehi.
tika-vin04t:1742_1: Manthehīti pātheyyatthāya paṭiyattehi yehi kehici sattutilataṇḍulādīhi.
tika-vin04t:1742_2: Dvattipattapūrāti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhaṃ anatikkantā dve vā tayo vā pattapūrā.
tika-vin04t:1742_3: Tato ce uttarīti sacepi tatiyaṃ pattaṃ thūpīkataṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1742_5: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvāti ettha yena dve gahitā honti,
tika-vin04t:1742_6: tena bahi bhikkhuṃ disvā “ettha mayā dve pattapūrā gahitā,
tika-vin04t:1742_8: tenāpi aññaṃ passitvā “paṭhamaṃ āgatena dve pattapūrā gahitā,
tika-vin04t:1742_14: tena aññaṃ disvā “mā kho tvaṃ ettha paṭiggaṇhīti vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1742_17: Tato nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbanti laddhaṭṭhānato sabbāsannaṃ āsanasālaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā yattha vā pana nibaddhaṃ paṭikkamati,
tika-vin04t:1742_18: tattha gantvā ekaṃ pattapūraṃ attano ṭhapetvā sesaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1743_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1743_6: na paheṇakatthāya na pātheyyatthāya vā paṭiyattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1746_6: paṭikkhepo paññāyatī”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vuttapañcaṅgavasena katappavāraṇo,
tika-vin04t:1746_8: Tattha yasmā “asanaṃ paññāyatī”ti iminā vippakatabhojano ‘pavārito’ti vutto.
tika-vin04t:1746_14: Tasmā ‘bhuttāvī’tivacanena visuṃ kiñci atthasiddhiṃ na passāma,
tika-vin04t:1746_15: “dirattatiratta”ntiādīsu pana dirattādivacanaṃ viya pavāritapadassa parivārabhāvena byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1747_0: Pavāraṇaṅgesu pana asanaṃ paññāyatīti vippakatabhojanaṃ dissati,
tika-vin04t:1747_1: taṃ bhuñjamāno cesa puggalo hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1747_3: odanādīnaṃ ce aññataraṃ paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhojanaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1747_4: Hatthapāse ṭhitoti pavāraṇappahonakaṃ ce bhojanaṃ gaṇhitvā dāyako aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇe okāse ṭhito hotīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1747_5: Abhiharatīti so ce dāyako tassa taṃ bhojanaṃ kāyena abhisaṃharatīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1747_7: taṃ ce abhihaṭaṃ so bhikkhu kāyena vā vācāya vā paṭikkhipatīti attho.
tika-vin04t:1747_8: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena pavārito hoti.
tika-vin04t:1748_2: yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1748_3: taṃ odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsanti imesaṃ aññatarameva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1748_4: Tattha odano nāma sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrūsakoti imesaṃ sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ taṇḍule
tika-vin04t:1748_5: gahetvā “bhattaṃ pacāmā”ti vā “yāguṃ pacāmā”ti vā yaṃkiñci sandhāya pacantu,
tika-vin04t:1748_6: sace uṇhaṃ vā sītalaṃ vā bhuñjantānaṃ bhojanakāle gahitagahitaṭṭhāne odhi paññāyati,
tika-vin04t:1748_9: Yo pana pāyāso vā ambilayāgu vā uddhanato otāritamattā abbhuṇhā sakkā hoti āvijjhitvā pivituṃ,
tika-vin04t:1748_10: sā yassa hatthena gahitokāsepi odhi na paññāyati,
tika-vin04t:1748_12: Sace pana usumāya vigatāya ghanabhāvaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1748_16: Sacepi bahū paṇṇaphalakaḷīre pakkhipitvā muṭṭhimattāpi taṇḍulā pakkhittā honti,
tika-vin04t:1748_19: Ayāguke nimantane “yāguṃ dassāmā”ti bhatte udakakañjikakhīrādīni ākiritvā “yāguṃ gaṇhathā”ti denti,
tika-vin04t:1748_22: Sace pana pakkuthitesu udakādīsu pakkhipitvā pacitvā denti,
tika-vin04t:1748_24: Sace yāguyāpi sāsapamattampi macchamaṃsakkhaṇḍaṃ vā nhāru vā pakkhittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1748_26: Ṭhapetvā sānulomānaṃ vuttadhaññānaṃ taṇḍule aññehi veḷutaṇḍulādīhi vā kandamūlaphalehi vā yehi kehici katabhattaṃ pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
tika-vin04t:1748_28: Aññehi pana muggādīhi katakummāso pavāraṇaṃ na janeti.
tika-vin04t:1748_29: Sattu nāma satta dhaññāni bhajjitvā kato.
tika-vin04t:1748_30: Antamaso kharapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ taṇḍule koṭṭetvā katacuṇṇampi kuṇḍakampi sattusaṅgahameva gacchati.
tika-vin04t:1748_32: ye keci taṇḍulā vā lājā vā,
tika-vin04t:1748_34: Macchamaṃsesu sace yāguṃ pivantassa yāgusitthamattāneva dve macchakkhaṇḍāni vā maṃsakkhaṇḍāni vā ekabhājane vā nānābhājane vā denti,
tika-vin04t:1748_35: tāni ce akhādanto aññaṃ pavāraṇappahonakaṃ yaṃkiñci paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1748_38: ekaṃ hatthe vā patte vā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1748_45: aññaṃ kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā khādanto paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:1749_1: yañca bhojanaṃ hatthapāse ṭhitena abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipanto pavāraṇaṃ janeti,
tika-vin04t:1749_4: “asanaṃ bhojana”nti ettha tāva yena ekasitthampi ajjhohaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1749_5: so sace pattamukhahatthesu yatthakatthaci bhojane sati sāpekkhova aññaṃ vuttalakkhaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati, pavāreti.
tika-vin04t:1749_12: “Hatthapāse ṭhito”ti ettha pana sace bhikkhu nisinno hoti,
tika-vin04t:1749_18: tassa pārimantato paṭṭhāya dāyakassa nisinnassa vā ṭhitassa vā nipannassa vā ṭhapetvā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1749_20: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipantasseva pavāraṇā hoti,
tika-vin04t:1749_23: Sace pana anantaranisinnopi bhikkhu hatthe vā ādhārake vā ṭhitaṃ pattaṃ anabhiharitvāva “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati,
tika-vin04t:1749_25: Bhattapacchiṃ ānetvā purato bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā evaṃ vuttepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:1749_26: Īsakaṃ pana uddharitvā vā apanāmetvā vā ‘gaṇhathā’ti vutte taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1749_27: Bhattapacchiṃ gahetvā parivisantassa añño “ahaṃ dhāressāmī”ti gahitamattameva karoti,
tika-vin04t:1749_30: tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1749_33: tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā na hoti.
tika-vin04t:1749_39: ‘Paṭikkhepo’ti ettha vācāya abhihaṭe paṭikkhepo na ruhati,
tika-vin04t:1749_40: kāyena abhihaṭaṃ pana aṅgulicalanādinā kāyavikārena vā “alaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1749_41: mā dehī”tiādinā vacīvikārena vā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1750_5: Maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā ‘maṃsarasa’nti vuttepi sace sāsapamattampi khaṇḍaṃ atthi,
tika-vin04t:1750_13: “Macchamaṃsaṃ byañjana”nti vā “imaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā vutte pana pavāreti,
tika-vin04t:1751_2: Taṃ pana kappiyakatādīhi sattahi vinayakammākārehi akataṃ vā gilānassa anadhikaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin04t:1751_4: tattha yaṃ phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappiyehi kappiyaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1751_7: taṃ akappiyaṃ “alametaṃ sabba”nti evaṃ atirittaṃ kataṃ akappiyakatanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1751_8: Appaṭiggahitakatanti bhikkhunā appaṭiggahitaṃyeva purimanayena atirittaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1751_9: Anuccāritakatanti kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ āgatena bhikkhunā īsakampi anukkhittaṃ vā anapanāmitaṃ vā kataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1751_10: Ahatthapāse katanti kappiyaṃ kāretuṃ āgatassa hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitena kataṃ.
tika-vin04t:1751_13: Bhuttāvinā pavāritena āsanā vuṭṭhitena katanti idaṃ uttānameva.
tika-vin04t:1751_14: “Alametaṃ sabba”nti avuttanti vacībhedaṃ katvā evaṃ avuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:1751_15: Iti imehi sattahi vinayakammākārehi yaṃ atirittaṃ kappiyaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1752_0: Apicettha bhuttāvinā kataṃ hotīti antamaso anantaranisinnassa pattato ekampi sitthaṃ vā maṃsahīraṃ vā khāditvā katampi bhuttāvinā kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:1752_1: yo pātova evaṃ bhuttāvī pavārito nisīdatiyeva,
tika-vin04t:1752_2: so upakaṭṭhepi kāle abhihaṭaṃ piṇḍaṃ bhikkhunā upanītaṃ kappiyaṃ kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin04t:1752_3: Sace pana tasmiṃ kappiye kate bhuñjantassa aññaṃ āmisaṃ ākiranti,
tika-vin04t:1752_4: taṃ so puna kātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin04t:1752_9: tasmā tasmiṃ bhājane kariyamāne paṭhamakatena saddhiṃ kataṃ hotīti taṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1752_10: Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1752_11: Evaṃ kataṃ paṭhamakatena missetvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1752_12: na kevalañca tassa yena pana kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:1752_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ pavāritānampi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1752_14: Yathā pana akatena missaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1752_15: evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1752_16: Gilānātirittaṃ pana na kevalaṃ gilānassa bhuttāvasesameva,
tika-vin04t:1752_17: atha kho yaṃkiñci gilānaṃ uddissa “ajja vā sve vā yadā vā icchati,
tika-vin04t:1752_20: Khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vāti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1752_21: Khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyanti ettha vuttanayena pavāritassa anatirittaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhato gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1753_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1753_7: tathā atiritte anatirittasaññino ceva vematikassa ca.
tika-vin04t:1756_1: bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti evaṃ pavāreyya.
tika-vin04t:1756_2: Jānanti sutvā vā disvā vā tassa pavāritabhāvaṃ jānanto.
tika-vin04t:1756_4: Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiyanti ettha abhihāre tāva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1756_7: tasmiṃ pana bhuñjante abhihārakassa tassa ajjhohāre ajjhohāre dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1757_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha anatirittena bhojanena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1757_13: yo ca yāmakālikādīni “sati paccaye paribhuñjāhī”ti deti, tassa,
tika-vin04t:1760_2: Tasmā yo bhikkhu etasmiṃ antare yaṃkiñci vanamūlaphalaṃ upādāya āmaṃ vā pakkaṃ vā āmisasaṅkhepagataṃ
tika-vin04t:1760_3: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin04t:1761_0: Rājagahe sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha vikāle bhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1761_7: kāle kālasaññissa yāmakālikādīni sati paccaye paribhuñjantassa ummattakādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1761_11: na ca bhikkhave bahimukhadvārā nīharitvā ajjhoharitabba”nti anuññātanayena romaṭṭhakassāpi anāpatti. Vikālatā,
tika-vin04t:1764_0: Aṭṭhame sannidhikārakanti kāro karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1764_4: Tasmā evaṃ sannidhikataṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā ‘ajjhoharissāmī’ti gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1764_8: gaṇṭhikapattassa vā gaṇṭhikantare sneho paviṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin04t:1764_12: Yaṃ pana bhikkhu nirapekkho sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajitvā tehi nihitaṃ labhitvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:1764_14: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase kappiyabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1764_15: Akappiyesu pana manussamaṃse thullaccayena saddhiṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1764_19: Yo pana pavārito hutvā anatirittakataṃ ajjhoharati,
tika-vin04t:1764_23: sati paccaye vikālapaccayā yāmakālikādīsu ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1765_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha sannidhikārakabhojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1765_4: sattāhakālika yāvajīvikānaṃ pana āhāratthāya paṭiggahaṇe ajjhohāre ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1765_11: Tasmā sacepi taṃ taṃ tena tena saddhiṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:1765_12: sace asambhinnarasaṃ vā hoti sudhotaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1766_0: Sace pana sambhinnarasaṃ vā hoti duddhotaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:1766_2: Yāvakālikañhi attanā saddhiṃ sambhinnarasāni tīṇipi yāmakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin04t:1766_3: yāmakālikaṃ dvepi sattāhakālikādīni attano sabhāvaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin04t:1766_5: Tasmā tena tadahupaṭiggahitena saddhiṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ vā pure paṭiggahitaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ sattāhaṃ kappati,
tika-vin04t:1766_11: yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahita”nti avatvā “paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhaṃ kappatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1766_12: Kālayāmasattāhātikkamesu cettha vikālabhojana sannidhibhesajjasikkhāpadānaṃ vasena āpattiyo veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:1766_13: imesu pana catūsu kālikesu yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikanti imameva dvayaṃ antovuṭṭhañceva sannidhikārakañca,
tika-vin04t:1766_16: Akappiyakuṭiyaṃ antovuṭṭhena pana tena saddhiṃ itaradvayaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitampi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1766_21: Tattha akappiyakuṭi nāma saṅghassa vā upasampannapuggalassa vā santakaṃ vasanatthāya katagehaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1766_22: tattha sahaseyyappahonake padese vuṭṭhaṃ yāvakālikañca yāmakālikañca saṅghikaṃ vā upasampannapuggalassa vā santakaṃ antovuṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1766_24: yattha katthaci pana sayaṃ pakkaṃ sāmaṃ pakkaṃ nāma,
tika-vin04t:1766_28: Tasmā antovuṭṭhaantopakkamocanatthaṃ bhagavatā catasso kappiyabhūmiyo anuññātā,
tika-vin04t:1766_31: tattha anupasampannassa santakaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1766_36: yāvakālikādīni tīṇi nidahitvā sakaṃ sakaṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā,
tika-vin04t:1769_7: Macchādīsu pana sabbopi ‘odako’ti vuttalakkhaṇo maccho macchoyeva.
tika-vin04t:1769_10: Evarūpāni paṇītabhojanānīti yāni etehi sappiādīhi saṃsaṭṭhattā ‘paṇītabhojanānī’ti vuccanti,
tika-vin04t:1769_12: Agilānoti yassa tehi vināpi phāsu hoti.
