tika-vin04t:1769_13: Attano atthāya viññāpetvāti ettha pana yo agilāno suddhāni sappiādīni bhesajjatthāya viññāpeti,
tika-vin04t:1769_22: sappiñca bhattañca dehī”ti evaṃ viññāpentassa tāva viññattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1769_25: “Sappibhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana yasmā sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:1769_27: Sace pana “sappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte bhattaṃ datvā “sappiṃ katvā bhuñjāhī”ti navanītakhīrādīni vā
tika-vin04t:1769_28: kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vā deti “iminā sappiṃ gahetvā bhuñjāhī”ti,
tika-vin04t:1769_30: “Gosappinā bhattaṃ dehī”ti vutte pana gosappiṃ vā detu,
tika-vin04t:1769_34: Sace pana “gosappinā dehī”ti yācito ajikāsappiādīhi deti,
tika-vin04t:1769_36: Evañhi sati aññaṃ yācitena aññaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:1769_44: Sace pana sabbehipi sappiādīhi ekaṭṭhāne vā nānāṭṭhāne vā viññāpetvā paṭiladdhaṃ ekato sambhinnarasaṃ katvā tato kusaggena ekabindumpi ajjhoharati,
tika-vin04t:1770_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paṇītabhojanaviññattivatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1773_0: Dasame adinnanti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā gaṇhantassa hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhanissaggiyānaṃ aññatarena na dinnaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1773_2: Appaṭiggahitakañhi bhikkhuno attano santakampi ajjhoharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1773_5: Sace hi yo koci anupasampanno antamaso tiracchānopi bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā hatthapāse ṭhito kāyādīnaṃ aññatarena deti,
tika-vin04t:1773_6: tañce bhikkhunā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena vā,
tika-vin04t:1773_17: Pubbābhoge ca sati pacchā niddāyantassa patte dinnampi hatthapāse sati paṭiggahitameva hoti.
tika-vin04t:1773_21: tattha ṭhitanisinnanipannānaṃ pavāraṇāsikkhāpade vuttanayeneva hatthapāso veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:1774_0: Sace pana dāyakappaṭiggāhakesu eko ākāse hoti,
tika-vin04t:1774_2: bhūmaṭṭhassa sīsena ākāsaṭṭhassa ca ṭhapetvā dātuṃ vā gahetuṃ vā pasāritahatthaṃ yaṃ āsannataraṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1774_9: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvā sacepi dve tayo vā sāmaṇerā yaṃ majjhimo puriso ukkhipituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin04t:1774_10: evarūpaṃ bhāraṃ pavaṭṭentā bhikkhuno bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitahatthaṃ āropenti,
tika-vin04t:1774_11: ukkhipitvā vā bhikkhuno pasāritahatthe ekadesenāpi ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:1774_13: Yaṃ pana piṇḍāya carantassa patte rajaṃ patati,
tika-vin04t:1774_17: taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:1774_18: Sace “paṭiggahetvā dethā”ti vutte vacanaṃ assutvā vā anādiyitvā vā bhikkhaṃ dentiyeva,
tika-vin04t:1774_21: Sace mahāvāto tato tato rajaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin04t:1774_23: “anupasampannassa dassāmī”ti suddhacittena ābhogaṃ katvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1774_24: Taṃ anupasampannassa datvā puna tena dinnaṃ vā tassa vissāsena vā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:1774_25: Assukheḷasiṅghāṇikādīsu yaṃ ṭhānato cavitvā hatthe vā patte vā patati,
tika-vin04t:1774_31: Yaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ vā mūlaphalaṃ vā mātādīnaṃ atthāya gahetvā chāyatthāya vā phalinisākhaṃ ukkhipitvā gacchati,
tika-vin04t:1774_34: Yo pana tattha jātakaphalinisākhāya vā valliyā vā gahetvā cāleti.
tika-vin04t:1774_35: Tassa tato laddhaṃ phalaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1774_38: phalirukkhaṃ pana apassayituṃ vā ālambituṃ vā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1774_39: paṭiggahetvā ṭhapite yaṃ aññaṃ aṅkurādi uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:1774_41: Yāva hi hatthato mutte nirapekkho na hoti,
tika-vin04t:1775_3: galena ajjhoharaṇīyatāya sabbampi taṃ mukhadvāraṃ pavesitameva hoti.
tika-vin04t:1775_4: Āhāranti yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā sattāhakālikaṃ vā yāvajīvikaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:1775_6: tattha sabbampi dhaññaṃ vā dhaññānulomaṃ vā tālanāḷikerapanasalabujaalābukumbhaṇḍapussaphalatipusaphalaeḷālukasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin04t:1775_11: Ambapānaṃ jambupānaṃ cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ madhukapānaṃ muddikapānaṃ sālūkapānaṃ phārusakapānanti imāni aṭṭha pānāni,
tika-vin04t:1775_13: etāni sabbāni anupasampannehi sītodakena madditvā katāni ādiccapākāni vā yāva rattiyā pacchimayāmaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato yāmakālikāni nāma.
tika-vin04t:1775_15: Sappiādīni pañca bhesajjāni sattāhaṃ nidahitvā paribhuñjitabbato sattāhakālikāni nāma.
tika-vin04t:1775_16: Idaṃ pana yāvakālikādittayaṃ kālavimuttañca udakaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesamūlaphalāphalādi yaṃ neva khādanīyatthaṃ na bhojanīyatthaṃ pharati,
tika-vin04t:1775_17: taṃ yāvajīvaṃ nidahitvā sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbato yāvajīvikaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:1775_19: Aññatra udakadantaponāti idaṃ anāhārepi udake āhārasaññāya,
tika-vin04t:1775_20: dantapone ca “mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ ida”nti saññāya kukkuccāyantānaṃ kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1775_23: Ṭhapetvā pana idaṃ dvayaṃ avasesaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya gaṇhato gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1776_0: Vesāliyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha adinnaṃ āhāraṃ āharaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1776_9: cattāri mahāvikaṭāni sati paccaye asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjantassa,
tika-vin04t:1776_11: Ettha dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakārako asantapakkheyeva tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:1776_13: tasmiñca asati alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ,
tika-vin04t:1776_15: idaṃ pana catubbidhampi mahāvikaṭaṃ kālodissaṃ nāma sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva sāmaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:1781_0: Acelakavaggassa paṭhame etesaṃ acelakādīnaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ekappayogena dentassa ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1781_1: avacchinditvā avacchinditvā dentassa payoge payoge pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:1782_0: Vesāliyaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha paribbājikāya dve pūve dānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1782_9: tesaṃ santike bhājanaṃ nikkhipitvā “idaṃ gaṇhathā”ti bhaṇantassa,
tika-vin04t:1782_15: ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1785_0: Dutiye dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vāti yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ dāpetvā vā na dāpetvā vā.
tika-vin04t:1785_1: Uyyojeyyāti mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasanakīḷanarahonisajjādīni kattukāmo ‘gacchā’tiādīni vatvā uyyojeyya.
tika-vin04t:1785_5: yadā panassa so dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā ekena pādena vijahati,
tika-vin04t:1785_8: Ettha ca dassanūpacārassa ajjhokāse ṭhatvā dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1786_6: “ubho ekato na yāpessāmā”ti evamādīhi patirūpakāraṇehi uyyojentassa,
tika-vin04t:1786_10: evaṃ uyyojitassa upacārātikkamoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:1789_9: tassa mahācatussālādīsu katassa mahallakassa piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā antosayanassa āsanne ṭhāne,
tika-vin04t:1789_10: khuddakassa vā vemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdeyyāti attho,
tika-vin04t:1790_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha anupakhajja nisajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:1793_0: Catutthapañcamāni sāvatthiyaṃ upanandaṃ ārabbha paṭicchannāsane ca,
tika-vin04t:1796_0: Chaṭṭhe nimantitoti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantito.
tika-vin04t:1796_1: Sabhatto samānoti teneva nimantanabhattena sabhatto samāno.
tika-vin04t:1796_2: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāti antoupacārasīmāya dassanūpacāre bhikkhuṃ disvā yaṃ sakkā hoti pakativacanena āpucchituṃ,
tika-vin04t:1796_3: tādisaṃ “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena anāpucchitvā.
tika-vin04t:1796_4: Purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vāti yena bhattena nimantito,
tika-vin04t:1796_6: Kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyyāti yasmiṃ kule nimantito,

tika-vin04t:2032_0: Idāni parimaṇḍalanti ettha nābhimaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhikato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin04t:2032_1: aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ nivāsanaṃ otāretvā nivāsentena parimaṇḍalaṃ nivatthaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2032_2: evaṃ anivāsetvā anādariyena purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2032_4: ye caññe “tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā gihinivatthaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2032_5: hatthisoṇḍakaṃ macchavālakaṃ catukkaṇṇakaṃ tālavaṇṭakaṃ satavalikaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2033_0: Tattha hatthisoṇḍakaṃ nāma nābhimūlato hatthisoṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ olambakaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ coḷikaitthīnaṃ nivāsanaṃ viya.
tika-vin04t:2033_1: Macchavālakaṃ nāma ekatodasantaṃ ekato pāsantaṃ olambetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2033_3: heṭṭhato dveti evaṃ cattāro kaṇṇe dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2033_4: Tālavaṇṭakaṃ nāma tālavaṇṭākārena sāṭakaṃ olambetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2033_5: Satavalikaṃ nāma dīghasāṭakaṃ anekakkhattuṃ obhujitvā ovaṭṭikaṃ karontena nivatthaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2033_6: vāmadakkhiṇapassesu vā nirantaraṃ valiyo dassetvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2033_7: Sace pana jāṇuto paṭṭhāya ekā vā dve vā valiyo paññāyanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2033_8: Saṃvalliyanti mallakammakārādīhi viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā nivatthaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2033_9: Evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassāpi maggappaṭipannassāpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2033_10: Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ vā dve vā kaṇṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti,
tika-vin04t:2033_11: anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin04t:2034_0: Gilāno pana antokāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin04t:2034_1: agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetabbāni.
tika-vin04t:2034_2: Iti imaṃ khandhake paṭikkhittañca olambakañca sabbaṃ vivajjetvā vuttalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2034_3: tathā anivāsetvā yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2035_0: “Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthu”ntiādike pana vinicchaye surusurukārakaṃ kosambiyaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2035_1: sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakasasitthakapattadhovanapaṭisaṃyuttadvayaṃ bhaggesu sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha,
tika-vin04t:2035_2: sesāni sabbāneva sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiye ārabbha olambetvā nivāsanādivatthusmiṃ paññattāni.

tika-vin04t:2036_1: atha kho “parimaṇḍalaṃyeva nivāsessāmī”ti virajjhitvā aparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2036_5: Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā hoti mahāpiṇḍikamaṃso vā,
tika-vin04t:2036_6: tassa sāruppatthāya aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2036_7: Gilānassāti yassa jaṅghāya vā pāde vā vaṇo hoti,
tika-vin04t:2036_8: tassa ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā nivāsetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2036_9: Āpadāsūti vāḷā vā corā vā anubandhanti,
tika-vin04t:2036_16: evaṃ sabbattha purimāni dve tattha tattha vuttappaṭipakkhakaraṇañcāti tīṇiyeva honti,
tika-vin04t:2036_17: tasmā ito paraṃ tānipi avatvā anāpattimattameva vakkhāmāti.
tika-vin04t:2038_2: gihipārutaṃ pārupitabba”nti evaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ gihipārutaṃ apārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā pārupanaṃ parimaṇḍalapārupanaṃ nāma,
tika-vin04t:2038_3: tattha yaṃkiñci setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutaṃ surāsoṇḍapārutaṃ antepurikapārutaṃ
tika-vin04t:2038_4: mahājeṭṭhapārutaṃ kuṭippavesakapārutaṃ brāhmaṇapārutaṃ pāḷikārakapārutanti evamādi parimaṇḍalalakkhaṇato
tika-vin04t:2038_8: yathā ca ekacce paribbājakā uraṃ vivaritvā dvīsu aṃsakūṭesu pāvuraṇaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:2038_9: yathā ca ekasāṭakā manussā nivatthasāṭakassa ekena antena piṭṭhiṃ pārupitvā ubho kaṇṇe ubhosu aṃsakūṭesu ṭhapenti,
tika-vin04t:2038_10: yathā ca surāsoṇḍādayo sāṭakena gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā ubho ante ure vā olambenti,
tika-vin04t:2038_12: yathā ca antepurikāyo akkhitārakamattaṃ dassetvā oguṇṭhitaṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin04t:2038_13: yathā ca mahājeṭṭhā dīghasāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā tasseva ekenantena sakalasarīraṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin04t:2038_14: yathā ca kassakā khettakuṭiṃ pavisantā sāṭakaṃ paliveṭhetvā upakacchake pakkhipitvā tasseva ekenantena sarīraṃ pārupanti,
tika-vin04t:2038_15: yathā ca brāhmaṇā ubhinnaṃ upakacchakānaṃ antare sāṭakaṃ pavesetvā aṃsakūṭesu pakkhipanti,
tika-vin04t:2038_16: yathā ca pāḷikārako bhikkhu ekaṃsapārupanena pārutaṃ vāmabāhuṃ vivaritvā cīvaraṃ aṃsakūṭe āropeti,
tika-vin04t:2038_18: aññe ca evarūpe pārupanadose vajjetvā nibbikāraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupitabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2038_19: Tathā apārupitvā ārāme vā antaraghare vā anādarena yaṃkiñci vikāraṃ karontassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2040_1: gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṃ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṃ katvā paṭisaṅgharitvā yāva maṇibandhaṃ
tika-vin04t:2040_3: tathā akatvā pana jāṇuṃ vā uraṃ vā vivaritvā gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2041_2: piṇḍikamaṃsato paṭṭhāya pāde vivaritvā sesaṃ chādetvā nisinno suppaṭicchanno nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2043_0: Pañcame susaṃvutoti hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā akīḷāpento suvinītoti attho. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2045_0: Sattame okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhā khittacakkhu hutvā purato yugamattaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ pekkhamāno,
tika-vin04t:2045_1: ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2047_2: ekato vā ubhato vā ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho,
tika-vin04t:2047_3: anto indakhīlato paṭṭhāya evaṃ na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2048_0: Dasame nisinnakāle dhamakaraṇaṃ nīharantenāpi cīvaraṃ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2051_0: Dvādasamepi eseva nayo. Ubhayattha hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mihitamattaṃ karontassa anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2053_5: ante tatiyattheroti evaṃ nisinnesu yaṃ saṅghatthero dutiyattherena saddhiṃ manteti,
tika-vin04t:2055_0: Ito paresu chasu kāyappacālakanti kāyaṃ cāletvā cāletvā,
tika-vin04t:2055_2: Tasmā kāyādīni paggahetvā niccalāni ujukāni ṭhapetvā gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca,
tika-vin04t:2057_0: Ekavīsadvāvīsesu khambhakatoti kaṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā katakhambho.
tika-vin04t:2061_0: Pañcavīse ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādeheva,
tika-vin04t:2061_1: aggapāde vā ukkhipitvā paṇhīhiyeva bhūmiyaṃ phusantassa gamanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2063_0: Chabbīse na pallatthikāyāti hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā na nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2063_2: vāsūpagatassa pana idhāpi purimesu ca dvāvīsacatuvīsesu anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2070_0: Tatiye samasūpako nāma yattha muggamāsehi vā kulatthādīhi vā kato hatthahāriyo sūpo bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo hoti,
tika-vin04t:2070_2: Ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbāpi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2070_4: ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya vā attano dhanena vā idha anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2072_0: Catutthe samatittikanti samapuṇṇaṃ samabharitaṃ adhiṭṭhānupagapattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ anatikkamitvā racitaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2072_2: Anadhiṭṭhānupage pana yāvakālikaṃ yāmakālikādīni ca yatthakatthaci thūpīkatānipi vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin04t:2072_3: yaṃ pana dvīsu pattesu gahetvā ekaṃ pūretvā vihāraṃ harati,
tika-vin04t:2072_4: yaṃ vā pakkhipiyamānaṃ pūvaucchukkhaṇḍaphalāphalādi heṭṭhā orohati,
tika-vin04t:2072_6: yañca paṇṇe vā thālake vā pakkhipitvā pattamatthake ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2074_0: Sattame sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin04t:2074_2: aññabhājane vā ākiranto tato tato omasati, tassa,
tika-vin04t:2076_1: Yo pana parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:2078_0: Dasame yassa bhattasāmikā māghātasamayādīsu byañjanaṃ paṭicchādetvā denti,
tika-vin04t:2080_0: Ekādasame ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya attano dhanenāti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2084_3: Mūlakhādanīyādibhede pana sabbakhajjake phalāphale ca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2086_0: Cuddasame parimaṇḍalanti adīghaṃ. Idha pana khajjakaphalāphalehi saddhiṃ uttaribhaṅgepi anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2090_0: Sattarasame sakabaḷenāti ettha yattakena vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2090_2: Yo pana dhammaṃ kathento hariṭakādīni mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti,
tika-vin04t:2092_0: Aṭṭhārasame piṇḍukkhepakanti piṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā, idhāpi khajjakaphalāphalesu anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2096_0: Vīsatime avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā, idha phalāphalamattake anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2098_1: anāpattiyaṃ panettha “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento hatthaṃ niddhunātī”ti idaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2100_1: idhāpi “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento sitthaṃ chaḍḍayatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2104_0: Catuvīsatime capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā. Pañcavīsatimepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2106_1: Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2106_2: Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2106_6: oṭṭhamaṃsehi eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2108_0: Ekūnatiṃsatime na sāmisenāti etaṃ paṭikūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2108_1: tasmā saṅghikampi puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhopi sarāvakampi thālakampi na gahetabbameva,
tika-vin04t:2108_3: Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito na hoti,
tika-vin04t:2108_6: dhovāpessāmīti vā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2110_0: Tiṃsatime “uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍetī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2110_1: Tattha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā,
tika-vin04t:2110_2: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin04t:2110_3: Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin04t:2110_4: Paṭiggahe vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchantānaṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti.
tika-vin04t:2113_0: Dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttesu paṭhame yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi.
tika-vin04t:2113_1: So taṃ chattaṃ yatthakatthaci sarīrāvayave ṭhapetvāpi yāva hatthena na muñcati,
tika-vin04t:2113_5: hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na hoti,
tika-vin04t:2115_0: Dutiye daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo,
tika-vin04t:2115_3: Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin04t:2117_0: Catutthe sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbā,
tika-vin04t:2117_1: tasmā saddhiṃ vā sarena dhanuṃ gahetvā,
tika-vin04t:2117_2: suddhadhanuṃ vā suddhasaraṃ vā sajiyadhanuṃ vā nijjiyadhanuṃ vā gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2117_3: Sace panassa dhanu khandhepi paṭimukkaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2119_0: Pañcame pādukāruḷhassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantarikaṃ appavesetvā kevalaṃ akkantassa vā,
tika-vin04t:2119_3: Idha pana yvāyaṃ paṇhikabandhaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhānavasena “omukko”ti vuccati,
tika-vin04t:2121_0: Sattame sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito,
tika-vin04t:2121_2: ayutte vā vayhādike yāne visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi nisinno hoti,
tika-vin04t:2121_4: Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2121_5: Visuṃ nisinnesupi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2121_8: Pacchime pana uccatarepi nisinnena desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2123_0: Aṭṭhame sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmippadese
tika-vin04t:2123_1: vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2123_2: Sayanagatena pana sayanagatassa uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2123_3: Nipannena pana ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā,
tika-vin04t:2123_4: nisinnena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā,
tika-vin04t:2125_0: Navame hatthapallatthikādīsu yāya kāyaci nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2127_0: Dasame veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati,
tika-vin04t:2131_1: Āsaneti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
tika-vin04t:2133_0: Terasame ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnatappadese nisinnassa.
tika-vin04t:2135_0: Cuddasame na ṭhito nisinnassāti sace therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ āsane nisinno mahāthero pañhaṃ pucchati,
tika-vin04t:2135_2: Gāravena pana theraṃ “uṭṭhahitvā pucchā”ti vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin04t:2135_3: tasmā “passe ṭhitassa bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2137_0: Pannarasame sace purato gacchanto pañhaṃ pucchati,
tika-vin04t:2137_1: tassa taṃ akathetvā “pacchimassa bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2139_0: Soḷasame na uppathenāti ettha sace dvepi sakaṭamaggasmiṃ ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2141_0: Sattarasame “asañciccā”ti anāpattiyaṃ sace paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati,
tika-vin04t:2143_0: Aṭṭhārasame yampi jīvamānarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin04t:2143_3: Khandhe nisīditvā pana appaharitaṭṭhāne pātetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2143_6: “appaharite kato haritaṃ ottharatī”ti idamettha anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2143_7: Tattha sacepi appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palalaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā kato pacchā haritaṃ ottharati,
tika-vin04t:2145_0: Ekūnavīsatime na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2145_2: Deve vassante samantato udakoghe jāte anudakaṭṭhānaṃ alabhantena udake kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2145_3: idhāpi “thale kato udakaṃ ottharatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2151_2: Uddesaṃ āgacchantīti āpattādhikaraṇasaṅkhātāsu ca avasesādhikaraṇattayapaccayāsu ca āpattīsu parisuddhabhāvaṃ pucchanatthaṃ uddisitabbataṃ āgacchanti.
tika-vin04t:2151_4: Adhikaraṇānanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2151_5: Samathāya vūpasamāyāti samanatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
tika-vin04t:2151_9: “adhammo”ti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo,
tika-vin04t:2151_11: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
tika-vin04t:2151_14: vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, nāma.
tika-vin04t:2151_15: Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2152_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca,
tika-vin04t:2152_5: tattha saṅghena vā vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṃ sammati,
tika-vin04t:2152_6: evaṃ sammamāne ca pana tasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā ayaṃ sammukhāvinayo nāma.
tika-vin04t:2152_7: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā,
tika-vin04t:2153_1: atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti,
tika-vin04t:2153_2: tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammannitvā tena guḷhakavivaṭṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu
tika-vin04t:2153_3: tīsu salākaggāhesu aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā
tika-vin04t:2153_5: evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti.
tika-vin04t:2154_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
tika-vin04t:2154_3: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi,
tika-vin04t:2154_8: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti,
tika-vin04t:2154_9: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2154_10: dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-vin04t:2154_11: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena gate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno “ummattakena me, āvuso,
tika-vin04t:2154_13: nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2154_14: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti.
tika-vin04t:2154_15: Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2154_16: dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-vin04t:2155_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṃ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa
tika-vin04t:2155_4: sayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin04t:2155_5: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2156_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
tika-vin04t:2156_3: nissaggiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti,
tika-vin04t:2156_4: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-vin04t:2156_5: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti,
tika-vin04t:2156_9: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati.
tika-vin04t:2157_7: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne
tika-vin04t:2157_9: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷatthāya vāḷatthāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ karonti,
tika-vin04t:2157_10: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
tika-vin04t:2157_11: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā “na metaṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā niddampi okkamantā honti,
tika-vin04t:2157_12: sabbesaṃ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihippaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin04t:2158_1: Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti,
tika-vin04t:2158_2: tena vuttaṃ “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe…
tika-vin04t:2159_1: kaccittha parisuddhāti tesu sattasu adhikaraṇasamathesu kaccittha parisuddhā,
tika-vin04t:2159_2: natthi vo kiñci samathehi vūpasametabbanti pucchāmi,
tika-vin04t:2160_4: Anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatīti addhamāse addhamāse uposathavasena uddisitabbataṃ āgacchati.
tika-vin04t:2160_8: Sikkhitabbanti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamantehi adhisīlasikkhā sampādetabbā.
tika-vin04t:2160_10: taṃ sabbaṃ purime purime sikkhāpade vuttattā ceva uttānatthattā cāti.
tika-vin04t:2168_0: Yaṃ nātho, tassa dāneso, sampatto vaṇṇanākkamo.
tika-vin04t:2171_0: Tattha suṇātu metiādīnaṃ bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-vin04t:2171_2: ayyetiādivasena tasmiñca idha ca abhilāpamattameva liṅgabhedamattañca viseso.
tika-vin04t:2171_3: Yasmā ca bhikkhuniyā sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:2171_4: tasmā bhikkhunīnaṃ “sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti avatvā yā pana
tika-vin04t:2171_5: bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2171_6: Tattha chandasoti methunarāgappaṭisaṃyuttena chandena ceva ruciyā ca.
tika-vin04t:2171_7: Chande pana asati balakkārena padhaṃsitāya anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2171_8: tasmā yā paripuṇṇūpasampadā bhikkhunī manussāmanussatiracchānajātīsu purisaubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2171_9: yassa kassaci sajīvassa vā nijjīvassa vā santhatassa vā asanthatassa vā akkhāyitassa vā yebhuyyena akkhāyitassa
tika-vin04t:2171_10: vā aṅgajātassa attano vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhesu tīsu yatthakatthaci santhate vā asanthate vā pakativātena
tika-vin04t:2171_11: asaṃphuṭṭhe allokāse antamaso tilaphalamattampi padesaṃ chandaso paveseti,
tika-vin04t:2171_12: parena vā pavesiyamānā pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu yaṃkiñci sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:2171_14: Sesamettha ito paresu ca sādhāraṇasikkhāpadesu vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2174_0: Asādhāraṇesu pana catunnaṃ tāva pārājikānaṃ paṭhame avassutāti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena tintā,
tika-vin04t:2174_3: Purisapuggalassāti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjituṃ viññussa manussajātikassa purisasaṅkhātassa puggalassa.
tika-vin04t:2174_7: Āmasananti āmajjanaṃ phuṭṭhokāsaṃ anatikkamitvā tattheva saṅghaṭṭanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2174_12: Sādiyeyyāti yā bhikkhunī attano yathāparicchinne kāye purisassa etaṃ āmasanādiṃ sādiyati,
tika-vin04t:2174_13: sayaṃ vā pana tena kāyena purisassa yaṃkiñci kāyappadesaṃ sādayamānā chupati,
tika-vin04t:2174_14: ayaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalikā nāma pārājikāti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-vin04t:2175_0: “Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthu”ntiādike tena vitthāravinicchaye yasmā sabbāneva asādhāraṇapaññattiyo honti,
tika-vin04t:2175_1: tasmā ito paṭṭhāya santiṃ anupaññattiṃ vatvā sādhāraṇapaññattīti vā asādhāraṇapaññattīti vā na vakkhāma,
tika-vin04t:2176_2: idaṃ tāva sikkhāpadaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ sundarīnandaṃ ārabbha kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2176_5: yathāparicchinnakāyappaṭibaddhena vā avasesakāyena vā tassa kāyaṃ āmasantiyā thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2176_6: yakkhapetapaṇḍakatiracchānagatamanussaviggahānaṃ ubhatoavassute yathāparicchinnena kāyena kāyaṃ āmasantiyāpi thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2176_15: Aṅgāni samuṭṭhānādīni ca bhikkhupātimokkhe kāyasaṃsagge vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
tika-vin04t:2179_6: Pubbevāhaṃ ayye aññāsinti idaṃ tassā vacanakāladassanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2179_7: saliṅge ṭhitāya pana pārājikabhāvaṃ ñatvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti dhure nikkhittamatteyeva ayaṃ vajjappaṭicchādikā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2180_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha nevaattanāpaṭicodanā nagaṇassa ārocanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2183_3: Satthusāsanenāti idhāpi codetvā sāretvā karaṇameva satthusāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin04t:2183_6: tattha pariyāpannagaṇe vā ekapuggale vā tasmiṃ vā kamme ādaravirahitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2183_10: Akatasahāyanti ekakammādike saṃvāse saha ayanabhāvena samānasaṃvāsakā bhikkhū sahāyā nāma,
tika-vin04t:2183_11: yassa pana so saṃvāso tehi saddhiṃ natthi na tena te sahāyā katā honti,
tika-vin04t:2183_15: Tamanuvatteyyāti taṃ ukkhittakaṃ ukkhittakabhāveyeva ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ yā bhikkhunī yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti,
tika-vin04t:2183_17: Sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saṅghabhedasikkhāpadādīsu vuttanayena visuṃ saṅghamajjhe ca vuccamānā taṃ vatthuṃ
tika-vin04t:2183_18: appaṭinissajjantī samanubhāsanakammapariyosāne ukkhittānuvattikā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2187_4: Purisapuggalassa hatthaggahaṇaṃ vātiādīsu pana yaṃ purisapuggalena hatthe gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin04t:2187_7: Hatthaggahaṇanti ettha ca yassa kassaci apārājikakkhettabhūtassa aṅgassa gahaṇaṃ hatthaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2187_8: yassa kassaci nivatthassa vā pārutassa vā gahaṇaṃ saṅghāṭikaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2187_9: Santiṭṭheyya vātiādīsu kāyasaṃsaggasaṅkhātassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya purisassa hatthapāse santiṭṭheyya vā,
tika-vin04t:2187_11: purisena vā “itthannāmaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchā”ti vuttā taṃ saṅketaṃ gaccheyya,
tika-vin04t:2187_13: yena kenaci vā paṭicchannaṃ okāsaṃ paviseyya,
tika-vin04t:2187_14: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhatvā kāyaṃ upasaṃhareyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:2187_16: evaṃ ayampi bhikkhunī etassa kāyasaṃsaggasaṅkhātassa asaddhammassa paṭisevanatthāya etāni aṭṭha vatthūni
tika-vin04t:2187_17: paṭipāṭiyā vā uppaṭipāṭiyā vā pūretvā aṭṭhavatthukā nāma pārājikā hotīti.
tika-vin04t:2188_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ paripūraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2188_7: Ekekasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ satakkhattumpi vītikkante tā āpattiyo desetvā muccati,
tika-vin04t:2188_9: “idāni nāpajjissāmī”ti hi dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desitā gaṇanūpikā,
tika-vin04t:2188_12: Tasmā yā ekaṃ āpannā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā desetvā puna kilesavasena āpajjati,
tika-vin04t:2188_14: evaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ paripūrentīpi pārājikā na hoti.
tika-vin04t:2188_15: Yā pana āpajjitvā “punapi aññaṃ vatthuṃ āpajjissāmī”ti saussāhāva deseti,
tika-vin04t:2188_24: aṭṭhamassa vatthussa pūraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2190_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha pārājikā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā cattāro,
tika-vin04t:2190_1: ime cattāroti evaṃ pātimokkhuddesamaggena aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā uddiṭṭhāti evamettha attho veditabbo,
tika-vin04t:2196_0: Saṅghādisesesu paṭhame ussayavādikāti mānussayavasena kodhussayavasena aḍḍakaraṇatthāya vinicchayamahāmattānaṃ santike vivadamānā.
tika-vin04t:2196_1: Gahapatinā vātiādīhi ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike avasesā gahaṭṭhapabbajitā saṅgahitā.
tika-vin04t:2196_2: Ayaṃ bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikanti ādimhi paṭhamaṃ āpatti etassāti paṭhamāpattiko,
tika-vin04t:2197_2: “aḍḍaṃ karissāmī”ti yaṃkiñci dutiyikaṃ vā sakkhiṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā pariyesantiyā pariyesane dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2197_3: yattha ṭhitāya “aḍḍaṃ kātuṃ gacchāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin04t:2197_4: tato paṭṭhāya gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2197_5: yatthakatthaci antamaso bhikkhunupassayaṃ āgatepi vohārike disvā attano kathaṃ ārocentiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2197_6: Itarena attano kathāya ārocitāya bhikkhuniyā thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2197_7: paṭhamaṃ itarena pacchā bhikkhuniyā ārocanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2197_8: Sace pana bhikkhunī taṃ vadati “mama ca tava ca kathaṃ tvaṃyeva ārocehī”ti,
tika-vin04t:2197_9: so attano vā kathaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārocetu, tassā vā,
tika-vin04t:2197_12: tena evaṃ vuttāya bhikkhuniyā ārocanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2197_15: Yathā vā tathā vā hi ārociyamāne paṭhamārocane bhikkhuniyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2197_17: Ubhinnaṃ pana kathaṃ sutvā vohārikehi vinicchaye kate aḍḍapariyosānaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2197_18: tasmiṃ aḍḍapariyosāne bhikkhuniyā jayepi parājayepi saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin04t:2198_0: Yā pana paccatthikamanussehi dūtaṃ vā pahiṇitvā,
tika-vin04t:2198_3: yā vā upassaye aññehi kataṃ anācāraṃ anodissa ācikkhantī rakkhaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2198_4: yāya ca kiñci avuttā vohārikā aññato sutvā sayameva aḍḍaṃ pariyosāpenti, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2201_0: Dutiye yāya pañcamāsagghanakato paṭṭhāya yaṃkiñci parasantakaṃ avaharitaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2201_3: Vajjhaṃ viditanti tena kammena “vadhārahā aya”nti evaṃ viditaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2201_8: Yattha yattha hi rājāno gaṇādīnaṃ gāmanigame niyyātenti “tumheva ettha anusāsathā”ti,
tika-vin04t:2201_11: Ettha ca rājānaṃ vā gaṇādike vā apaloketvāpi bhikkhunisaṅgho apaloketabbova.
tika-vin04t:2201_12: Aññatra kappāti titthiyesu vā aññabhikkhunīsu vā pabbajitapubbā kappā nāma,
tika-vin04t:2201_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ upasampādentiyā gaṇaācarinī pattacīvarapariyesanesu sīmāsammutiyā ñattiyā ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2202_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha coriṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2202_2: tathā acoriyā corisaññāya ceva vematikāya ca.
tika-vin04t:2205_0: Tatiye gāmantarantiādīsu sakagāmato tāva nikkhamantiyā anāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2205_1: nikkhamitvā pana aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2205_2: ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkante thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2205_4: tato nikkhamitvā puna sakagāmaṃ pavisantiyāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin04t:2205_5: Sace pana khaṇḍapākārena vā vaticchiddena vā bhikkhunivihārabhūmiṃyeva sakkā hoti pavisituṃ,
tika-vin04t:2205_6: evaṃ pavisamānāya kappiyabhūmiyā paviṭṭhā nāma hoti,
tika-vin04t:2205_8: Bahigāme ṭhatvā yaṃkiñci sakagāmaṃ vā paragāmaṃ vā akappiyabhūmiṃ padasā pavisantiyā āpattīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-vin04t:2206_0: Nadipāragamane vuttalakkhaṇāya nadiyā dutiyikaṃ vinā paratīraṃ gacchantiyā vā antarānadiyaṃ dutiyikāya
tika-vin04t:2206_1: saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā puna orimatīrameva paccuttarantiyā vā paṭhamapādaṃ uddharitvā tīre ṭhapitakkhaṇe thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2206_4: nahānādikāraṇena ca otiṇṇāya orimatīraṃ padasāpi paccuttarituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2207_0: Rattivippavāse “purearuṇeyeva dutiyikāya hatthapāsaṃ okkamissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ vinā ekagabbhepi dutiyikāya
tika-vin04t:2208_0: Ekā vā gaṇamhāti ettha pana ekā bhikkhunīpi gaṇoyeva.
tika-vin04t:2208_2: dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijaheyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2208_3: Tasmā indakhīlātikkamato paṭṭhāya bahigāme rukkhathambhasāṇipākārādiantaritabhāvenāpi dutiyikāya dassanūpacāre vijahite sacepi savanūpacāro atthi,
tika-vin04t:2208_6: tattha maggamūḷhasaddena viya dhammassavanārocanasaddena viya ca ‘ayye’ti saddāyantiyā saddassavanātikkame āpattiyeva.
tika-vin04t:2208_7: Sace pana maggaṃ gacchantī ohīyitvā “idāni pāpuṇissāmī”ti saussāhā anubandhati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2209_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha gāmantaragamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2209_2: pure aruṇe sakagāmato nikkhamitvā aruṇuggamanakāle gāmantarapariyāpannaṃ nadipāraṃ okkamanantiyā pana catassopi āpattiyo ekakkhaṇeyeva honti.
tika-vin04t:2214_2: Dutiyikāya pana pakkantāya vā vibbhantāya vā kālaṅkatāya vā pakkhasaṅkantāya vā āpadāsu vā gāmantaragamanādīni karontiyā ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2217_1: Anaññāya gaṇassa chandanti tasseva kārakasaṅghassa chandaṃ ajānitvā.
tika-vin04t:2218_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ osāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2218_9: aññatra anuññātakāraṇā osāraṇanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2221_2: Khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vāti ettha paṭiggahaṇe thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2222_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sundarīnandaṃ ārabbha avassutāya avassutassa hatthato āmisappaṭiggahaṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2225_3: sā evaṃ uyyojanena ca tena vacanena itarissā paṭiggahaṇena ca dukkaṭāni,
tika-vin04t:2225_4: ajjhohāragaṇanāya thullaccayāni ca āpajjitvā bhojanapariyosāne saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin04t:2226_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2226_2: purisassa vā yakkhādīnaṃ vā hatthato udakadantaponappaṭiggahaṇuyyojane ca tesaṃ paribhoge ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2226_3: esa nayo yakkhādīnaṃ hatthato avasesaggahaṇatthaṃ uyyojane,
tika-vin04t:2226_14: tena vacanena gahetvā itarissā bhojanapariyosānanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2232_0: Dasame kiṃnumāva samaṇiyoti kiṃnu imā eva samaṇiyo.
tika-vin04t:2232_3: avasesavinicchayo ca tattheva saṅghabhedasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo,
tika-vin04t:2232_4: idaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷibhikkhuniṃ ārabbha “buddhaṃ paccācikkhāmī”tiādivacanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2232_5: evaṃ vacanameva cettha catūsu aṅgesu paṭhamaṃ aṅganti ayaṃ viseso,
tika-vin04t:2235_2: Idampi sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha “chandagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo”tiādivacanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2238_0: Dvādasame saṃsaṭṭhāti pabbajitānaṃ ananulomena gihīnaṃ koṭṭanapacanasāsanaharaṇādinā kāyikavācasikena missībhūtā.
tika-vin04t:2238_4: Bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikāti aññamaññissā kamme kariyamāne paṭikkosanena vihesikā.
tika-vin04t:2239_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha saṃsaṭṭhavihāravatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2242_0: Terasame evaṃ vadeyyāti tā samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeyya.
tika-vin04t:2242_6: Paribhavenāti “kiṃ imā karissantī”ti evaṃ paribhavitvā jānanena.
tika-vin04t:2242_12: sabbattha uññāya ca paribhavena cāti evaṃ samuccayattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin04t:2243_2: mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2246_2: bhedāya pana parakkamati ceva anuvattati ca.
tika-vin04t:2246_3: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā satta,
tika-vin04t:2246_5: Ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbanti bhikkhuniyā hi āpattiṃ chādentiyāpi parivāso nāma natthi,
tika-vin04t:2246_7: tasmā chādetvāpi achādetvāpi ekaṃ pakkhamānattameva caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2246_8: Taṃ bhikkhunīhi attano sīmaṃ sodhetvā vihārasīmāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2246_9: sodhetuṃ asakkontīhi khaṇḍasīmāya vā sabbantimena paricchedena catuvaggaṃ gaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2246_12: sace dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā ekavatthukā vā nānāvatthukā vā,
tika-vin04t:2246_13: tāsaṃ tāsaṃ vasena bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttavatthugottanāmaāpattibhedesu yaṃ yaṃ icchati,
tika-vin04t:2247_1: tāya āpannāya bhikkhuniyā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-vin04t:2247_2: pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassavacanīyo “ahaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2247_3: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ ussayavādaṃ, sāhaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2247_4: saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācāmī”ti,
tika-vin04t:2247_5: evaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya saṅgho ñāpetabbo –

tika-vin04t:2248_2: sā saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin04t:2248_4: saṅgho itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ dadeyya,

tika-vin04t:2250_1: mānattaṃ samādiyāmī”ti samādiyitvā saṅghassa ārocetvā nikkhittavattena tāva vasitukāmāya tattheva saṅghamajjhe
tika-vin04t:2250_2: vā pakkantāsu bhikkhunīsu ekabhikkhuniyā vā dutiyikāya vā santike “vattaṃ nikkhipāmi,
tika-vin04t:2250_4: Aññissā pana āgantukāya santike ārocetvā nikkhipitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2250_6: tato purearuṇeyeva catūhi bhikkhunīhi taṃ bhikkhuniṃ gahetvā gāmūpacārato ca bhikkhūnaṃ vihārūpacārato
tika-vin04t:2250_7: ca dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggā okkamma gumbavatiādīhi paṭicchanne okāse nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2250_10: Atha tāya bhikkhuniyā vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā bhikkhunisaṅghassa tāva evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ –
tika-vin04t:2251_2: sāhaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin04t:2251_3: tassā me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā ussayavādāya pakkhamānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin04t:2252_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ “ahaṃ, ayyā,
tika-vin04t:2252_6: dutiyikaṃ ṭhapetvā bhikkhunīsu vā pakkantāsupi ubhatosaṅghe mānattaṃ ciṇṇameva hoti.
tika-vin04t:2252_8: tāva yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2252_10: Uṭṭhite aruṇe vattaṃ nikkhipitvā upassayaṃ gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2253_0: Anikkhittavattāya pana āgantukesu asati catunnaṃ bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca devasikaṃ ārocetvā,
tika-vin04t:2253_1: āgantukesu sati sabbesampi āgantukānaṃ ārocentiyā pañcadasa divasāni pārivāsikakkhandhake vuttanayeneva sammā vattitabbanti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-vin04t:2253_3: ciṇṇamānattāya bhikkhuniyāti yadā evaṃ ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī hoti,
tika-vin04t:2253_4: athassā yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅghoti vuttanayeneva abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2259_0: Nissaggiyesu ādivaggassa tāva paṭhame pattasannicayaṃ kareyyāti pattasannidhiṃ kareyya,
tika-vin04t:2259_1: ekāhaṃ anadhiṭṭhahitvā vā avikappetvā vā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ pattaṃ ṭhapeyyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2260_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha pattasannicayavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2260_3: idha ekāhātikkameti ettakameva tassa ca imassa ca nānākaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2263_2: yaṃ vā pana kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2263_3: Ādissa dinnaṃ nāma “sampattā bhājentū”ti vatvā vā,
tika-vin04t:2263_7: Iccetaṃ akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājāpentiyā payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2264_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha akālacīvaraṃ “kālacīvara”nti adhiṭṭhahitvā bhājanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2264_2: kālacīvare akālacīvarasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2267_1: Acchindeyyāti sayaṃ acchindantiyā bandhitvā ṭhapitesu bahūsupi ekāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2267_3: Acchindāpane pana ekāya āṇattiyā bahūsu acchinnesupi ekāvāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2268_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraṃ parivattetvā acchindanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2268_10: sakasaññāya acchindanaṃ vā acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2271_2: Aññaṃ viññāpeyyāti yaṃ pubbe “kinte, ayye, aphāsu,
tika-vin04t:2271_4: taṃ paṭikkhipitvā tañceva aññañca gahetukāmā tato aññaṃ viññāpeyya,
tika-vin04t:2272_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha aññaṃ viññāpetvā aññaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2272_5: aññenapi atthe sati tena saddhiṃ aññañca,
tika-vin04t:2272_8: imaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā suddhaṃ aññameva ca viññāpentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2275_0: Pañcame aññaṃ cetāpetvāti attano kappiyabhaṇḍena “idaṃ nāma āharā”ti aññaṃ parivattāpetvā.
tika-vin04t:2275_1: Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti “evaṃ me idaṃ datvā aññampi āharissatī”ti maññamānā “na me iminā attho,
tika-vin04t:2275_2: idaṃ nāma me āharā”ti tato aññaṃ cetāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:2275_4: paṭilābhena tena vā aññena vā mūlena āhaṭaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2278_4: Aññaṃ cetāpeyyāti “idaṃ nāma paribhuñjeyyāthā”ti yaṃ uddisitvā niyametvā yo parikkhāro dinno,
tika-vin04t:2279_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha tādisena parikkhārena aññaṃ cetāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2279_6: amhākañca iminā nāma attho”ti sāmike apaloketvā upanentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2282_0: Sattame saññācikenāti sayaṃ yācitakenāpi. Etadevettha nānākaraṇaṃ, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2285_0: Aṭṭhame mahājanikenāti gaṇassa pariccattena, idamettha chaṭṭhato nānākaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2288_0: Navame saññācikenāti idaṃ aṭṭhamato atirittaṃ, sesaṃ dvīsupi chaṭṭhasikkhāpadasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2292_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha tādisena parikkhārena aññaṃ cetāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2296_3: Cetāpetabbanti ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca ñātakappavārite ca aññena kismiñcideva guṇe parituṭṭhena “vadethāyye,
tika-vin04t:2296_5: Tato ce uttarīti tatuttari viññāpentiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2297_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2302_1: tatiyavagge dasāti imāni aṭṭhārasa sikkhāpadāni bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbānīti.
tika-vin04t:2304_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā aṭṭhārasa,
tika-vin04t:2310_0: Pācittiyesu lasuṇavaggassa tāva paṭhame lasuṇanti magadharaṭṭhe jātaṃ āmakaṃ bhaṇḍikalasuṇameva,
tika-vin04t:2311_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha lasuṇaṃ harāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2314_2: Saṃharāpeyyāti ettha khurasaṇḍāsakattariādīsu yena kenaci saṃharāpentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2315_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2318_0: Tatiye talaghātaketi antamaso uppalakesarenāpi muttakaraṇassa talaghātane muttakaraṇamhi pahāradāne pācittiyanti attho.
tika-vin04t:2319_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ dve bhikkhuniyo ārabbha talaghātakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2319_5: Ābādhapaccayā gaṇḍaṃ vā vaṇaṃ vā paharantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2323_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha jatumaṭṭhakasādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2326_2: Dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbanti dvīsu aṅgulīsu ekekaṃ katvā dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2326_3: Taṃ atikkāmentiyāti sace dhovanakāle rāgavasena vitthārato tatiyāya aṅguliyā aggapabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2326_4: gambhīrato ekissāva aṅguliyā tatiyapabbaṃ paveseti pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2327_0: Sakkesu aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2330_0: Chaṭṭhe bhuñjantassāti pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhuñjato.
tika-vin04t:2330_4: Upatiṭṭheyyāti yā etesu dvīsu aññataraṃ gahetvā hatthapāse tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin04t:2331_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha bhuñjantassa evaṃ tiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2331_2: hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā khādanīyaṃ khādantassa upatiṭṭhantiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2331_10: pānīyassa vā vidhūpanassa vā gahaṇanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2334_2: Ettha ca viññatti ceva bhojanañca pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2334_3: tasmā sayaṃ viññatvā aññāya bhajjanādīni kārāpetvā vā,
tika-vin04t:2334_4: aññāya viññāpetvā sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā paṭiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dantehi saṃkhādanaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2335_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āmakadhaññaṃ viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2335_1: sayaṃ vā aññāya vā aviññattiyā laddhaṃ bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2335_2: aññāya viññattiyā laddhaṃ pana sayaṃ bhajjanādīni katvāpi kāretvāpi bhuñjantiyā dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2335_7: Sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ aññatarassa viññāpanaṃ vā viññāpāpanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2335_9: bhajjanādīni katvā vā kāretvā vā ajjhoharaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2338_3: Tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vāti yassakassaci kuṭṭassa vā pākārassa vā parato.
tika-vin04t:2338_4: Chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vāti sabbānipetāni ekato chaḍḍentiyā ekappayoge ekāpatti,
tika-vin04t:2339_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha uccāraṃ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2339_9: chaḍḍanaṃ vā chaḍḍāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2342_0: Navame hariteti khette vā nāḷikerādiārāme vā yatthakatthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne.
tika-vin04t:2342_1: Tāni vatthūni chaḍḍentiyā vā chaḍḍāpentiyā vā purimanayeneva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2342_2: tādise ṭhāne nisīditvā antamaso udakaṃ pivitvā matthakacchinnaṃ nāḷikerampi chaḍḍentiyā āpattiyeva.
tika-vin04t:2343_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha uccārādīni harite chaḍḍanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2343_4: bhikkhuniyāpi nikkhittabīje khette yāva aṅkuro na uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin04t:2346_3: Dassanāyāti etesu yaṃkiñci dassanāya gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2346_4: yattha ṭhitā passati vā suṇāti vā,
tika-vin04t:2346_6: taṃ taṃ disaṃ olokentiyā payoge payoge āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2347_0: Rājagahe chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha naccādīni dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2347_3: “cetiyassa upahāraṃ dethā”ti īdisena pariyāyena vā bhaṇantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2347_4: “cetiyassa upahāraṃ karomā”ti vā vutte “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchantiyā ca pācittiyamevāti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2347_6: “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma sundara”nti īdisaṃ pariyāyaṃ bhaṇantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2347_7: ārāme ṭhatvā passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:2347_8: tathā attano ṭhitokāsaṃ āgantvā payojitaṃ paṭipathaṃ gacchantiyā sammukhībhūtaṃ salākabhattādike sati karaṇīye gantvā,
tika-vin04t:2347_9: āpadāsu vā samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvāpi passantiyā vā suṇantiyā vā,
tika-vin04t:2347_13: dassanaṃ vā savanaṃ vāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2352_2: Purisenāti santiṭṭhituṃ sallapituñca viññunā manussapurisena saddhiṃ.
tika-vin04t:2352_4: Sallapeyyāti tattha ṭhatvā gehasitakathaṃ kathentiyāpi pācittiyameva.
tika-vin04t:2353_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ santiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2353_4: yaṃkiñci viññuṃ dutiyaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2353_9: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhānaṃ vā sallapanaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2356_0: Dutiye paṭicchanne okāseti kuṭṭādīsu yena kenaci paṭicchanne, idamevettha nānattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2359_0: Tatiye ajjhokāseti nānaṃ, sesaṃ ubhayatthāpi paṭhamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2362_3: Nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyyāti kaṇṇamūle kiñci jappeyya.
tika-vin04t:2362_4: Uyyojeyyāti anācāraṃ caritukāmatāya “gaccha tva”nti dutiyikaṃ uyyojeyya.
tika-vin04t:2362_5: Pācittiyanti purimanayeneva tāva santiṭṭhanādīsu tīṇi pācittiyāni,
tika-vin04t:2362_6: uyyojentiyā pana uyyojane ca hatthapāsavijahane ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2363_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ santiṭṭhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2363_3: sati karaṇīye dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ uyyojetī”ti ettakaṃ adhikanti.
tika-vin04t:2366_0: Pañcame purebhattanti aruṇuggamanaṃ upādāya yāva majjhanhikaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2366_2: Sāmike anāpucchāti tasmiṃ kule yaṃkiñci viññuṃ manussaṃ anāpucchā.
tika-vin04t:2366_3: Pakkameyyāti ettha channassa anto nisīditvā anovassakaṃ ajjhokāse upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2367_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha anāpucchā pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2367_3: tathā āpucchite anāpucchitasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca.
tika-vin04t:2370_0: Chaṭṭhe pacchābhattanti majjhanhike vītivatte yāva sūriyassa atthaṅgamā.
tika-vin04t:2370_1: Abhinisīdeyya vāti ādimhi nisīditvā gacchantiyā ekā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2371_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āsane abhinisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2374_0: Sattame vikāleti atthaṅgate sūriye. Seyyanti antamaso paṇṇasanthārampi, sesaṃ chaṭṭhasadisameva.
tika-vin04t:2375_0: Idaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchitvā seyyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2378_1: tato aññathā gahitena ca upadhāritena ca.
tika-vin04t:2378_2: Paranti “ahaṃ kirayye ayyaṃ na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahāmī”tiādinā nayena upasampannaṃ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2379_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha evaṃ paraṃ ujjhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2382_2: niraye upapajjatū”tievamādīni vadamānā nirayena abhisapati nāma,
tika-vin04t:2383_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha evaṃ abhisapanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2383_3: tiracchānayoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussadobhaggena vā abhisapane dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2386_0: Dasame vadhitvāti hatthādīhi paharitvā, ubhayaṃ karontiyāva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2387_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha attānaṃ vadhitvā rodanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2387_1: kevalaṃ vadhantiyā vā rodantiyā vā dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2387_2: Ñātirogabhogabyasanehi phuṭṭhāya kevalaṃ rodantiyā eva na vadhantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2392_0: Naggavaggassa paṭhame naggāti anivatthā vā apārutā vā.
tika-vin04t:2393_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evaṃ nahānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2393_2: “mahagghaṃ idaṃ disvā corāpi hareyyu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu vā nahāyantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2396_0: Dutiye sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha appamāṇikāyo udakasāṭikāyo dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2396_1: sesamettha sabbaṃ ratanavagge nisīdanasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2399_2: Aññatra catūhapañcāhāti visibbitadivasato pañca divase atikkāmetvā “neva sibbissāmi,
tika-vin04t:2399_3: na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2400_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha cīvaraṃ visibbetvā na sibbanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2400_6: karontī vā pañcāhaṃ atikkāmeti, tassā ca,
tika-vin04t:2403_3: paribhogavasena vā otāpanavasena vā saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena ‘saṅghāṭī’ti laddhanāmaṃ ticīvaraṃ,
tika-vin04t:2403_5: saṃkaccikāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ parivattananti attho.
tika-vin04t:2403_6: Atikkāmeyya pācittiyanti chaṭṭhe aruṇuggamane ekasmiṃ cīvare vuttanayena aparivattite ekā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2404_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2404_4: pañcamaṃ divasaṃ pañca cīvarāni nivāsentiyā vā pārupantiyā vā otāpentiyā vā, gilānāya,
tika-vin04t:2404_5: “idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise corabhaye na sakkā dhāretu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2407_1: aññissā santakaṃ anāpucchā gahitaṃ puna paṭidātabbaṃ pañcannaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaranti attho.
tika-vin04t:2407_2: Dhāreyyāti sace taṃ nivāseti vā pārupati vā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2408_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ ādāya anāpucchā pārupanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2408_6: “idaṃ me cīvaraṃ mahagghaṃ īdise corabhaye na sakkā dhāretu”nti evarūpāsu āpadāsu vā dhāreti, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2411_2: Antarāyaṃ kareyyāti yathā te dātukāmā na denti,
tika-vin04t:2411_4: Pācittiyanti sace tassā vacanena te na denti,
tika-vin04t:2412_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha gaṇassa cīvaralābhantarāyakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2412_2: sambahulānaṃ pana ekabhikkhuniyā vā cīvaralābhepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin04t:2412_7: vinā ānisaṃsadassanena antarāyakaraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2415_0: Sattame dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅganti samaggena saṅghena sannipatitvā karīyamānaṃ cīvaravibhaṅga.
tika-vin04t:2416_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dhammikaṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ paṭibāhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2416_2: adhammike dhammikasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2416_8: vinā ānisaṃsena paṭibāhananti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2419_1: evarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike mātāpitaro ca yassa kassaci gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā pariccajitvā dentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2420_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha agārikassa samaṇacīvaradānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2420_6: ṭhapetvā sahadhammike ca mātāpitaro ca aññesaṃ dānaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2423_1: “sace sakkoma dassāmā”ti ettakamattaṃ sutvā uppāditāya āsāyāti attho.
tika-vin04t:2423_2: Cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmeyyāti vassaṃvuṭṭhabhikkhunīhi kālacīvare bhājiyamāne “āgameyyātha, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2423_3: atthi saṅghassa cīvarapaccāsā”ti vatvā taṃ cīvaravibhaṅgaṃ cīvarakālaṃ atikkāmeyya,
tika-vin04t:2424_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dubbalacīvarapaccāsāya cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2424_2: adubbalacīvare dubbalacīvarasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2424_7: tasmiṃ āgate addhā dassantī”ti evaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā nivārentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2424_11: vinā ānisaṃsena nivāraṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2427_0: Dasame dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāranti sabbāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmena upāsakena yattako atthāramūliko ānisaṃso,
tika-vin04t:2427_1: tato adhikaṃ vā samakaṃ vā datvā yācitena samaggena bhikkhunisaṅghena yaṃ kathinaṃ ñattidutiyakammena antarā uddharīyati,
tika-vin04t:2428_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2433_1: Tāsu pana ekāya vā nipannāya aparā nipajjatu,
tika-vin04t:2434_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha dvinnaṃ ekamañce tuvaṭṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2434_1: sace pana ekāya nipannāya ekā nisīdati,
tika-vin04t:2437_0: Dutiye ekaṃ attharaṇañceva pāvuraṇañca etāsanti ekattharaṇapāvuraṇā,
tika-vin04t:2437_1: saṃhārimānaṃ pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādīnaṃ ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tuvaṭṭentīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2437_2: Pācittiyanti taṃyeva attharitvā taṃ pārupitvā nipajjantīnaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2438_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evaṃ tuvaṭṭanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2438_2: attharaṇe vā pāvuraṇe vā ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2441_0: Tatiye aphāsunti “iminā imissā aphāsu bhavissatī”ti anāpucchā purato caṅkamanaṭṭhānanissajjādayo vā uddisauddisāpanaparipucchanasajjhāyaṃ
tika-vin04t:2442_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha sañcicca aphāsukaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2445_2: Neva upaṭṭhaheyyāti tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ vā akarontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2445_3: parehi vā akārentiyā dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2446_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha dukkhitaṃ sahajīviniṃ anupaṭṭhānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2446_2: dasasu aññatarantarāye sati pariyesitvā alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2449_0: Pañcame upassayaṃ datvāti sakavāṭabaddhaṃ attano puggalikavihāraṃ datvā.
tika-vin04t:2449_1: Nikkaḍḍheyyāti bahūnipi dvārāni ekappayogena nikkaḍḍhentiyā ekā āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2450_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha etādise vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2450_4: sakavāṭabaddhato vā akavāṭabaddhato vā ubhinnampi parikkhāranikkaḍḍhane dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin04t:2457_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vuttanayeneva desacārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2463_1: pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ avasitvā tassa vassassa antoyeva.
tika-vin04t:2463_2: Idha sattāhakaraṇīyena vā kenaci ubbaḷhāya vā āpadāsu vā gacchantiyā ummattikādīnañca anāpatti.
tika-vin04t:2466_2: Chappañcayojanānīti ettha pavāretvā pañca yojanāni gantumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2466_4: Sace pana tīṇi gantvā teneva maggena paccāgacchati,
tika-vin04t:2466_7: “Vuttappamāṇaṃ addhānaṃ na gacchissāmī”ti dhure nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2467_0: Rājagahe sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vassaṃ vasitvā cārikaṃ apakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2467_2: pariyesitvā dutiyikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ alabhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2472_5: Dassanāyāti “etesu yaṃkiñci passissāmī”ti gacchantiyā pade pade dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2472_7: tattha padaṃ anuddharitvā pañcāpi passantiyā ekāva āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2472_8: Sace pana taṃ taṃ viloketvā passati,
tika-vin04t:2473_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2476_1: Pallaṅko nāma saṃhārimena vāḷena katoti vutto.
tika-vin04t:2476_2: Paribhuñjeyyāti ettha pana nisīdananipajjanappayogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2477_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āsandipallaṅkaparibhogavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2477_5: nisīdanaṃ nipajjanaṃ vāti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2480_1: Kanteyyāti ettha yattakaṃ hatthena añchitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin04t:2481_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha suttaṃ kantanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2481_1: kantanato pubbe kappāsavicinanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbappayogesu hatthavāragaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2484_1: Sacepi hi mātāpitaro attano kiñci kammaṃ akārāpetvā tesaṃ yāgupacanādīni karonti,
tika-vin04t:2484_2: pubbappayogesu payogagaṇanāya dukkaṭāni āpajjitvā yāguādīsu bhājanagaṇanāya,
tika-vin04t:2485_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha gihīnaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2485_1: manussehi saṅghassa yāgupāne vā bhatte vā cetiyapūjāya vā karīyamānāya tesaṃ sahāyabhāvena yāgupacanādīni,
tika-vin04t:2488_1: Pācittiyanti idha cīvarasibbane viya dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2489_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha adhikaraṇaṃ navūpasamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2492_0: Chaṭṭhe sahatthāti kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā ṭhapetvā pañcasahadhammike avasesānaṃ
tika-vin04t:2492_1: aññatra udakadantaponā yaṃkiñci ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ dadantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2493_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha agārikassa khādanīyabhojanīyadānavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2493_7: ṭhapetvā pañca sahadhammike aññassa sahatthā dānanti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2496_1: Anissajjitvāti catutthe divase dhovitvā aññissā antamaso sāmaṇeriyāpi utuniyā adatvā.
tika-vin04t:2497_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āvasathacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2500_3: Cārikaṃ pakkameyya pācittiyanti ettha sakagāmato aññaṃ gāmaṃ ekarattivāsatthāyapi pakkamantiyā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2501_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2504_2: Pariyāpuṇeyyāti ettha yassa kassaci santike taṃ padādivasena pariyāpuṇantiyā padagaṇanāya ceva akkharagaṇanāya ca pācittiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2507_1: Ubhayampi sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā ceva sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ca ārabbha tiracchānavijjaṃ pariyāpuṇanavācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ. Lekhe,
tika-vin04t:2512_0: Ārāmavaggassa paṭhame sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmanti yattha bhikkhū rukkhamūlepi vasanti,
tika-vin04t:2513_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anāpucchā ārāmaṃ pavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2513_1: “santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā”ti ca “jānaṃ sabhikkhuka”nti ca imānettha dve anupaññattiyo,
tika-vin04t:2513_3: abhikkhuke sabhikkhukasaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2516_0: Dutiye akkoseyyāti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena sammukhā vā parammukhā vā akkoseyya.
tika-vin04t:2517_0: Vesāliyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ akkosanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2520_3: netā jānanti kammaṃ vā kammadosaṃ vā kammasampattiṃ vā kammavipattiṃ vā”ti evaṃ yattha katthaci paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2521_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha gaṇaṃ paribhāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2521_1: sambahulā vā ekaṃ vā anupasampannaṃ vā paribhāsantiyā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2524_2: Pācittiyanti tassā purebhattaṃ ṭhapetvā yāguñceva sesāni ca tīṇi kālikāni aññaṃ yaṃkiñci āmisaṃ ajjhoharaṇatthāya paṭiggaṇhantiyā gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2525_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha aññatra bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2525_1: tīṇi kālikāni āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhantiyāpi ajjhoharantiyāpi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2525_2: Yā pana nimantitā appavāritā yāguṃ pivati,
tika-vin04t:2525_4: tīṇi kālikāni sati paccaye paribhuñjati, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2525_6: Nimantitā vā pavāritā vā taṃ ubhayaṃ vā,
tika-vin04t:2525_10: nimantitāya anāpucchā bhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato siyā kiriyākiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2525_11: pavāritāya kappiyaṃ kāretvāpi akāretvāpi paribhuñjantiyā āpattisambhavato siyā kiriyaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2528_4: Pācittiyanti tassā “yaṃ kulaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paccaye dātukāmaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2528_5: kathaṃ nāma tattha bhikkhuniyo na gaccheyyu”nti bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santike kulassa,
tika-vin04t:2528_6: “kathaṃ nāma ime tāsaṃ kiñci na dajjeyyu”nti kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2529_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kulamaccharāyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2529_4: kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vā santike kulassa avaṇṇabhaṇananti imānettha dve aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2532_0: Chaṭṭhe sace bhikkhunupassayato addhayojanabbhantare ovādadāyakā bhikkhū na vasanti,
tika-vin04t:2532_1: maggo vā akhemo hoti na sakkā anantarāyena gantuṃ,
tika-vin04t:2533_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṃ vasanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2533_1: yattha pana vassūpagatā bhikkhū pakkantā vā honti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā tattha vasantiyā, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2536_0: Sattame vassaṃvuṭṭhāti purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā temāsaṃ vuṭṭhā.
tika-vin04t:2536_3: bhikkhunīhi cātuddaseyeva sannipatitvā “suṇātu me, ayye, saṅgho,
tika-vin04t:2536_10: samānavassikaṃ pavāreyyā”ti evaṃ dvevācikādiñattiṃ vā ṭhapetvā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti ce ṭhapitā, “saṅghaṃ, ayye,
tika-vin04t:2536_11: pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2536_18: paṭikarissāmī”ti evaṃ dvattikkhattuṃ vā vatvā paṭipāṭiyā pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2536_22: Evaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghe pavāretvā tattheva ekā bhikkhunī bhikkhunikkhandhake vuttena ñattidutiyakammena
tika-vin04t:2536_24: Tāya sammatāya bhikkhuniyā pannarase bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
tika-vin04t:2536_25: karitvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo “bhikkhunisaṅgho ayya bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāreti diṭṭhena vā
tika-vin04t:2537_1: catūhi vā tīhi vā gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin04t:2538_1: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2538_4: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2538_7: passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2539_2: ayye pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2539_6: ayyaṃ pavāreti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2539_8: passanto paṭikarissatī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2540_1: ayye pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2540_5: ayyaṃ pavārenti diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā,
tika-vin04t:2540_8: ayye pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā…pe…
tika-vin04t:2540_12: ayyaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā…pe…
tika-vin04t:2540_15: passantī paṭikarissāmī”ti ca evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2540_16: Sabbāheva hi iminā nayena ubhatosaṅghe pavāritā hoti,
tika-vin04t:2540_17: yā pana vassaṃvuṭṭhā “ubhatosaṅghe evaṃ na pavāressāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin04t:2541_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha vassaṃ vasitvā na pavāraṇāvatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2544_2: Pācittiyanti “etesaṃ atthāya na gacchāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2545_0: Sakkesu chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha ovādāya agamanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2548_3: Taṃ atikkāmentiyāti ettha bhikkhunīhi terase vā cātuddase vā ārāmaṃ gantvā “ayaṃ uposatho cātuddaso pannaraso”ti pucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2548_5: Yā bhikkhunī vuttappakāre kāle tadubhayaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin04t:2548_8: ovādampi na yācissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2549_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha uposathaovādānaṃ apucchanaayācanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2552_0: Dasame pasākheti nābhiyā heṭṭhā jāṇumaṇḍalānaṃ uparipadese.
tika-vin04t:2552_1: Tato hi yasmā rukkhassa sākhā viya ubho ūrū pabhijjitvā gatā,
tika-vin04t:2552_6: Bhedāpeyya vātiādīsu sace “bhinda phālehī”ti sabbāni āṇāpeti,
tika-vin04t:2552_12: ekavācāya cha dukkaṭāni cha ca pācittiyāni.
tika-vin04t:2552_13: Sace pana bhedanādīsu ekaṃyeva “idaṃ nāma karohī”ti āṇāpeti,
tika-vin04t:2553_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ purisena bhedāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2553_1: apaloketvā vā viññuṃ vā yaṃkañci dutiyikaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karontiyā,
tika-vin04t:2553_6: purisena bhedādīnaṃ kārāpananti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin04t:2558_0: Gabbhinivaggassa paṭhame “gabbhinī”ti jānitvā upajjhāyāya vuṭṭhāpentiyā gaṇapariyesanādīsu ca ñattikammavācādvaye ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2559_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2559_1: gabbhiniyā vematikāya agabbhiniyā gabbhinisaññāya ceva vematikāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2565_0: Tatiye dve vassānīti pavāraṇāvasena dve saṃvaccharāni.
tika-vin04t:2565_1: Chasu dhammesūti pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīsu vikālabhojanāveramaṇipariyosānesu chasu sikkhāpadesu.
tika-vin04t:2565_2: Asikkhitasikkhanti padabhājane vuttanayeneva adinnasikkhaṃ vā kupitasikkhaṃ vā.
tika-vin04t:2565_3: Sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyyāti tesu chasu dhammesu sikkhanato,
tika-vin04t:2565_4: te vā sikkhāsaṅkhāte dhamme mānanato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ anupasampannaṃ upasampādeyya.
tika-vin04t:2566_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha evarūpaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2566_3: Dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā,
tika-vin04t:2569_0: Catutthe saṅghena asammatanti yassā saṅghena antamaso upasampadāmāḷakepi padabhājane vuttā upasampadāsammuti na dinnā hoti,
tika-vin04t:2575_0: Chaṭṭhe sabbaṃ tatiye vuttanayena. Sattamepi sabbaṃ catutthe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
tika-vin04t:2578_3: uddesādīni dehī”ti evaṃ na aññāya anuggaṇhāpeyya.
tika-vin04t:2579_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evarūpe vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2582_0: Navame vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattininti vuṭṭhāpitaṃ pavattiniṃ yāya upasampāditā,
tika-vin04t:2582_2: Nānubandheyyāti cuṇṇena mattikāya dantakaṭṭhena mukhodakenāti evaṃ tena tena karaṇīyena na upaṭṭhaheyya.
tika-vin04t:2583_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha nānubandhanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2583_1: Bālaṃ pana alajjiniṃ vā ananubandhantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2586_0: Dasame neva vūpakāseyyāti na gahetvā gaccheyya.
tika-vin04t:2587_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha sahajīviniyā avūpakāsanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2592_1: Yā pana tā sabbapaṭhamā dve mahāsikkhamānā,
tika-vin04t:2592_7: Gihigatāya dasavassakāle sikkhāsammutiṃ datvā dvādasavassakāle upasampadā kātabbā,
tika-vin04t:2592_10: Aṭṭhārasavassakālato paṭṭhāya ca panāyaṃ “gihigatā”tipi “kumāribhūtā”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2595_1: Pācittiyanti upajjhāyā hutvā vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva dukkaṭāni antarā,
tika-vin04t:2598_0: Pañcame saṅghena asammatāti yassā saṅghena padabhājane vuttā vuṭṭhāpanasammuti na dinnā.
tika-vin04t:2601_0: Chaṭṭhe alaṃ tāva te ayye vuṭṭhāpitenāti vuccamānāti vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā yācitāya saṅghena upaparikkhipitvā “yasmā bālā abyattā ca alajjinī ca hoti,
tika-vin04t:2601_1: tasmā alaṃ tāva tuyhaṃ upasampāditenā”ti evaṃ nivārīyamānā.
tika-vin04t:2601_2: Pacchā khīyanadhammanti pacchā aññāsaṃ byattānaṃ lajjinīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ diyyamānaṃ disvā “ahameva
tika-vin04t:2601_3: nūna bālā”tiādīni bhaṇamānā yattha katthaci khīyeyya.
tika-vin04t:2602_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ ārabbha evaṃ khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2605_0: Sattame sā pacchāti sikkhamānāya upasampadāya yāciyamānāya sā bhikkhunī evaṃ vatvā laddhe cīvare pacchā asati antarāye “neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi,
tika-vin04t:2605_1: na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipeyya,
tika-vin04t:2606_0: Ubhayampi sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha etesu vatthūsu paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2609_0: Navame sokāvāsanti saṅketaṃ katvā āgacchamānā purisānaṃ antosokaṃ pavesetīti sokāvāsā,
tika-vin04t:2609_2: Atha vā gharaṃ viya gharasāmikā ayampi purisasamāgamaṃ alabhamānā sokaṃ āvisati,
tika-vin04t:2609_5: Tenevassa padabhājane “sokāvāsā nāma paresaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin04t:2609_7: Pācittiyanti evarūpaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva kammavācāpariyosāne upajjhāyāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2610_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ thullanandaṃ ārabbha evarūpaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2613_0: Dasame mātāpitūhīti vijātamātarā ca janakapitarā ca.
tika-vin04t:2617_1: Tattha catubbidhaṃ pārivāsiyaṃ parisapārivāsiyaṃ rattipārivāsiyaṃ chandapārivāsiyaṃ ajjhāsayapārivāsiyanti.
tika-vin04t:2618_0: Tattha parisapārivāsiyaṃ nāma bhikkhū kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitā honti,
tika-vin04t:2618_8: chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2619_0: Puna bhikkhū “uposathādīni karissāmā”ti rattiṃ sannipatitvā “yāva sabbe sannipatanti,
tika-vin04t:2619_6: pāṭipade anuposathe uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin04t:2620_0: Puna bhikkhū “kiñcideva abbhānādisaṅghakammaṃ karissāmā”ti sannisinnā honti,
tika-vin04t:2620_1: tatreko nakkhattapāṭhako bhikkhu evaṃ vadati “ajja nakkhattaṃ dāruṇaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2620_3: Te tassa vacanena chandaṃ vissajjetvā tattheva nisinnā honti,
tika-vin04t:2620_8: Etasmiṃ pārivāsiye puna chandapārisuddhiṃ anāharitvā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin04t:2620_10: Pācittiyanti evaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā vuttanayeneva kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2621_0: Rājagahe thullanandaṃ ārabbha evaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2624_0: Dvādasame anuvassanti anusaṃvaccharaṃ. Evaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyāpi vuttanayeneva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2625_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2628_0: Terasame ekantarikaṃ ekaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā, ummattikādīnañca anāpatti. Sesaṃ dvādasamena sadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2633_0: Chattavaggassa paṭhame chattupāhananti padabhājane vuttalakkhaṇaṃ chattañca upāhanāyo ca.
tika-vin04t:2633_1: Dhāreyyāti paribhogavasena maggagamane ekappayogeneva divasampi dhārentiyā ekā āpatti.
tika-vin04t:2633_2: Sace pana tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā chattampi apanāmetvā upāhanāpi omuñcitvā punappunaṃ dhāreti,
tika-vin04t:2634_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha chattupāhanadhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2637_1: Etthāpi orohitvā punappunaṃ abhiruhantiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2640_2: Etthāpi omuñcitvā omuñcitvā dhārentiyā payogagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2641_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha saṅghāṇiṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2644_0: Catutthe itthālaṅkāranti sīsūpagādīsu aññataraṃ yaṃkiñci piḷandhanaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2644_1: Idha tassa tassa vasena vatthugaṇanāya āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin04t:2645_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha itthālaṅkāraṃ dhāraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2648_0: Pañcame gandhavaṇṇakenāti yenakenaci gandhena ca vaṇṇakena ca.
tika-vin04t:2651_0: Chaṭṭhe vāsitakenāti gandhavāsitakena. Piññākenāti tilapiṭṭhena. Sesaṃ pañcamasadisamevāti.
tika-vin04t:2654_2: Ettha ca hatthaṃ amuñcitvā ubbaṭṭane ekāva āpatti,
tika-vin04t:2655_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpanaparimaddāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2658_0: Aṭṭhamanavamadasamesupi sikkhamānāya sāmaṇeriyā gihiniyāti ettakameva nānaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2661_0: Ekādasame bhikkhussa puratoti na abhimukhamevāti attho,
tika-vin04t:2661_1: idaṃ pana upacāraṃ sandhāya kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2662_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anāpucchā nisīdanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2665_0: Dvādasame anokāsakatanti “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne pucchāmī”ti evaṃ akataokāsaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2665_1: tasmā suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā vinayaṃ vā abhidhammaṃ vā pucchantiyā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2666_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha anokāsakataṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2666_2: anodissa okāsaṃ kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchantiyā,
tika-vin04t:2669_0: Terasame asaṃkaccikāti adhakkhakaubbhanābhimaṇḍalasaṅkhātassa sarīrassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ anuññātasaṃkaccikavirahitā.
tika-vin04t:2669_1: Gāmaṃ paviseyyāti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2669_2: aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ atikkamantiyā vā okkamantiyā vā paṭhamapāde dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2670_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha asaṃkaccikāya gāmaṃ pavisanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin04t:2670_1: Yassā pana saṃkaccikacīvaraṃ acchinnaṃ vā naṭṭhaṃ vā, tassā, gilānāya, āpadāsu,
tika-vin04t:2675_0: Ito paresu musāvādavaggādīsu sattasu vaggesu bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva vinicchayo veditabboti.
tika-vin04t:2677_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammāti bhikkhū ārabbha paññattā sādhāraṇā sattati,
tika-vin04t:2681_1: giraggasamajjā cittāgārasikkhāpadaṃ saṅghāṇī itthālaṅkāro gandhavaṇṇako vāsitakapiññāko bhikkhuniādīhi
tika-vin04t:2681_2: ummaddanaparimaddanāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusalacittāni.
tika-vin04t:2681_5: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti.
tika-vin04t:2681_7: Corivuṭṭhāpanaṃ gāmantaraṃ ārāmasikkhāpadaṃ gabbhinivagge ādito paṭṭhāya satta,
tika-vin04t:2681_8: kumāribhūtavagge ādito paṭṭhāya pañca purisādisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ pārivāsikachandadānaṃ anuvassavuṭṭhāpanaṃ ekantarikavuṭṭhāpananti
tika-vin04t:2684_0: Pāṭidesanīyesu paṭhame sappinti pubbe vuttavinicchayaṃ pāḷiāgataṃ gosappiādimeva.
tika-vin04t:2684_1: Viññāpetvā bhuñjeyyāti ettha “viññattiyā paṭiladdhaṃ bhuñjissāmī”ti gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2685_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha sappiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin04t:2685_5: gilānakāle vā viññāpetvā pacchā agilānā hutvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin04t:2685_9: attano vā dhanena gahitaṃ bhuñjati, tassā,
tika-vin04t:2688_0: Dutiyādīsupi telādīni pubbe vuttavinicchayāni pāḷiyaṃ āgatāneva,
tika-vin04t:2694_0: Ito paraṃ pana sekhiyāni ceva adhikaraṇasamathā ca sabbapakārato bhikkhupātimokkhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāti.
tika-vin04t:2703_0: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
tika-vin04t:2705_0: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
tika-vin04t:2707_0: Yasmā tasmā akatvāva, ettha kaṅkhaṃ hitesinā;
tika-vin04t:2709_0: Yathā ca niṭṭhaṃ sampattā, kaṅkhāvitaraṇī ayaṃ;
tika-vin04t:2713_4: theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti
tika-vin04t:2713_5: garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇī nāma pātimokkhavaṇṇanā –
